GE07mbh_05_u:540: 05,008.011c taṃ dṛṣṭvā madrarājas tu jñātvā yatnaṃ ca tasya tam
GE07mbh_05_u:541: 05,008.011d*0051_01 dṛṣṭvā duryodhanaṃ rājā vismitaḥ sa narottamaḥ

GE07mbh_05_u:548: 05,008.012a satyavāg bhava kalyāṇa varo vai mama dīyatām
GE07mbh_05_u:550: 05,008.012d*0052_01 yathaiva pāṇḍavās tubhyaṃ tathaiva bhavato hy aham

GE07mbh_05_u:556: 05,008.013a kṛtam ity abravīc chalyaḥ kim anyat kriyatām iti

GE07mbh_05_u:560: 05,008.013d*0053_02 ahaṃ gamiṣye draṣṭuṃ vai yudhiṣṭhiram ariṃdamam

GE07mbh_05_u:564: 05,008.013d*0053_05 kṣipram āgamyatāṃ rājan pāṇḍavaṃ vīkṣya pārthiva
GE07mbh_05_u:566: 05,008.013d*0053_06 tvayy adhīnāḥ sma rājendra varadānaṃ smarasva naḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:567: 05,008.013d*0053_07 kṣipram eṣyāmi bhadraṃ te gacchasva svapuraṃ nṛpa
GE07mbh_05_u:569: 05,008.013d*0054_01 dṛṣṭvā tu pāṇḍavān rājan na mithyā kartum utsahe
GE07mbh_05_u:570: 05,008.014a sa tathā śalyam āmantrya punar āyāt svakaṃ puram

GE07mbh_05_u:572: 05,008.015a upaplavyaṃ sa gatvā tu skandhāvāraṃ praviśya ca
GE07mbh_05_u:573: 05,008.015c pāṇḍavān atha tān sarvāñ śalyas tatra dadarśa ha
GE07mbh_05_u:574: 05,008.015d*0055_01 cirāt tu dṛṣṭvā rājānaṃ mātulaṃ samitiṃjayam
GE07mbh_05_u:576: 05,008.016a sametya tu mahābāhuḥ śalyaḥ pāṇḍusutais tadā
GE07mbh_05_u:577: 05,008.016c pādyam arghyaṃ ca gāṃ caiva pratyagṛhṇād yathāvidhi

GE07mbh_05_u:587: 05,008.018a tathā bhīmārjunau hṛṣṭau svasrīyau ca yamāv ubhau
GE07mbh_05_u:588: 05,008.018b*0058_01 draupadī ca subhadrā ca abhimanyuś ca bhārata
GE07mbh_05_u:589: 05,008.018c āsane copaviṣṭas tu śalyaḥ pārtham uvāca ha
GE07mbh_05_u:592: 05,008.020a suduṣkaraṃ kṛtaṃ rājan nirjane vasatā vane
GE07mbh_05_u:593: 05,008.020c bhrātṛbhiḥ saha rājendra kṛṣṇayā cānayā saha
GE07mbh_05_u:594: 05,008.021a ajñātavāsaṃ ghoraṃ ca vasatā duṣkaraṃ kṛtam
GE07mbh_05_u:595: 05,008.021c duḥkham eva kutaḥ saukhyaṃ rājyabhraṣṭasya bhārata
GE07mbh_05_u:597: 05,008.022c avāpsyasi sukhaṃ rājan hatvā śatrūn paraṃtapa
GE07mbh_05_u:599: 05,008.023c tasmāl lobhakṛtaṃ kiṃ cit tava tāta na vidyate
GE07mbh_05_u:601: 05,008.023d*0059_02 dāne tapasi satye ca bhava tāta yudhiṣṭhira
GE07mbh_05_u:602: 05,008.023d*0059_03 kṣamā damaś ca satyaṃ ca ahiṃsā ca yudhiṣṭhira
GE07mbh_05_u:603: 05,008.023d*0059_04 adbhutaś ca punar lokas tvayi rājan pratiṣṭhitaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:605: 05,008.023d*0059_06 dharmās te viditā rājan bahavo lokasākṣikāḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:606: 05,008.023d*0059_07 sarvaṃ jagad idaṃ tāta viditaṃ te paraṃtapa
GE07mbh_05_u:607: 05,008.023d*0059_08 diṣṭyā kṛcchram idaṃ rājan pāritaṃ bharatarṣabha
GE07mbh_05_u:609: 05,008.023d*0059_10 nistīrṇaṃ duṣkaraṃ rājaṃs tvāṃ dharmanicayaṃ prabho
GE07mbh_05_u:610: 05,008.023d*0060_01 utthānaṃ saṃyamo dākṣyam apramādo dhṛtiḥ smṛtiḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:612: 05,008.024c tac ca śuśrūṣitaṃ sarvaṃ varadānaṃ ca bhārata
GE07mbh_05_u:615: 05,008.025c duryodhanasya yad vīra tvayā vācā pratiśrutam
GE07mbh_05_u:617: 05,008.025e ekaṃ tv icchāmi bhadraṃ te kriyamāṇaṃ mahīpate
GE07mbh_05_u:618: 05,008.025f*0062_01 rājann akartavyam api kartum arhasi sattama

GE07mbh_05_u:625: 05,008.027a tatra pālyo 'rjuno rājan yadi matpriyam icchasi
GE07mbh_05_u:626: 05,008.027c tejovadhaś ca te kāryaḥ sauter asmajjayāvahaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:627: 05,008.027e akartavyam api hy etat kartum arhasi mātula
GE07mbh_05_u:629: 05,008.028a śṛṇu pāṇḍava bhadraṃ te yad bravīṣi durātmanaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:631: 05,008.028d*0065_01 tejovadhanimittaṃ māṃ tat kariṣyāmi te priyam
GE07mbh_05_u:632: 05,008.029a ahaṃ tasya bhaviṣyāmi saṃgrāme sārathir dhruvam

GE07mbh_05_u:639: 05,008.032a evam etat kariṣyāmi yathā tāta tvam āttha mām

GE07mbh_05_u:650: 05,008.036d*0067_02 duḥkhaṃ prāptā yathā rājaṃs tac chṛṇuṣva narādhipa
GE07mbh_05_u:655: 05,009.001c duḥkhaṃ prāptaṃ paraṃ ghoram etad icchāmi veditum
GE07mbh_05_u:657: 05,009.002a śṛṇu rājan purā vṛttam itihāsaṃ purātanam

GE07mbh_05_u:659: 05,009.003a tvaṣṭā prajāpatir hy āsīd devaśreṣṭho mahātapāḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:660: 05,009.003c sa putraṃ vai triśirasam indradrohāt kilāsṛjat
GE07mbh_05_u:661: 05,009.004a aindraṃ sa prārthayat sthānaṃ viśvarūpo mahādyutiḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:663: 05,009.005a vedān ekena so 'dhīte surām ekena cāpibat
GE07mbh_05_u:664: 05,009.005c ekena ca diśaḥ sarvāḥ pibann iva nirīkṣate

GE07mbh_05_u:668: 05,009.007c viṣādam agamac chakra indro 'yaṃ mā bhaved iti
GE07mbh_05_u:669: 05,009.008a kathaṃ sajjeta bhogeṣu na ca tapyen mahat tapaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:673: 05,009.010a yathā sa sajjet triśirāḥ kāmabhogeṣu vai bhṛśam
GE07mbh_05_u:677: 05,009.011c pralobhayata bhadraṃ vaḥ śamayadhvaṃ bhayaṃ mama
GE07mbh_05_u:678: 05,009.011d*0069_01 prajāpatir bhaved eṣa candro vaiśravaṇo yamaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:679: 05,009.011d*0069_02 varuṇaḥ pāśahasto vā dharma eva bhavet svayam
GE07mbh_05_u:683: 05,009.013a tathā yatnaṃ kariṣyāmaḥ śakra tasya pralobhane
GE07mbh_05_u:685: 05,009.014a nirdahann iva cakṣurbhyāṃ yo 'sāv āste taponidhiḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:686: 05,009.014c taṃ pralobhayituṃ deva gacchāmaḥ sahitā vayam
GE07mbh_05_u:687: 05,009.014e yatiṣyāmo vaśe kartuṃ vyapanetuṃ ca te bhayam
GE07mbh_05_u:689: 05,009.015a indreṇa tās tv anujñātā jagmus triśiraso 'ntikam

GE07mbh_05_u:694: 05,009.017a tās tu yatnaṃ paraṃ kṛtvā punaḥ śakram upasthitāḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:696: 05,009.018a na sa śakyaḥ sudurdharṣo dhairyāc cālayituṃ prabho
GE07mbh_05_u:697: 05,009.018c yat te kāryaṃ mahābhāga kriyatāṃ tadanantaram
GE07mbh_05_u:700: 05,009.020a sa tūṣṇīṃ cintayan vīro devarājaḥ pratāpavān
GE07mbh_05_u:702: 05,009.021a vajram asya kṣipāmy adya sa kṣipraṃ na bhaviṣyati
GE07mbh_05_u:704: 05,009.022a śāstrabuddhyā viniścitya kṛtvā buddhiṃ vadhe dṛḍhām
GE07mbh_05_u:706: 05,009.022e mumoca vajraṃ saṃkruddhaḥ śakras triśirasaṃ prati
GE07mbh_05_u:707: 05,009.023a sa papāta hatas tena vajreṇa dṛḍham āhataḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:709: 05,009.024a taṃ tu vajrahataṃ dṛṣṭvā śayānam acalopamam
GE07mbh_05_u:710: 05,009.024c na śarma lebhe devendro dīpitas tasya tejasā
GE07mbh_05_u:712: 05,009.024e hato 'pi dīptatejāḥ sa jīvann iva ca dṛśyate
GE07mbh_05_u:717: 05,009.024f*0072_01 śirāṃsi tasya jāyante trīṇy eva śakunās trayaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:718: 05,009.024f*0072_02 tittiriḥ kalaviṅkaś ca tathaiva ca kapiñjalaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:722: 05,009.025e kṣipraṃ chindhi śirāṃsy asya kuruṣva vacanaṃ mama
GE07mbh_05_u:724: 05,009.026a mahāskandho bhṛśaṃ hy eṣa paraśur na tariṣyati
GE07mbh_05_u:725: 05,009.026c kartuṃ cāhaṃ na śakṣyāmi karma sadbhir vigarhitam
GE07mbh_05_u:727: 05,009.027a mā bhais tvaṃ kṣipram etad vai kuruṣva vacanaṃ mama
GE07mbh_05_u:728: 05,009.027c matprasādād dhi te śastraṃ vajrakalpaṃ bhaviṣyati
GE07mbh_05_u:730: 05,009.028a kaṃ bhavantam ahaṃ vidyāṃ ghorakarmāṇam adya vai
GE07mbh_05_u:731: 05,009.028c etad icchāmy ahaṃ śrotuṃ tattvena kathayasva me
GE07mbh_05_u:733: 05,009.029a aham indro devarājas takṣan viditam astu te
GE07mbh_05_u:734: 05,009.029c kuruṣvaitad yathoktaṃ me takṣan mā tvaṃ vicāraya
GE07mbh_05_u:735: 05,009.029d*0073_01 mayā hi nihataḥ śete triśirās tvaṃ ca viddhi vai
GE07mbh_05_u:736: 05,009.029d*0073_02 sa prahvaḥ prāñjalir bhūtvā idaṃ vacanam abravīt
GE07mbh_05_u:739: 05,009.030c ṛṣiputram imaṃ hatvā brahmahatyābhayaṃ na te
GE07mbh_05_u:742: 05,009.031c śatrur eṣa mahāvīryo vajreṇa nihato mayā
GE07mbh_05_u:743: 05,009.032a adyāpi cāham udvignas takṣann asmād bibhemi vai
GE07mbh_05_u:744: 05,009.032c kṣipraṃ chindhi śirāṃsi tvaṃ kariṣye 'nugrahaṃ tava
GE07mbh_05_u:745: 05,009.033a śiraḥ paśos te dāsyanti bhāgaṃ yajñeṣu mānavāḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:746: 05,009.033c eṣa te 'nugrahas takṣan kṣipraṃ kuru mama priyam
GE07mbh_05_u:748: 05,009.034a etac chrutvā tu takṣā sa mahendravacanaṃ tadā
GE07mbh_05_u:750: 05,009.035a nikṛtteṣu tatas teṣu niṣkrāmaṃs triśirās tv atha
GE07mbh_05_u:751: 05,009.035c kapiñjalās tittirāś ca kalaviṅkāś ca sarvaśaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:752: 05,009.036a yena vedān adhīte sma pibate somam eva ca
GE07mbh_05_u:753: 05,009.036c tasmād vaktrān viniṣpetuḥ kṣipraṃ tasya kapiñjalāḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:754: 05,009.037a yena sarvā diśo rājan pibann iva nirīkṣate
GE07mbh_05_u:755: 05,009.037c tasmād vaktrād viniṣpetus tittirās tasya pāṇḍava
GE07mbh_05_u:756: 05,009.038a yat surāpaṃ tu tasyāsīd vaktraṃ triśirasas tadā
GE07mbh_05_u:758: 05,009.039a tatas teṣu nikṛtteṣu vijvaro maghavān abhūt
GE07mbh_05_u:759: 05,009.039b*0074_01 takṣṇe caiva varaṃ dattvā prahṛṣṭas tridaśeśvaraḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:760: 05,009.039c jagāma tridivaṃ hṛṣṭas takṣāpi svagṛhān yayau
GE07mbh_05_u:761: 05,009.039d*0075_01 takṣāpi svagṛhaṃ gatvā naiva śaṃsati kasya cit
GE07mbh_05_u:763: 05,009.039d*0075_03 atha saṃvatsare pūrṇe bhūtāḥ paśupateḥ prabho

GE07mbh_05_u:765: 05,009.039d*0075_05 tata indro vrataṃ ghoram acarat pākaśāsanaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:766: 05,009.039d*0075_06 tapasā ca susaṃyuktaḥ saha devair marudgaṇaiḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:767: 05,009.039d*0075_07 samudre ca pṛthivyāṃ ca vanaspatiṣu strīṣu ca
GE07mbh_05_u:768: 05,009.039d*0075_08 vibhajya brahmahatyāṃ ca tāṃś ca saṃyojayad varaiḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:769: 05,009.039d*0075_09 varadas tu varaṃ dattvā pṛthivyai sāgarāya ca
GE07mbh_05_u:770: 05,009.039d*0075_10 vanaspatibhyaḥ strībhyaś ca brahmahatyāṃ nunoda tām
GE07mbh_05_u:771: 05,009.039d*0075_11 tatas tu śuddho bhagavān devair lokaiś ca pūjitaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:773: 05,009.039d*0076_01 mene kṛtārtham ātmānaṃ hatvā śatruṃ surārihā
GE07mbh_05_u:774: 05,009.040a tvaṣṭā prajāpatiḥ śrutvā śakreṇātha hataṃ sutam
GE07mbh_05_u:776: 05,009.041a tapyamānaṃ tapo nityaṃ kṣāntaṃ dāntaṃ jitendriyam
GE07mbh_05_u:779: 05,009.042c lokāḥ paśyantu me vīryaṃ tapasaś ca balaṃ mahat
GE07mbh_05_u:780: 05,009.042e sa ca paśyatu devendro durātmā pāpacetanaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:782: 05,009.043c agniṃ hutvā samutpādya ghoraṃ vṛtram uvāca ha
GE07mbh_05_u:786: 05,009.044e śakraṃ jahīti cāpy ukto jagāma tridivaṃ tataḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:789: 05,009.045d*0077_01 grastā lokāś ca vṛtreṇa sarve bharatasattama
GE07mbh_05_u:791: 05,009.045d*0077_03 sarve gandhendriyarasā hṛtā bhārata tena vai
GE07mbh_05_u:792: 05,009.045d*0077_04 pṛthivī vāyur ākāśa āpo jyotiś ca pañcamaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:794: 05,009.046a tato jagrāha devendraṃ vṛtro vīraḥ śatakratum
GE07mbh_05_u:796: 05,009.047a graste vṛtreṇa śakre tu saṃbhrāntās tridaśās tadā
GE07mbh_05_u:801: 05,009.049a jahṛṣuś ca surāḥ sarve dṛṣṭvā śakraṃ viniḥsṛtam
GE07mbh_05_u:805: 05,009.050c tvaṣṭus tapobalād vidvāṃs tadā śakro nyavartata
GE07mbh_05_u:806: 05,009.051a nivṛtte tu tadā devā viṣādam agaman param
GE07mbh_05_u:807: 05,009.051c sametya śakreṇa ca te tvaṣṭus tejovimohitāḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:808: 05,009.051e amantrayanta te sarve munibhiḥ saha bhārata
GE07mbh_05_u:809: 05,009.052a kiṃ kāryam iti te rājan vicintya bhayamohitāḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:810: 05,009.052c jagmuḥ sarve mahātmānaṃ manobhir viṣṇum avyayam
GE07mbh_05_u:815: 05,010.001*0078_02 śṛṇu me bhrātṛbhiḥ sārdhaṃ draupadyā ca jayāvaham
GE07mbh_05_u:818: 05,010.001*0080_01 sarvaṃ vyāptaṃ jagat tena vṛtreṇetīha naḥ śrutam
GE07mbh_05_u:820: 05,010.001*0080_03 athendro hi mahātejāḥ sametya saha devataiḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:822: 05,010.001a sarvaṃ vyāptam idaṃ devā vṛtreṇa jagad avyayam
GE07mbh_05_u:823: 05,010.001c na hy asya sadṛśaṃ kiṃ cit pratighātāya yad bhavet
GE07mbh_05_u:824: 05,010.002a samartho hy abhavaṃ pūrvam asamartho 'smi sāṃpratam
GE07mbh_05_u:825: 05,010.002c kathaṃ kuryāṃ nu bhadraṃ vo duṣpradharṣaḥ sa me mataḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:826: 05,010.003a tejasvī ca mahātmā ca yuddhe cāmitavikramaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:828: 05,010.004a tasmād viniścayam imaṃ śṛṇudhvaṃ me divaukasaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:829: 05,010.004c viṣṇoḥ kṣayam upāgamya sametya ca mahātmanā
GE07mbh_05_u:832: 05,010.005a evam ukte maghavatā devāḥ sarṣigaṇās tadā
GE07mbh_05_u:834: 05,010.005c śaraṇyaṃ śaraṇaṃ devaṃ jagmur viṣṇuṃ mahābalam
GE07mbh_05_u:835: 05,010.006a ūcuś ca sarve deveśaṃ viṣṇuṃ vṛtrabhayārditāḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:836: 05,010.006c tvayā lokās trayaḥ krāntās tribhir vikramaṇaiḥ prabho
GE07mbh_05_u:837: 05,010.007a amṛtaṃ cāhṛtaṃ viṣṇo daityāś ca nihatā raṇe
GE07mbh_05_u:838: 05,010.007c baliṃ baddhvā mahādaityaṃ śakro devādhipaḥ kṛtaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:839: 05,010.008a tvaṃ prabhuḥ sarvalokānāṃ tvayā sarvam idaṃ tatam
GE07mbh_05_u:842: 05,010.009a gatir bhava tvaṃ devānāṃ sendrāṇām amarottama
GE07mbh_05_u:845: 05,010.010a avaśyaṃ karaṇīyaṃ me bhavatāṃ hitam uttamam
GE07mbh_05_u:846: 05,010.010c tasmād upāyaṃ vakṣyāmi yathāsau na bhaviṣyati
GE07mbh_05_u:848: 05,010.011c sāma tasya prayuñjadhvaṃ tata enaṃ vijeṣyatha
GE07mbh_05_u:849: 05,010.012a bhaviṣyati gatir devāḥ śakrasya mama tejasā
GE07mbh_05_u:851: 05,010.013a gacchadhvam ṛṣibhiḥ sārdhaṃ gandharvaiś ca surottamāḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:852: 05,010.013c vṛtrasya saha śakreṇa saṃdhiṃ kuruta māciram
GE07mbh_05_u:854: 05,010.014a evam uktās tu devena ṛṣayas tridaśās tathā
GE07mbh_05_u:855: 05,010.014c yayuḥ sametya sahitāḥ śakraṃ kṛtvā puraḥsaram
GE07mbh_05_u:858: 05,010.015a samīpam etya ca tadā sarva eva mahaujasaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:859: 05,010.015c taṃ tejasā prajvalitaṃ pratapantaṃ diśo daśa
GE07mbh_05_u:860: 05,010.016a grasantam iva lokāṃs trīn sūryācandramasau yathā
GE07mbh_05_u:861: 05,010.016c dadṛśus tatra te vṛtraṃ śakreṇa saha devatāḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:862: 05,010.017a ṛṣayo 'tha tato 'bhyetya vṛtram ūcuḥ priyaṃ vacaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:863: 05,010.017c vyāptaṃ jagad idaṃ sarvaṃ tejasā tava durjaya
GE07mbh_05_u:864: 05,010.018a na ca śaknoṣi nirjetuṃ vāsavaṃ bhūrivikramam
GE07mbh_05_u:865: 05,010.018c yudhyatoś cāpi vāṃ kālo vyatītaḥ sumahān iha
GE07mbh_05_u:867: 05,010.019c sakhyaṃ bhavatu te vṛtra śakreṇa saha nityadā
GE07mbh_05_u:868: 05,010.019e avāpsyasi sukhaṃ tvaṃ ca śakralokāṃś ca śāśvatān
GE07mbh_05_u:870: 05,010.020c uvāca tāṃs tadā sarvān praṇamya śirasāsuraḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:871: 05,010.021a sarve yūyaṃ mahābhāgā gandharvāś caiva sarvaśaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:872: 05,010.021c yad brūta tac chrutaṃ sarvaṃ mamāpi śṛṇutānaghāḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:873: 05,010.022a saṃdhiḥ kathaṃ vai bhavitā mama śakrasya cobhayoḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:874: 05,010.022c tejasor hi dvayor devāḥ sakhyaṃ vai bhavitā katham
GE07mbh_05_u:885: 05,010.025a indraḥ satāṃ saṃmataś ca nivāsaś ca mahātmanām
GE07mbh_05_u:886: 05,010.025c satyavādī hy adīnaś ca dharmavit suviniścitaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:887: 05,010.026a tena te saha śakreṇa saṃdhir bhavatu śāśvataḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:888: 05,010.026c evaṃ viśvāsam āgaccha mā te bhūd buddhir anyathā
GE07mbh_05_u:892: 05,010.028a bravīmi yad ahaṃ devās tat sarvaṃ kriyatām iha
GE07mbh_05_u:893: 05,010.028c tataḥ sarvaṃ kariṣyāmi yad ūcur māṃ dvijarṣabhāḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:894: 05,010.029a na śuṣkeṇa na cārdreṇa nāśmanā na ca dāruṇā
GE07mbh_05_u:895: 05,010.029c na śastreṇa na vajreṇa na divā na tathā niśi
GE07mbh_05_u:896: 05,010.030a vadhyo bhaveyaṃ viprendrāḥ śakrasya saha daivataiḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:897: 05,010.030c evaṃ me rocate saṃdhiḥ śakreṇa saha nityadā
GE07mbh_05_u:898: 05,010.031a bāḍham ity eva ṛṣayas tam ūcur bharatarṣabha
GE07mbh_05_u:899: 05,010.031c evaṃ kṛte tu saṃdhāne vṛtraḥ pramudito 'bhavat
GE07mbh_05_u:900: 05,010.031d*0085_01 tataḥ saṃdhiṃ mithaḥ kṛtvā ṛṣayo dīptatejasaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:901: 05,010.031d*0085_02 śakrasya saha vṛtreṇa punar jagmur yathāgatam
GE07mbh_05_u:902: 05,010.031d*0086_01 atha dīrghasya kālasya śakraḥ saṃcintya bhārata
GE07mbh_05_u:907: 05,010.032f*0087_02 ṛṣibhis tv īritaṃ yac ca mahendras tad anusmaran
GE07mbh_05_u:908: 05,010.033a sa kadā cit samudrānte tam apaśyan mahāsuram
GE07mbh_05_u:911: 05,010.034c saṃdhyeyaṃ vartate raudrā na rātrir divasaṃ na ca
GE07mbh_05_u:912: 05,010.034d*0088_01 varaś cānena saṃprāpto hy avadhyo daivatair api
GE07mbh_05_u:913: 05,010.034d*0088_02 tat kathaṃ tv iha kartavyam upāyaṃ cintaye sadā
GE07mbh_05_u:915: 05,010.035a yadi vṛtraṃ na hanmy adya vañcayitvā mahāsuram
GE07mbh_05_u:916: 05,010.035c mahābalaṃ mahākāyaṃ na me śreyo bhaviṣyati
GE07mbh_05_u:917: 05,010.036a evaṃ saṃcintayann eva śakro viṣṇum anusmaran
GE07mbh_05_u:919: 05,010.037a nāyaṃ śuṣko na cārdro 'yaṃ na ca śastram idaṃ tathā
GE07mbh_05_u:920: 05,010.037c enaṃ kṣepsyāmi vṛtrasya kṣaṇād eva naśiṣyati
GE07mbh_05_u:921: 05,010.038a savajram atha phenaṃ taṃ kṣipraṃ vṛtre nisṛṣṭavān
GE07mbh_05_u:922: 05,010.038b*0089_01 jagrāha ca sa taṃ phenam indro vṛtranibarhaṇam
GE07mbh_05_u:924: 05,010.038c praviśya phenaṃ taṃ viṣṇur atha vṛtraṃ vyanāśayat
GE07mbh_05_u:925: 05,010.039a nihate tu tato vṛtre diśo vitimirābhavan
GE07mbh_05_u:926: 05,010.039c pravavau ca śivo vāyuḥ prajāś ca jahṛṣus tadā
GE07mbh_05_u:928: 05,010.040c ṛṣayaś ca mahendraṃ tam astuvan vividhaiḥ stavaiḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:935: 05,010.042f*0090_01 mahādevasya bhūtaiś ca sa punar brahmahann iti
GE07mbh_05_u:938: 05,010.043c na prājñāyata devendras tv abhibhūtaḥ svakalmaṣaiḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:944: 05,010.045c devāś cāpi bhṛśaṃ trastās tathā sarve maharṣayaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:946: 05,010.046b*0091_01 rājā vā kriyatām adya mahendro vātha mṛgyatām
GE07mbh_05_u:947: 05,010.046c tato bhītābhavan devāḥ ko no rājā bhaved iti
GE07mbh_05_u:949: 05,010.047c na ca sma kaś cid devānāṃ rājyāya kurute manaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:953: 05,011.001d*0092_01 tejasvī ca yaśasvī ca dhārmikaś caiva nityadā
GE07mbh_05_u:954: 05,011.001e te gatvāthābruvan sarve rājā no bhava pārthiva
GE07mbh_05_u:957: 05,011.002a sa tān uvāca nahuṣo devān ṛṣigaṇāṃs tathā
GE07mbh_05_u:958: 05,011.002c pitṛbhiḥ sahitān rājan parīpsan hitam ātmanaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:959: 05,011.003a durbalo 'haṃ na me śaktir bhavatāṃ paripālane
GE07mbh_05_u:960: 05,011.003c balavāñ jāyate rājā balaṃ śakre hi nityadā
GE07mbh_05_u:961: 05,011.004a tam abruvan punaḥ sarve devāḥ sarṣipurogamāḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:962: 05,011.004c asmākaṃ tapasā yuktaḥ pāhi rājyaṃ triviṣṭape
GE07mbh_05_u:963: 05,011.005a parasparabhayaṃ ghoram asmākaṃ hi na saṃśayaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:967: 05,011.006e teja ādāsyase paśyan balavāṃś ca bhaviṣyasi
GE07mbh_05_u:969: 05,011.007c brahmarṣīṃś cāpi devāṃś ca gopāyasva triviṣṭape
GE07mbh_05_u:970: 05,011.007d*0094_01 abhiṣiktaḥ sa rājendra tato rājā triviṣṭape
GE07mbh_05_u:973: 05,011.008a sudurlabhaṃ varaṃ labdhvā prāpya rājyaṃ triviṣṭape
GE07mbh_05_u:977: 05,011.009e sahye mahendre malaye samudreṣu saritsu ca
GE07mbh_05_u:979: 05,011.010c nahuṣo devarājaḥ san krīḍan bahuvidhaṃ tadā
GE07mbh_05_u:981: 05,011.011c vāditrāṇi ca sarvāṇi gītaṃ ca madhurasvaram
GE07mbh_05_u:983: 05,011.012c ṛtavaḥ ṣaṭ ca devendraṃ mūrtimanta upasthitāḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:985: 05,011.013a evaṃ hi krīḍatas tasya nahuṣasya mahātmanaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:986: 05,011.013c saṃprāptā darśanaṃ devī śakrasya mahiṣī priyā
GE07mbh_05_u:987: 05,011.014a sa tāṃ saṃdṛśya duṣṭātmā prāha sarvān sabhāsadaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:988: 05,011.014c indrasya mahiṣī devī kasmān māṃ nopatiṣṭhati
GE07mbh_05_u:989: 05,011.015a aham indro 'smi devānāṃ lokānāṃ ca tatheśvaraḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:990: 05,011.015c āgacchatu śacī mahyaṃ kṣipram adya niveśanam
GE07mbh_05_u:991: 05,011.016a tac chrutvā durmanā devī bṛhaspatim uvāca ha
GE07mbh_05_u:992: 05,011.016c rakṣa māṃ nahuṣād brahmaṃs tavāsmi śaraṇaṃ gatā
GE07mbh_05_u:996: 05,011.018c uktavān asi māṃ pūrvam ṛtāṃ tāṃ kuru vai giram
GE07mbh_05_u:997: 05,011.019a noktapūrvaṃ ca bhagavan mṛṣā te kiṃ cid īśvara
GE07mbh_05_u:998: 05,011.019c tasmād etad bhavet satyaṃ tvayoktaṃ dvijasattama
GE07mbh_05_u:1000: 05,011.020c yad uktāsi mayā devi satyaṃ tad bhavitā dhruvam
GE07mbh_05_u:1002: 05,011.021c na bhetavyaṃ ca nahuṣāt satyam etad bravīmi te
GE07mbh_05_u:1004: 05,011.022a atha śuśrāva nahuṣa indrāṇīṃ śaraṇaṃ gatām
GE07mbh_05_u:1005: 05,011.022c bṛhaspater aṅgirasaś cukrodha sa nṛpas tadā
GE07mbh_05_u:1007: 05,012.001a kruddhaṃ tu nahuṣaṃ jñātvā devāḥ sarṣipurogamāḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:1009: 05,012.002a devarāja jahi krodhaṃ tvayi kruddhe jagadvibho
GE07mbh_05_u:1011: 05,012.003a jahi krodham imaṃ sādho na krudhyanti bhavadvidhāḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:1012: 05,012.003c parasya patnī sā devī prasīdasva sureśvara
GE07mbh_05_u:1014: 05,012.004c devarājo 'si bhadraṃ te prajā dharmeṇa pālaya
GE07mbh_05_u:1015: 05,012.005a evam ukto na jagrāha tad vacaḥ kāmamohitaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:1016: 05,012.005c atha devān uvācedam indraṃ prati surādhipaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:1018: 05,012.006c jīvato bhartur indreṇa sa vaḥ kiṃ na nivāritaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:1019: 05,012.007a bahūni ca nṛśaṃsāni kṛtānīndreṇa vai purā
GE07mbh_05_u:1020: 05,012.007c vaidharmyāṇy upadhāś caiva sa vaḥ kiṃ na nivāritaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:1021: 05,012.008a upatiṣṭhatu māṃ devī etad asyā hitaṃ param
GE07mbh_05_u:1022: 05,012.008c yuṣmākaṃ ca sadā devāḥ śivam evaṃ bhaviṣyati
GE07mbh_05_u:1025: 05,012.009c jahi krodham imaṃ vīra prīto bhava sureśvara
GE07mbh_05_u:1027: 05,012.010a ity uktvā te tadā devā ṛṣibhiḥ saha bhārata
GE07mbh_05_u:1028: 05,012.010c jagmur bṛhaspatiṃ vaktum indrāṇīṃ cāśubhaṃ vacaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:1029: 05,012.011a jānīmaḥ śaraṇaṃ prāptam indrāṇīṃ tava veśmani
GE07mbh_05_u:1031: 05,012.012a te tvāṃ devāḥ sagandharvā ṛṣayaś ca mahādyute
GE07mbh_05_u:1035: 05,012.014a evam ukte tu sā devī bāṣpam utsṛjya sasvaram
GE07mbh_05_u:1036: 05,012.014c uvāca rudatī dīnā bṛhaspatim idaṃ vacaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:1037: 05,012.015a nāham icchāmi nahuṣaṃ patim anvāsya taṃ prabhum
GE07mbh_05_u:1038: 05,012.015c śaraṇāgatāsmi te brahmaṃs trāhi māṃ mahato bhayāt
GE07mbh_05_u:1039: 05,012.015d*0096_01 evam uktas tayā devyā vākyam āha bṛhaspatiḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:1041: 05,012.016a śaraṇāgatāṃ na tyajeyam indrāṇi mama niścitam
GE07mbh_05_u:1042: 05,012.016c dharmajñāṃ dharmaśīlāṃ ca na tyaje tvām anindite
GE07mbh_05_u:1043: 05,012.017a nākāryaṃ kartum icchāmi brāhmaṇaḥ san viśeṣataḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:1045: 05,012.018a nāham etat kariṣyāmi gacchadhvaṃ vai surottamāḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:1046: 05,012.018c asmiṃś cārthe purā gītaṃ brahmaṇā śrūyatām idam
GE07mbh_05_u:1059: 05,012.022a etad evaṃ vijānan vai na dāsyāmi śacīm imām
GE07mbh_05_u:1060: 05,012.022c indrāṇīṃ viśrutāṃ loke śakrasya mahiṣīṃ priyām
GE07mbh_05_u:1061: 05,012.023a asyā hitaṃ bhaved yac ca mama cāpi hitaṃ bhavet
GE07mbh_05_u:1062: 05,012.023c kriyatāṃ tat suraśreṣṭhā na hi dāsyāmy ahaṃ śacīm
GE07mbh_05_u:1064: 05,012.024a atha devās tam evāhur gurum aṅgirasāṃ varam
GE07mbh_05_u:1065: 05,012.024c kathaṃ sunītaṃ tu bhaven mantrayasva bṛhaspate
GE07mbh_05_u:1067: 05,012.025a nahuṣaṃ yācatāṃ devī kiṃ cit kālāntaraṃ śubhā
GE07mbh_05_u:1072: 05,012.027a tatas tena tathokte tu prītā devās tam abruvan
GE07mbh_05_u:1073: 05,012.027c brahman sādhv idam uktaṃ te hitaṃ sarvadivaukasām
GE07mbh_05_u:1074: 05,012.027e evam etad dvijaśreṣṭha devī ceyaṃ prasādyatām
GE07mbh_05_u:1077: 05,012.029a tvayā jagad idaṃ sarvaṃ dhṛtaṃ sthāvarajaṅgamam
GE07mbh_05_u:1078: 05,012.029c ekapatny asi satyā ca gacchasva nahuṣaṃ prati

GE07mbh_05_u:3590: 05,035.019d*0204_01 na kalmāṣo na kapilo na kṛṣṇo na ca lohitaḥ

GE07mbh_05_u:3619: 05,035.023d*0209_02 dharmād bhraśyati rājaṃs tu nāsya loko 'sti na prajāḥ

GE07mbh_05_u:3621: 05,035.023d*0209_04 ye dharmam anupaśyantas tūṣṇīṃ dhyāyanta āsate
GE07mbh_05_u:3622: 05,035.023d*0209_05 śreṣṭho 'rdhaṃ tu haret tatra bhavet pādaś ca kartari

GE07mbh_05_u:3630: 05,035.024a yāṃ rātrim adhivinnā strī yāṃ caivākṣaparājitaḥ

GE07mbh_05_u:3635: 05,035.025d*0210_02 sarvasvena ca yo hīno durvivaktā tu tāṃ vaset
GE07mbh_05_u:3636: 05,035.026a pañca paśvanṛte hanti daśa hanti gavānṛte
GE07mbh_05_u:3638: 05,035.027a hanti jātān ajātāṃś ca hiraṇyārthe 'nṛtaṃ vadan

GE07mbh_05_u:3641: 05,035.028a mattaḥ śreyān aṅgirā vai sudhanvā tvad virocana
GE07mbh_05_u:3642: 05,035.028c mātāsya śreyasī mātus tasmāt tvaṃ tena vai jitaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:3644: 05,035.029c sudhanvan punar icchāmi tvayā dattaṃ virocanam
GE07mbh_05_u:3646: 05,035.030a yad dharmam avṛṇīthās tvaṃ na kāmād anṛtaṃ vadīḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:3647: 05,035.030c punar dadāmi te tasmāt putraṃ prahrāda durlabham

GE07mbh_05_u:3655: 05,035.034a yathā yathā hi puruṣaḥ kalyāṇe kurute manaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:3656: 05,035.034c tathā tathāsya sarvārthāḥ sidhyante nātra saṃśayaḥ

GE07mbh_05_u:3667: 05,035.037c ariṃ ca mitraṃ ca kuśīlavaṃ ca;

GE07mbh_05_u:3675: 05,035.040a bhrūṇahā gurutalpī ca yaś ca syāt pānapo dvijaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:3676: 05,035.040c atitīkṣṇaś ca kākaś ca nāstiko vedanindakaḥ

GE07mbh_05_u:3683: 05,035.043a jarā rūpaṃ harati hi dhairyam āśā;
GE07mbh_05_u:3688: 05,035.043d*0211_02 krūrasya na strī sukhino na vidyā
GE07mbh_05_u:3692: 05,035.044c dākṣyāt tu kurute mūlaṃ saṃyamāt pratitiṣṭhati
GE07mbh_05_u:3694: prajñā ca kaulyaṃ ca damaḥ śrutaṃ ca
GE07mbh_05_u:3713: 05,035.049a na sā sabhā yatra na santi vṛddhā;
GE07mbh_05_u:3714: na te vṛddhā ye na vadanti dharmam
GE07mbh_05_u:3715: 05,035.049c nāsau dharmo yatra na satyam asti;
GE07mbh_05_u:3717: 05,035.050a satyaṃ rūpaṃ śrutaṃ vidyā kaulyaṃ śīlaṃ balaṃ dhanam
GE07mbh_05_u:3718: 05,035.050c śauryaṃ ca citrabhāṣyaṃ ca daśa saṃsargayonayaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:3719: 05,035.050d*0214_01 atha yo naiva vibrūyān na satyaṃ nānṛtaṃ vadet
GE07mbh_05_u:3720: 05,035.050d*0214_02 ye dharmam abhyasūyantas tūṣṇīṃ dhyāyanta āsate
GE07mbh_05_u:3721: 05,035.050d*0214_03 śreṣṭhaḥ pādaṃ haret tatra bhavet pādaś ca kartari
GE07mbh_05_u:3722: 05,035.050d*0214_04 pādas teṣu sabhāsatsu yatra nindyo na nindyate

GE07mbh_05_u:3725: 05,035.051a pāpaṃ kurvan pāpakīrtiḥ pāpam evāśnute phalam
GE07mbh_05_u:3726: 05,035.051c puṇyaṃ kurvan puṇyakīrtiḥ puṇyam evāśnute phalam

GE07mbh_05_u:3728: 05,035.052a pāpaṃ prajñāṃ nāśayati kriyamāṇaṃ punaḥ punaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:3729: 05,035.052c naṣṭaprajñaḥ pāpam eva nityam ārabhate naraḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:3730: 05,035.053a puṇyaṃ prajñāṃ vardhayati kriyamāṇaṃ punaḥ punaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:3731: 05,035.053c vṛddhaprajñaḥ puṇyam eva nityam ārabhate naraḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:3732: 05,035.053d*0216_01 puṇyaṃ kurvan puṇyakīrtiḥ puṇyaṃ sthānaṃ sma gacchati
GE07mbh_05_u:3735: 05,035.054c sa kṛcchraṃ mahad āpnoti nacirāt pāpam ācaran
GE07mbh_05_u:3737: 05,035.055b*0218_01 pūjāṃ ca mahatīṃ prāpya sa sarvatra virocate
GE07mbh_05_u:3738: 05,035.055c akṛcchrāt sukham āpnoti sarvatra ca virājate
GE07mbh_05_u:3739: 05,035.056a prajñām evāgamayati yaḥ prājñebhyaḥ sa paṇḍitaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:3740: 05,035.056c prājño hy avāpya dharmārthau śaknoti sukham edhitum
GE07mbh_05_u:3741: 05,035.057a divasenaiva tat kuryād yena rātrau sukhaṃ vaset
GE07mbh_05_u:3742: 05,035.057c aṣṭamāsena tat kuryād yena varṣāḥ sukhaṃ vaset
GE07mbh_05_u:3743: 05,035.058a pūrve vayasi tat kuryād yena vṛddhaḥ sukhaṃ vaset
GE07mbh_05_u:3744: 05,035.058c yāvajjīvena tat kuryād yena pretya sukhaṃ vaset
GE07mbh_05_u:3745: 05,035.059a jīrṇam annaṃ praśaṃsanti bhāryāṃ ca gatayauvanām
GE07mbh_05_u:3749: 05,035.061a gurur ātmavatāṃ śāstā śāstā rājā durātmanām
GE07mbh_05_u:3751: 05,035.062a ṛṣīṇāṃ ca nadīnāṃ ca kulānāṃ ca mahātmanām
GE07mbh_05_u:3754: 05,035.063c kṣatriyaḥ svargabhāg rājaṃś ciraṃ pālayate mahīm
GE07mbh_05_u:3756: 05,035.064c śūraś ca kṛtavidyaś ca yaś ca jānāti sevitum
GE07mbh_05_u:3759: 05,035.066a duryodhane ca śakunau mūḍhe duḥśāsane tathā
GE07mbh_05_u:3760: 05,035.066c karṇe caiśvaryam ādhāya kathaṃ tvaṃ bhūtim icchasi
GE07mbh_05_u:3761: 05,035.067a sarvair guṇair upetāś ca pāṇḍavā bharatarṣabha
GE07mbh_05_u:3762: 05,035.067c pitṛvat tvayi vartante teṣu vartasva putravat
GE07mbh_05_u:3765: 05,036.001c ātreyasya ca saṃvādaṃ sādhyānāṃ ceti naḥ śrutam
GE07mbh_05_u:3767: 05,036.002c sādhyā devā mahāprājñaṃ paryapṛcchanta vai purā
GE07mbh_05_u:3770: 05,036.003c śrutena dhīro buddhimāṃs tvaṃ mato naḥ;
GE07mbh_05_u:3778: 05,036.005b*0219_01 punāti hy ātmanātmānaṃ sukṛtaṃ cāsya vindati
GE07mbh_05_u:3800: 05,036.011a vādaṃ tu yo na pravaden na vādayed;
GE07mbh_05_u:3809: 05,036.013c yādṛg icchec ca bhavituṃ tādṛg bhavati pūruṣaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:3810: 05,036.014a yato yato nivartate tatas tato vimucyate
GE07mbh_05_u:3811: 05,036.014c nivartanād dhi sarvato na vetti duḥkham aṇv api
GE07mbh_05_u:3816: 05,036.016a bhāvam icchati sarvasya nābhāve kurute matim
GE07mbh_05_u:3817: 05,036.016c satyavādī mṛdur dānto yaḥ sa uttamapūruṣaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:3822: 05,036.018c na kasya cin mitram atho durātmā;
GE07mbh_05_u:3826: 05,036.020a uttamān eva seveta prāpte kāle tu madhyamān
GE07mbh_05_u:3827: 05,036.020c adhamāṃs tu na seveta ya icchec chreya ātmanaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:3830: 05,036.021c na tv eva samyag labhate praśaṃsāṃ;
GE07mbh_05_u:3842: 05,036.024a yeṣāṃ na vṛttaṃ vyathate na yonir;
GE07mbh_05_u:3853: 05,036.028c kulasaṃkhyāṃ na gacchanti yāni hīnāni vṛttataḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:3854: 05,036.029a vṛttatas tv avihīnāni kulāny alpadhanāny api
GE07mbh_05_u:3855: 05,036.029c kulasaṃkhyāṃ tu gacchanti karṣanti ca mahad yaśaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:3856: 05,036.029d*0220_01 vṛttaṃ yatnena saṃrakṣed vittam eti ca yāti ca
GE07mbh_05_u:3857: 05,036.029d*0220_02 akṣīṇo vittataḥ kṣīṇo vṛttatas tu hato hataḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:3858: 05,036.029d*0220_03 gobhiḥ paśubhir aśvaiś ca kṛṣyā ca susamṛddhayā
GE07mbh_05_u:3859: 05,036.029d*0220_04 kulāni na prarohanti yāni hīnāni vṛttataḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:3860: 05,036.030a mā naḥ kule vairakṛt kaś cid astu;
GE07mbh_05_u:3864: 05,036.031a yaś ca no brāhmaṇaṃ hanyād yaś ca no brāhmaṇān dviṣet
GE07mbh_05_u:3865: 05,036.031c na naḥ sa samitiṃ gacched yaś ca no nirvapet kṛṣim
GE07mbh_05_u:3866: 05,036.032a tṛṇāni bhūmir udakaṃ vāk caturthī ca sūnṛtā
GE07mbh_05_u:3867: 05,036.032c satām etāni geheṣu nocchidyante kadā cana
GE07mbh_05_u:3874: 05,036.035a na tan mitraṃ yasya kopād bibheti;
GE07mbh_05_u:3878: 05,036.036a yadi ced apy asaṃbandho mitrabhāvena vartate
GE07mbh_05_u:3879: 05,036.036c sa eva bandhus tan mitraṃ sā gatis tatparāyaṇam
GE07mbh_05_u:3883: 05,036.038c arthāḥ samativartante haṃsāḥ śuṣkaṃ saro yathā
GE07mbh_05_u:3885: 05,036.039c śīlam etad asādhūnām abhraṃ pāriplavaṃ yathā
GE07mbh_05_u:3886: 05,036.040a satkṛtāś ca kṛtārthāś ca mitrāṇāṃ na bhavanti ye
GE07mbh_05_u:3887: 05,036.040c tān mṛtān api kravyādāḥ kṛtaghnān nopabhuñjate
GE07mbh_05_u:3888: 05,036.041a arthayed eva mitrāṇi sati vāsati vā dhane
GE07mbh_05_u:3890: 05,036.042a saṃtāpād bhraśyate rūpaṃ saṃtāpād bhraśyate balam
GE07mbh_05_u:3891: 05,036.042c saṃtāpād bhraśyate jñānaṃ saṃtāpād vyādhim ṛcchati
GE07mbh_05_u:3893: 05,036.043c amitrāś ca prahṛṣyanti mā sma śoke manaḥ kṛthāḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:3898: 05,036.045a sukhaṃ ca duḥkhaṃ ca bhavābhavau ca;
GE07mbh_05_u:3901: tasmād dhīro naiva hṛṣyen na śocet
GE07mbh_05_u:3903: teṣāṃ yad yad vartate yatra yatra
GE07mbh_05_u:3907: 05,036.047a tanur ucchaḥ śikhī rājā mithyopacarito mayā
GE07mbh_05_u:3909: 05,036.048a nityodvignam idaṃ sarvaṃ nityodvignam idaṃ manaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:3910: 05,036.048c yat tat padam anudvignaṃ tan me vada mahāmate
GE07mbh_05_u:3914: 05,036.050a buddhyā bhayaṃ praṇudati tapasā vindate mahat
GE07mbh_05_u:3919: 05,036.052c tapasaś ca sutaptasya tasyānte sukham edhate
GE07mbh_05_u:3921: na vai bhinnā jātu nidrāṃ labhante
GE07mbh_05_u:3924: 05,036.054a na vai bhinnā jātu caranti dharmaṃ;
GE07mbh_05_u:3928: 05,036.055a na vai teṣāṃ svadate pathyam uktaṃ;
GE07mbh_05_u:3931: na vidyate kiṃ cid anyad vināśāt
GE07mbh_05_u:3932: 05,036.056a saṃbhāvyaṃ goṣu saṃpannaṃ saṃbhāvyaṃ brāhmaṇe tapaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:3933: 05,036.056c saṃbhāvyaṃ strīṣu cāpalyaṃ saṃbhāvyaṃ jñātito bhayam
GE07mbh_05_u:3934: 05,036.057a tantavo 'py āyatā nityaṃ tantavo bahulāḥ samāḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:3935: 05,036.057c bahūn bahutvād āyāsān sahantīty upamā satām
GE07mbh_05_u:3938: 05,036.059a brāhmaṇeṣu ca ye śūrāḥ strīṣu jñātiṣu goṣu ca
GE07mbh_05_u:3939: 05,036.059c vṛntād iva phalaṃ pakvaṃ dhṛtarāṣṭra patanti te
GE07mbh_05_u:3940: 05,036.060a mahān apy ekajo vṛkṣo balavān supratiṣṭhitaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:3942: 05,036.061a atha ye sahitā vṛkṣāḥ saṃghaśaḥ supratiṣṭhitāḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:3944: 05,036.062a evaṃ manuṣyam apy ekaṃ guṇair api samanvitam
GE07mbh_05_u:3945: 05,036.062c śakyaṃ dviṣanto manyante vāyur drumam ivaikajam
GE07mbh_05_u:3948: 05,036.064a avadhyā brāhmaṇā gāvaḥ striyo bālāś ca jñātayaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:3949: 05,036.064c yeṣāṃ cānnāni bhuñjīta ye ca syuḥ śaraṇāgatāḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:3950: 05,036.064d*0221_01 mahaty apy aparādhe 'pi teṣāṃ daṇḍo visarjanam
GE07mbh_05_u:3951: 05,036.065a na manuṣye guṇaḥ kaś cid anyo dhanavatām api
GE07mbh_05_u:3952: 05,036.065c anāturatvād bhadraṃ te mṛtakalpā hi rogiṇaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:3955: 05,036.066c satāṃ peyaṃ yan na pibanty asanto;
GE07mbh_05_u:3961: 05,036.068a purā hy ukto nākaros tvaṃ vaco me;
GE07mbh_05_u:3965: 05,036.069a na tad balaṃ yan mṛdunā virudhyate;
GE07mbh_05_u:3970: pāṇḍoḥ sutās tava putrāṃś ca pāntu
GE07mbh_05_u:3984: 05,037.002a tān evendrasya hi dhanur anāmyaṃ namato 'bravīt
GE07mbh_05_u:3985: 05,037.002c atho marīcinaḥ pādān anāmyān namatas tathā
GE07mbh_05_u:3986: 05,037.003a yaś cāśiṣyaṃ śāsati yaś ca kupyate;
GE07mbh_05_u:3988: 05,037.003c striyaś ca yo 'rakṣati bhadram astu te;
GE07mbh_05_u:3989: yaś cāyācyaṃ yācati yaś ca katthate
GE07mbh_05_u:3994: 05,037.005a vadhvā hāsaṃ śvaśuro yaś ca manyate;
GE07mbh_05_u:3998: 05,037.006a yaś caiva labdhvā na smarāmīty uvāca;
GE07mbh_05_u:4006: 05,037.007d*0222_01 jarā rūpaṃ harati hi dhairyam āśā
GE07mbh_05_u:4011: 05,037.008a śatāyur uktaḥ puruṣaḥ sarvavedeṣu vai yadā
GE07mbh_05_u:4012: 05,037.008c nāpnoty atha ca tat sarvam āyuḥ keneha hetunā
GE07mbh_05_u:4015: 05,037.009c krodhaś cātivivitsā ca mitradrohaś ca tāni ṣaṭ
GE07mbh_05_u:4016: 05,037.010a eta evāsayas tīkṣṇāḥ kṛntanty āyūṃṣi dehinām
GE07mbh_05_u:4017: 05,037.010c etāni mānavān ghnanti na mṛtyur bhadram astu te
GE07mbh_05_u:4018: 05,037.011a viśvastasyaiti yo dārān yaś cāpi gurutalpagaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:4019: 05,037.011c vṛṣalīpatir dvijo yaś ca pānapaś caiva bhārata
GE07mbh_05_u:4020: 05,037.011d*0223_01 ādeśakṛd vṛttihantā dvijānāṃ preṣakaś ca yaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:4022: 05,037.012c etaiḥ sametya kartavyaṃ prāyaścittam iti śrutiḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:4028: 05,037.014c apriyasya tu pathyasya vaktā śrotā ca durlabhaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:4029: 05,037.015a yo hi dharmaṃ vyapāśritya hitvā bhartuḥ priyāpriye
GE07mbh_05_u:4030: 05,037.015c apriyāṇy āha pathyāni tena rājā sahāyavān
GE07mbh_05_u:4031: 05,037.016a tyajet kulārthe puruṣaṃ grāmasyārthe kulaṃ tyajet
GE07mbh_05_u:4033: 05,037.017a āpadarthaṃ dhanaṃ rakṣed dārān rakṣed dhanair api
GE07mbh_05_u:4034: 05,037.017c ātmānaṃ satataṃ rakṣed dārair api dhanair api

GE07mbh_05_u:4062: 05,037.023d*0225_02 sadyorogī vivādī ca saptaitān sevakāṃs tyajet
GE07mbh_05_u:4085: 05,037.029c sparśaś ca gandhaś ca viśuddhatā ca;
GE07mbh_05_u:4088: ārogyam āyuś ca sukhaṃ balaṃ ca
GE07mbh_05_u:4109: 05,037.036a hitaṃ yat sarvabhūtānām ātmanaś ca sukhāvaham
GE07mbh_05_u:4110: 05,037.036c tat kuryād īśvaro hy etan mūlaṃ dharmārthasiddhaye
GE07mbh_05_u:4111: 05,037.037a buddhiḥ prabhāvas tejaś ca sattvam utthānam eva ca
GE07mbh_05_u:4112: 05,037.037c vyavasāyaś ca yasya syāt tasyāvṛttibhayaṃ kutaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:4121: 05,037.040a tava putraśataṃ caiva karṇaḥ pañca ca pāṇḍavāḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:4123: 05,037.041a dhārtarāṣṭrā vanaṃ rājan vyāghrāḥ pāṇḍusutā matāḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:4124: 05,037.041c mā vanaṃ chindhi savyāghraṃ mā vyāghrān nīnaśo vanāt
GE07mbh_05_u:4125: 05,037.042a na syād vanam ṛte vyāghrān vyāghrā na syur ṛte vanam
GE07mbh_05_u:4126: 05,037.042c vanaṃ hi rakṣyate vyāghrair vyāghrān rakṣati kānanam
GE07mbh_05_u:4127: 05,037.043a na tathecchanty akalyāṇāḥ pareṣāṃ vedituṃ guṇān
GE07mbh_05_u:4129: 05,037.044a arthasiddhiṃ parām icchan dharmam evāditaś caret
GE07mbh_05_u:4130: 05,037.044c na hi dharmād apaity arthaḥ svargalokād ivāmṛtam
GE07mbh_05_u:4131: 05,037.045a yasyātmā virataḥ pāpāt kalyāṇe ca niveśitaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:4132: 05,037.045c tena sarvam idaṃ buddhaṃ prakṛtir vikṛtiś ca yā
GE07mbh_05_u:4133: 05,037.046a yo dharmam arthaṃ kāmaṃ ca yathākālaṃ niṣevate
GE07mbh_05_u:4136: 05,037.047c sa śriyo bhājanaṃ rājan yaś cāpatsu na muhyati
GE07mbh_05_u:4137: 05,037.048a balaṃ pañcavidhaṃ nityaṃ puruṣāṇāṃ nibodha me
GE07mbh_05_u:4138: 05,037.048c yat tu bāhubalaṃ nāma kaniṣṭhaṃ balam ucyate
GE07mbh_05_u:4139: 05,037.049a amātyalābho bhadraṃ te dvitīyaṃ balam ucyate
GE07mbh_05_u:4140: 05,037.049c dhanalābhas tṛtīyaṃ tu balam āhur jigīṣavaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:4141: 05,037.050a yat tv asya sahajaṃ rājan pitṛpaitāmahaṃ balam
GE07mbh_05_u:4142: 05,037.050c abhijātabalaṃ nāma tac caturthaṃ balaṃ smṛtam
GE07mbh_05_u:4143: 05,037.051a yena tv etāni sarvāṇi saṃgṛhītāni bhārata
GE07mbh_05_u:4144: 05,037.051c yad balānāṃ balaṃ śreṣṭhaṃ tat prajñābalam ucyate
GE07mbh_05_u:4148: 05,037.053c bhoge cāyuṣi viśvāsaṃ kaḥ prājñaḥ kartum arhati
GE07mbh_05_u:4153: 05,037.055a sarpaś cāgniś ca siṃhaś ca kulaputraś ca bhārata
GE07mbh_05_u:4154: 05,037.055c nāvajñeyā manuṣyeṇa sarve te hy atitejasaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:4155: 05,037.056a agnis tejo mahal loke gūḍhas tiṣṭhati dāruṣu
GE07mbh_05_u:4156: 05,037.056c na copayuṅkte tad dāru yāvan no dīpyate paraiḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:4157: 05,037.057a sa eva khalu dārubhyo yadā nirmathya dīpyate
GE07mbh_05_u:4158: 05,037.057c tadā tac ca vanaṃ cānyan nirdahaty āśu tejasā
GE07mbh_05_u:4161: 05,037.059a latādharmā tvaṃ saputraḥ śālāḥ pāṇḍusutā matāḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:4162: 05,037.059c na latā vardhate jātu mahādrumam anāśritā
GE07mbh_05_u:4168: 05,038.001a ūrdhvaṃ prāṇā hy utkrāmanti yūnaḥ sthavira āyati
GE07mbh_05_u:4183: dadhi kṣīraṃ madhu tailaṃ ghṛtaṃ ca
GE07mbh_05_u:4195: 05,038.008c dīrghau buddhimato bāhū yābhyāṃ hiṃsati hiṃsitaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:4197: 05,038.009c viśvāsād bhayam utpannaṃ mūlāny api nikṛntati
GE07mbh_05_u:4199: 05,038.010c ślakṣṇo madhuravāk strīṇāṃ na cāsāṃ vaśago bhavet
GE07mbh_05_u:4201: 05,038.011c striyaḥ śriyo gṛhasyoktās tasmād rakṣyā viśeṣataḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:4202: 05,038.012a pitur antaḥpuraṃ dadyān mātur dadyān mahānasam
GE07mbh_05_u:4203: 05,038.012c goṣu cātmasamaṃ dadyāt svayam eva kṛṣiṃ vrajet
GE07mbh_05_u:4204: 05,038.012e bhṛtyair vaṇijyācāraṃ ca putraiḥ seveta brāhmaṇān
GE07mbh_05_u:4205: 05,038.013a adbhyo 'gnir brahmataḥ kṣatram aśmano loham utthitam
GE07mbh_05_u:4206: 05,038.013c teṣāṃ sarvatragaṃ tejaḥ svāsu yoniṣu śāmyati
GE07mbh_05_u:4209: 05,038.015a yasya mantraṃ na jānanti bāhyāś cābhyantarāś ca ye
GE07mbh_05_u:4210: 05,038.015c sa rājā sarvataścakṣuś ciram aiśvaryam aśnute
GE07mbh_05_u:4211: 05,038.016a kariṣyan na prabhāṣeta kṛtāny eva ca darśayet
GE07mbh_05_u:4214: 05,038.017c araṇye niḥśalāke vā tatra mantro vidhīyate
GE07mbh_05_u:4216: 05,038.018c apaṇḍito vāpi suhṛt paṇḍito vāpy anātmavān
GE07mbh_05_u:4218: 05,038.018e amātye hy arthalipsā ca mantrarakṣaṇam eva ca
GE07mbh_05_u:4219: 05,038.019a kṛtāni sarvakāryāṇi yasya vā pārṣadā viduḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:4220: 05,038.019b*0227_01 dharme cārthe ca kāme ca sa rājā rājasattamaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:4223: 05,038.020c sa teṣāṃ viparibhraṃśe bhraśyate jīvitād api
GE07mbh_05_u:4226: 05,038.021d*0228_01 anadhītya yathā vedān na vipraḥ śrāddham arhati
GE07mbh_05_u:4227: 05,038.021d*0228_02 evam aśrutaṣāḍguṇyo na mantraṃ śrotum arhati
GE07mbh_05_u:4233: 05,038.024c bhṛtyebhyo visṛjed arthān naikaḥ sarvaharo bhavet
GE07mbh_05_u:4234: 05,038.025a brāhmaṇo brāhmaṇaṃ veda bhartā veda striyaṃ tathā
GE07mbh_05_u:4235: 05,038.025c amātyaṃ nṛpatir veda rājā rājānam eva ca
GE07mbh_05_u:4236: 05,038.026a na śatrur aṅkam āpanno moktavyo vadhyatāṃ gataḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:4237: 05,038.026b*0229_01 nyag bhūtvā paryupāsīta vadhyaṃ hanyād bale sati
GE07mbh_05_u:4238: 05,038.026b*0230_01 ahanyamāno bhayakṛn na hatāj jāyate bhayam
GE07mbh_05_u:4239: 05,038.026c ahatād dhi bhayaṃ tasmāj jāyate nacirād iva
GE07mbh_05_u:4240: 05,038.027a daivateṣu ca yatnena rājasu brāhmaṇeṣu ca
GE07mbh_05_u:4243: 05,038.028c kīrtiṃ ca labhate loke na cānarthena yujyate
GE07mbh_05_u:4244: 05,038.029a prasādo niṣphalo yasya krodhaś cāpi nirarthakaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:4245: 05,038.029c na taṃ bhartāram icchanti ṣaṇḍhaṃ patim iva striyaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:4246: 05,038.030a na buddhir dhanalābhāya na jāḍyam asamṛddhaye
GE07mbh_05_u:4251: 05,038.032c anarthāḥ kṣipram āyānti vāgduṣṭaṃ krodhanaṃ tathā
GE07mbh_05_u:4253: 05,038.033c āvartayanti bhūtāni samyak praṇihitā ca vāk
GE07mbh_05_u:4256: 05,038.035a dhṛtiḥ śamo damaḥ śaucaṃ kāruṇyaṃ vāg aniṣṭhurā
GE07mbh_05_u:4260: 05,038.037a na sa rātrau sukhaṃ śete sasarpa iva veśmani
GE07mbh_05_u:4262: 05,038.038a yeṣu duṣṭeṣu doṣaḥ syād yogakṣemasya bhārata
GE07mbh_05_u:4265: 05,038.039c ye cānāryasamāsaktāḥ sarve te saṃśayaṃ gatāḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:4266: 05,038.040a yatra strī yatra kitavo yatra bālo 'nuśāsti ca
GE07mbh_05_u:4267: 05,038.040c majjanti te 'vaśā deśā nadyām aśmaplavā iva
GE07mbh_05_u:4268: 05,038.041a prayojaneṣu ye saktā na viśeṣeṣu bhārata
GE07mbh_05_u:4269: 05,038.041c tān ahaṃ paṇḍitān manye viśeṣā hi prasaṅginaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:4270: 05,038.042a yaṃ praśaṃsanti kitavā yaṃ praśaṃsanti cāraṇāḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:4271: 05,038.042c yaṃ praśaṃsanti bandhakyo na sa jīvati mānavaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:4274: 05,038.044a taṃ drakṣyasi paribhraṣṭaṃ tasmāt tvaṃ nacirād iva
GE07mbh_05_u:4285: 05,039.003c mantraṃ mūlabalenānyo yaḥ priyaḥ priya eva saḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:4286: 05,039.004a dveṣyo na sādhur bhavati na medhāvī na paṇḍitaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:4287: 05,039.004c priye śubhāni karmāṇi dveṣye pāpāni bhārata
GE07mbh_05_u:4292: 05,039.004d*0231_05 na vṛddhir bahumantavyā yā vṛddhiḥ kṣayam āvahet
GE07mbh_05_u:4293: 05,039.004d*0231_06 kṣayo 'pi bahumantavyo yaḥ kṣayo vṛddhim āvahet
GE07mbh_05_u:4294: 05,039.005a na sa kṣayo mahārāja yaḥ kṣayo vṛddhim āvahet
GE07mbh_05_u:4295: 05,039.005c kṣayaḥ sa tv iha mantavyo yaṃ labdhvā bahu nāśayet
GE07mbh_05_u:4296: 05,039.006a samṛddhā guṇataḥ ke cid bhavanti dhanato 'pare
GE07mbh_05_u:4300: 05,039.007c na cotsahe sutaṃ tyaktuṃ yato dharmas tato jayaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:4306: 05,039.010a sadoṣaṃ darśanaṃ yeṣāṃ saṃvāse sumahad bhayam
GE07mbh_05_u:4307: 05,039.010c arthādāne mahān doṣaḥ pradāne ca mahad bhayam
GE07mbh_05_u:4308: 05,039.010d*0232_01 ye vai bhedanaśīlās tu sakāmā nistrapāḥ śaṭhāḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:4309: 05,039.011a ye pāpā iti vikhyātāḥ saṃvāse parigarhitāḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:4310: 05,039.011c yuktāś cānyair mahādoṣair ye narās tān vivarjayet
GE07mbh_05_u:4312: 05,039.012c yā caiva phalanirvṛttiḥ sauhṛde caiva yat sukham
GE07mbh_05_u:4314: 05,039.013c alpe 'py apakṛte mohān na śāntim upagacchati
GE07mbh_05_u:4316: 05,039.014c niśāmya nipuṇaṃ buddhyā vidvān dūrād vivarjayet
GE07mbh_05_u:4317: 05,039.015a yo jñātim anugṛhṇāti daridraṃ dīnam āturam
GE07mbh_05_u:4318: 05,039.015c sa putrapaśubhir vṛddhiṃ yaśaś cāvyayam aśnute
GE07mbh_05_u:4319: 05,039.016a jñātayo vardhanīyās tair ya icchanty ātmanaḥ śubham
GE07mbh_05_u:4320: 05,039.016c kulavṛddhiṃ ca rājendra tasmāt sādhu samācara
GE07mbh_05_u:4322: 05,039.017c viguṇā hy api saṃrakṣyā jñātayo bharatarṣabha
GE07mbh_05_u:4324: 05,039.018c prasādaṃ kuru dīnānāṃ pāṇḍavānāṃ viśāṃ pate
GE07mbh_05_u:4325: 05,039.019a dīyantāṃ grāmakāḥ ke cit teṣāṃ vṛttyartham īśvara
GE07mbh_05_u:4327: 05,039.020a vṛddhena hi tvayā kāryaṃ putrāṇāṃ tāta rakṣaṇam
GE07mbh_05_u:4328: 05,039.020c mayā cāpi hitaṃ vācyaṃ viddhi māṃ tvaddhitaiṣiṇam
GE07mbh_05_u:4329: 05,039.021a jñātibhir vigrahas tāta na kartavyo bhavārthinā
GE07mbh_05_u:4332: 05,039.022c jñātibhiḥ saha kāryāṇi na virodhaḥ kathaṃ cana
GE07mbh_05_u:4335: 05,039.024a suvṛtto bhava rājendra pāṇḍavān prati mānada
GE07mbh_05_u:4336: 05,039.024c adharṣaṇīyaḥ śatrūṇāṃ tair vṛtas tvaṃ bhaviṣyasi
GE07mbh_05_u:4337: 05,039.025a śrīmantaṃ jñātim āsādya yo jñātir avasīdati
GE07mbh_05_u:4338: 05,039.025b*0233_01 sīdatā yat kṛtaṃ tena tat pāpaṃ samam aśnute
GE07mbh_05_u:4339: 05,039.025c digdhahastaṃ mṛga iva sa enas tasya vindati
GE07mbh_05_u:4340: 05,039.026a paścād api naraśreṣṭha tava tāpo bhaviṣyati
GE07mbh_05_u:4341: 05,039.026c tān vā hatān sutān vāpi śrutvā tad anucintaya
GE07mbh_05_u:4343: 05,039.027c ādāv eva na tat kuryād adhruve jīvite sati
GE07mbh_05_u:4344: 05,039.028a na kaś cin nāpanayate pumān anyatra bhārgavāt
GE07mbh_05_u:4346: 05,039.029a duryodhanena yady etat pāpaṃ teṣu purā kṛtam
GE07mbh_05_u:4348: 05,039.030a tāṃs tvaṃ pade pratiṣṭhāpya loke vigatakalmaṣaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:4352: 05,039.031d@001_0001 asamyag upayuktaṃ hi jñānaṃ sukuśalair api
GE07mbh_05_u:4361: 05,039.031d@001_0010 dvārāṇy etāni yo jñātvā saṃvṛṇoti sadā nṛpaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:4363: 05,039.031d@001_0012 na vai śrutam avijñāya vṛddhān anupasevya ca
GE07mbh_05_u:4365: 05,039.031d@001_0014 naṣṭaṃ samudre patitaṃ naṣṭaṃ vākyam aśṛṇvati
GE07mbh_05_u:4366: 05,039.031d@001_0015 anātmani śrutaṃ naṣṭaṃ naṣṭaṃ śrutam anagnikam
GE07mbh_05_u:4367: 05,039.031d@001_0016 matyā parīkṣya medhāvī buddhyā saṃpādya cāsakṛt
GE07mbh_05_u:4368: 05,039.031d@001_0017 śrutvā dṛṣṭvātha vijñāya prājño mantraṃ samācaret
GE07mbh_05_u:4369: 05,039.032a avṛttiṃ vinayo hanti hanty anarthaṃ parākramaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:4370: 05,039.032c hanti nityaṃ kṣamā krodham ācāro hanty alakṣaṇam
GE07mbh_05_u:4377: 05,039.033d*0235_03 duṣkulīnaḥ kulīno vā maryādāṃ yo na laṅghayet
GE07mbh_05_u:4378: 05,039.033d*0235_04 dharmāpekṣī mṛdur hrīmān sa kulīnaśatād varaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:4380: 05,039.034a yayoś cittena vā cittaṃ naibhṛtaṃ naibhṛtena vā
GE07mbh_05_u:4381: 05,039.034c sameti prajñayā prajñā tayor maitrī na jīryate
GE07mbh_05_u:4382: 05,039.035a durbuddhim akṛtaprajñaṃ channaṃ kūpaṃ tṛṇair iva
GE07mbh_05_u:4387: 05,039.037c jitendriyaṃ sthitaṃ sthityāṃ mitram atyāgi ceṣyate
GE07mbh_05_u:4389: 05,039.038c atyarthaṃ punar utsargaḥ sādayed daivatāny api
GE07mbh_05_u:4396: 05,039.042a karmaṇā manasā vācā yad abhīkṣṇaṃ niṣevate
GE07mbh_05_u:4397: 05,039.042c tad evāpaharaty enaṃ tasmāt kalyāṇam ācaret
GE07mbh_05_u:4400: 05,039.044a anirvedaḥ śriyo mūlaṃ duḥkhanāśe sukhasya ca
GE07mbh_05_u:4401: 05,039.044c mahān bhavaty anirviṇṇaḥ sukhaṃ cātyantam aśnute
GE07mbh_05_u:4402: 05,039.045a nātaḥ śrīmattaraṃ kiṃ cid anyat pathyatamaṃ tathā
GE07mbh_05_u:4403: 05,039.045c prabhaviṣṇor yathā tāta kṣamā sarvatra sarvadā
GE07mbh_05_u:4405: 05,039.046c arthānarthau samau yasya tasya nityaṃ kṣamā hitā
GE07mbh_05_u:4406: 05,039.047a yat sukhaṃ sevamāno 'pi dharmārthābhyāṃ na hīyate
GE07mbh_05_u:4407: 05,039.047c kāmaṃ tad upaseveta na mūḍhavratam ācaret
GE07mbh_05_u:4409: 05,039.048c na śrīr vasaty adānteṣu ye cotsāhavivarjitāḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:4414: 05,039.050d*0237_01 na cātiguṇavatsv eṣā nātyantaṃ nirguṇeṣu ca
GE07mbh_05_u:4416: 05,039.050d*0237_03 unmattā gaur ivāndhā śrīḥ kva cid evāvatiṣṭhate
GE07mbh_05_u:4420: 05,039.052c na sa tasya phalaṃ pretya bhuṅkte 'rthasya durāgamāt
GE07mbh_05_u:4422: 05,039.053c udyateṣu ca śastreṣu nāsti śeṣavatāṃ bhayam
GE07mbh_05_u:4423: 05,039.054a utthānaṃ saṃyamo dākṣyam apramādo dhṛtiḥ smṛtiḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:4424: 05,039.054c samīkṣya ca samārambho viddhi mūlaṃ bhavasya tat
GE07mbh_05_u:4425: 05,039.055a tapo balaṃ tāpasānāṃ brahma brahmavidāṃ balam

GE07mbh_05_u:5760: 05,048.014c paulomān kālakhañjāṃś ca sahasrāṇi śatāni ca

GE07mbh_05_u:5768: 05,048.018a evam etau mahāvīryau tau paśyata samāgatau
GE07mbh_05_u:5771: 05,048.019c ajeyau mānuṣe loke sendrair api surāsuraiḥ

GE07mbh_05_u:5778: 05,048.022a tasmāt karmaiva kartavyam iti hovāca nāradaḥ

GE07mbh_05_u:5783: 05,048.024c duryodhana tadā tāta smartāsi vacanaṃ mama

GE07mbh_05_u:5801: 05,048.031a rājño hi dhṛtarāṣṭrasya sarvaṃ kāryaṃ priyaṃ mayā
GE07mbh_05_u:5802: 05,048.031c tathā duryodhanasyāpi sa hi rājye samāhitaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:5804: 05,048.032a karṇasya tu vacaḥ śrutvā bhīṣmaḥ śāṃtanavaḥ punaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:5806: 05,048.033a yad ayaṃ katthate nityaṃ hantāhaṃ pāṇḍavān iti
GE07mbh_05_u:5808: 05,048.033d*0321_01 teṣām ekakalāṃ pūrṇāṃ pāṇḍavānāṃ na cārhati
GE07mbh_05_u:5809: 05,048.034a anayo yo 'yam āgantā putrāṇāṃ te durātmanām
GE07mbh_05_u:5810: 05,048.034c tad asya karma jānīhi sūtaputrasya durmateḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:5811: 05,048.035a enam āśritya putras te mandabuddhiḥ suyodhanaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:5813: 05,048.036a kiṃ cāpy anena tat karma kṛtaṃ pūrvaṃ suduṣkaram
GE07mbh_05_u:5814: 05,048.036c tair yathā pāṇḍavaiḥ sarvair ekaikena kṛtaṃ purā
GE07mbh_05_u:5816: 05,048.037c dhanaṃjayena vikramya kim anena tadā kṛtam
GE07mbh_05_u:5817: 05,048.037d*0322_01 sarve hy astravidaḥ śūrāḥ sarve prāptā mahad yaśaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:5818: 05,048.037d*0322_02 api sarvāmaraiśvaryaṃ tyajeyur na punar jayam
GE07mbh_05_u:5819: 05,048.038a sahitān hi kurūn sarvān abhiyāto dhanaṃjayaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:5820: 05,048.038c pramathya cācchinad gāvaḥ kim ayaṃ proṣitas tadā
GE07mbh_05_u:5821: 05,048.039a gandharvair ghoṣayātrāyāṃ hriyate yat sutas tava
GE07mbh_05_u:5822: 05,048.039c kva tadā sūtaputro 'bhūd ya idānīṃ vṛṣāyate
GE07mbh_05_u:5823: 05,048.040a nanu tatrāpi pārthena bhīmena ca mahātmanā
GE07mbh_05_u:5824: 05,048.040c yamābhyām eva cāgamya gandharvās te parājitāḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:5827: 05,048.042a bhīṣmasya tu vacaḥ śrutvā bhāradvājo mahāmanāḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:5829: 05,048.043a yad āha bharataśreṣṭho bhīṣmas tat kriyatāṃ nṛpa
GE07mbh_05_u:5830: 05,048.043c na kāmam arthalipsūnāṃ vacanaṃ kartum arhasi
GE07mbh_05_u:5831: 05,048.044a purā yuddhāt sādhu manye pāṇḍavaiḥ saha saṃgamam
GE07mbh_05_u:5832: 05,048.044b*0323_01 ajeyāḥ pāṇḍavā rājan sendrair api surāsuraiḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:5834: 05,048.045a sarvaṃ tad abhijānāmi kariṣyati ca pāṇḍavaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:5835: 05,048.045c na hy asya triṣu lokeṣu sadṛśo 'sti dhanurdharaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:5836: 05,048.046a anādṛtya tu tad vākyam arthavad droṇabhīṣmayoḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:5837: 05,048.046c tataḥ sa saṃjayaṃ rājā paryapṛcchata pāṇḍavam
GE07mbh_05_u:5839: 05,048.047c bhīṣmadroṇau yadā rājā na samyag anubhāṣate
GE07mbh_05_u:5844: 05,049.002c kasya svid bhrātṛputrāṇāṃ cintāsu mukham īkṣate
GE07mbh_05_u:5845: 05,049.003a ke svid enaṃ vārayanti śāmya yudhyeti vā punaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:5848: 05,049.004a rājño mukham udīkṣante pāñcālāḥ pāṇḍavaiḥ saha
GE07mbh_05_u:5849: 05,049.004c yudhiṣṭhirasya bhadraṃ te sa sarvān anuśāsti ca
GE07mbh_05_u:5856: 05,049.008a brāhmaṇyo rājaputryaś ca viśāṃ duhitaraś ca yāḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:5862: 05,049.010a gāvalgaṇis tu tat pṛṣṭaḥ sabhāyāṃ kurusaṃsadi
GE07mbh_05_u:5863: 05,049.010c niḥśvasya subhṛśaṃ dīrghaṃ muhuḥ saṃcintayann iva
GE07mbh_05_u:5867: 05,049.011e vācaṃ na sṛjate kāṃ cid dhīnaprajño 'lpacetanaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:5870: 05,049.012c tair asya puruṣavyāghrair bhṛśam udvejitaṃ manaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:5876: 05,049.014e śṛṇu yair hi mahārāja pāṇḍavā abhyayuñjata
GE07mbh_05_u:5878: 05,049.015a yo naiva roṣān na bhayān na kāmān nārthakāraṇāt
GE07mbh_05_u:5879: 05,049.015c na hetuvādād dharmātmā satyaṃ jahyāt kathaṃ cana
GE07mbh_05_u:5880: 05,049.016a yaḥ pramāṇaṃ mahārāja dharme dharmabhṛtāṃ varaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:5882: 05,049.017a yasya bāhubale tulyaḥ pṛthivyāṃ nāsti kaś cana
GE07mbh_05_u:5883: 05,049.017c yo vai sarvān mahīpālān vaśe cakre dhanurdharaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:5886: 05,049.018c ya eṣām abhavad dvīpaḥ kuntīputro vṛkodaraḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:5889: 05,049.020a yaś ca tān saṃgatān sarvān pāṇḍavān vāraṇāvate
GE07mbh_05_u:5890: 05,049.020c dahyato mocayām āsa tena vas te 'bhyayuñjata
GE07mbh_05_u:5891: 05,049.021a kṛṣṇāyāś caratā prītiṃ yena krodhavaśā hatāḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:5893: 05,049.022a yasya nāgāyutaṃ vīryaṃ bhujayoḥ sāram arpitam
GE07mbh_05_u:5896: 05,049.023c ajayad yaḥ purā vīro yudhyamānaṃ puraṃdaram
GE07mbh_05_u:5897: 05,049.024a yaḥ sa sākṣān mahādevaṃ giriśaṃ śūlapāṇinam
GE07mbh_05_u:5899: 05,049.025a yaś ca sarvān vaśe cakre lokapālān dhanurdharaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:5901: 05,049.026a yaḥ pratīcīṃ diśaṃ cakre vaśe mlecchagaṇāyutām
GE07mbh_05_u:5902: 05,049.026c sa tatra nakulo yoddhā citrayodhī vyavasthitaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:5905: 05,049.028a yaḥ kāśīn aṅgamagadhān kaliṅgāṃś ca yudhājayat
GE07mbh_05_u:5907: 05,049.029a yasya vīryeṇa sadṛśāś catvāro bhuvi mānavāḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:5908: 05,049.029c aśvatthāmā dhṛṣṭaketuḥ pradyumno rukmir eva ca
GE07mbh_05_u:5911: 05,049.031a tapaś cacāra yā ghoraṃ kāśikanyā purā satī
GE07mbh_05_u:5913: 05,049.032a pāñcālasya sutā jajñe daivāc ca sa punaḥ pumān
GE07mbh_05_u:5914: 05,049.032c strīpuṃsoḥ puruṣavyāghra yaḥ sa veda guṇāguṇān
GE07mbh_05_u:5917: 05,049.034a yāṃ yakṣaḥ puruṣaṃ cakre bhīṣmasya nidhane kila
GE07mbh_05_u:5920: 05,049.035c sumṛṣṭakavacāḥ śūrās taiś ca vas te 'bhyayuñjata
GE07mbh_05_u:5923: 05,049.037a ya āsīc charaṇaṃ kāle pāṇḍavānāṃ mahātmanām
GE07mbh_05_u:5927: 05,049.038a yaḥ sa kāśipatī rājā vārāṇasyāṃ mahārathaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:5928: 05,049.038c sa teṣām abhavad yoddhā tena vas te 'bhyayuñjata
GE07mbh_05_u:5938: 05,049.042a yaḥ saṃśrayaḥ pāṇḍavānāṃ devānām iva vāsavaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:5942: 05,049.044a jārāsaṃdhiḥ sahadevo jayatsenaś ca tāv ubhau
GE07mbh_05_u:5944: 05,049.044c drupadaś ca mahātejā balena mahatā vṛtaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:5946: 05,049.045a ete cānye ca bahavaḥ prācyodīcyā mahīkṣitaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:5949: 05,050.001a sarva ete mahotsāhā ye tvayā parikīrtitāḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:5950: 05,050.001c ekatas tv eva te sarve sametā bhīma ekataḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:5951: 05,050.002a bhīmasenād dhi me bhūyo bhayaṃ saṃjāyate mahat
GE07mbh_05_u:5952: 05,050.002c kruddhād amarṣaṇāt tāta vyāghrād iva mahāruroḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:5953: 05,050.003a jāgarmi rātrayaḥ sarvā dīrgham uṣṇaṃ ca niḥśvasan
GE07mbh_05_u:5954: 05,050.003c bhīto vṛkodarāt tāta siṃhāt paśur ivābalaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:5956: 05,050.004c sainye 'smin pratipaśyāmi ya enaṃ viṣahed yudhi
GE07mbh_05_u:5957: 05,050.005a amarṣaṇaś ca kaunteyo dṛḍhavairaś ca pāṇḍavaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:5965: 05,050.009a yathā rurūṇāṃ yūtheṣu siṃho jātabalaś caret
GE07mbh_05_u:5967: 05,050.010a sarveṣāṃ mama putrāṇāṃ sa ekaḥ krūravikramaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:5968: 05,050.010c bahvāśī vipratīpaś ca bālye 'pi rabhasaḥ sadā
GE07mbh_05_u:5971: 05,050.012a tasya vīryeṇa saṃkliṣṭā nityam eva sutā mama
GE07mbh_05_u:5972: 05,050.012b*0329_01 sa vai bhīmo mahāvīryaḥ kruddhaḥ parapuraṃjayaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:5973: 05,050.012c sa eva hetur bhedasya bhīmo bhīmaparākramaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:5977: 05,050.014b*0330_01 maheśvarasamaṃ krodhe ko hanyād bhīmam āhave
GE07mbh_05_u:5979: 05,050.015a atilābhaṃ tu manye 'haṃ yat tena ripughātinā
GE07mbh_05_u:5980: 05,050.015c tadaiva na hatāḥ sarve mama putrā manasvinā
GE07mbh_05_u:5981: 05,050.016a yena bhīmabalā yakṣā rākṣasāś ca samāhatāḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:5983: 05,050.016c kathaṃ tasya raṇe vegaṃ mānuṣaḥ prasahiṣyati
GE07mbh_05_u:5984: 05,050.017a na sa jātu vaśe tasthau mama bālo 'pi saṃjaya
GE07mbh_05_u:5985: 05,050.017c kiṃ punar mama duṣputraiḥ kliṣṭaḥ saṃprati pāṇḍavaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:5986: 05,050.018a niṣṭhuraḥ sa ca naiṣṭhuryād bhajyed api na saṃnamet
GE07mbh_05_u:5992: 05,050.021a iti bālye śrutaḥ pūrvaṃ mayā vyāsamukhāt purā
GE07mbh_05_u:5994: 05,050.022a āyasena sa daṇḍena rathān nāgān hayān narān
GE07mbh_05_u:5995: 05,050.022c haniṣyati raṇe kruddho bhīmaḥ praharatāṃ varaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:5997: 05,050.023c mama tāta pratīpāni kurvan pūrvaṃ vimānitaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:5998: 05,050.024a niṣkīrṇām āyasīṃ sthūlāṃ suparvāṃ kāñcanīṃ gadām
GE07mbh_05_u:5999: 05,050.024c śataghnīṃ śatanirhrādāṃ kathaṃ śakṣyanti me sutāḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:6002: 05,050.026a krośato me na śṛṇvanti bālāḥ paṇḍitamāninaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:6007: 05,050.028c prahitāṃ duḥkhasaṃsparśāṃ kathaṃ śakṣyanti me sutāḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:6010: 05,050.030a uddiśya pātān patataḥ kurvato bhairavān ravān
GE07mbh_05_u:6013: 05,050.031c agneḥ prajvalitasyeva api mucyeta me prajā
GE07mbh_05_u:6014: 05,050.032a vīthīṃ kurvan mahābāhur drāvayan mama vāhinīm
GE07mbh_05_u:6016: 05,050.033a prabhinna iva mātaṅgaḥ prabhañjan puṣpitān drumān
GE07mbh_05_u:6017: 05,050.033c pravekṣyati raṇe senāṃ putrāṇāṃ me vṛkodaraḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:6023: 05,050.036c mama putrāś ca bhṛtyāś ca rājānaś caiva saṃjaya
GE07mbh_05_u:6029: 05,050.039c te na tasya vaśaṃ jagmuḥ kevalaṃ daivam eva vā
GE07mbh_05_u:6033: 05,050.041c sa mokṣyati raṇe tejaḥ putreṣu mama saṃjaya
GE07mbh_05_u:6039: 05,050.044c bāhubhyāṃ yudhyamānasya kas tiṣṭhed agrataḥ pumān
GE07mbh_05_u:6040: 05,050.045a bhīṣmo droṇaś ca vipro 'yaṃ kṛpaḥ śāradvatas tathā
GE07mbh_05_u:6041: 05,050.045c jānanty ete yathaivāhaṃ vīryajñas tasya dhīmataḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:6042: 05,050.046a āryavrataṃ tu jānantaḥ saṃgarān na bibhitsavaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:6045: 05,050.047c paśyann api jayaṃ teṣāṃ na niyacchāmi yat sutān
GE07mbh_05_u:6046: 05,050.048a te purāṇaṃ maheṣvāsā mārgam aindraṃ samāsthitāḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:6047: 05,050.048c tyakṣyanti tumule prāṇān rakṣantaḥ pārthivaṃ yaśaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:6048: 05,050.049a yathaiṣāṃ māmakās tāta tathaiṣāṃ pāṇḍavā api
GE07mbh_05_u:6049: 05,050.049c pautrā bhīṣmasya śiṣyāś ca droṇasya ca kṛpasya ca
GE07mbh_05_u:6050: 05,050.050a yat tv asmad āśrayaṃ kiṃ cid dattam iṣṭaṃ ca saṃjaya
GE07mbh_05_u:6054: 05,050.052a sa vai śocāmi sarvān vai ye yuyutsanti pāṇḍavān
GE07mbh_05_u:6055: 05,050.052c vikruṣṭaṃ vidureṇādau tad etad bhayam āgatam
GE07mbh_05_u:6056: 05,050.053a na tu manye vighātāya jñānaṃ duḥkhasya saṃjaya
GE07mbh_05_u:6057: 05,050.053c bhavaty atibale hy etaj jñānam apy upaghātakam
GE07mbh_05_u:6058: 05,050.054a ṛṣayo hy api nirmuktāḥ paśyanto lokasaṃgrahān
GE07mbh_05_u:6059: 05,050.054c sukhe bhavanti sukhinas tathā duḥkhena duḥkhitāḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:6060: 05,050.055a kiṃ punar yo 'ham āsaktas tatra tatra sahasradhā
GE07mbh_05_u:6061: 05,050.055c putreṣu rājyadāreṣu pautreṣv api ca bandhuṣu
GE07mbh_05_u:6062: 05,050.056a saṃśaye tu mahaty asmin kiṃ nu me kṣamam uttamam
GE07mbh_05_u:6063: 05,050.056c vināśaṃ hy eva paśyāmi kurūṇām anucintayan
GE07mbh_05_u:6067: 05,050.058c cakre pradhir ivāsakto nāsya śakyaṃ palāyitum
GE07mbh_05_u:6068: 05,050.059a kiṃ nu kāryaṃ kathaṃ kuryāṃ kva nu gacchāmi saṃjaya
GE07mbh_05_u:6069: 05,050.059c ete naśyanti kuravo mandāḥ kālavaśaṃ gatāḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:6070: 05,050.060a avaśo 'haṃ purā tāta putrāṇāṃ nihate śate
GE07mbh_05_u:6071: 05,050.060c śroṣyāmi ninadaṃ strīṇāṃ kathaṃ māṃ maraṇaṃ spṛśet
GE07mbh_05_u:6077: 05,051.001a yasya vai nānṛtā vācaḥ pravṛttā anuśuśrumaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:6078: 05,051.001c trailokyam api tasya syād yoddhā yasya dhanaṃjayaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:6079: 05,051.002a tasyaiva ca na paśyāmi yudhi gāṇḍīvadhanvanaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:6080: 05,051.002c aniśaṃ cintayāno 'pi yaḥ pratīyād rathena tam
GE07mbh_05_u:6082: 05,051.003c pratyetā na samaḥ kaś cid yudhi gāṇḍīvadhanvanaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:6085: 05,051.004c māhātmyāt saṃśayo loke na tv asti vijayo mama
GE07mbh_05_u:6086: 05,051.005a ghṛṇī karṇaḥ pramādī ca ācāryaḥ sthaviro guruḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:6089: 05,051.006a sarve hy astravidaḥ śūrāḥ sarve prāptā mahad yaśaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:6090: 05,051.006c api sarvāmaraiśvaryaṃ tyajeyur na punar jayam
GE07mbh_05_u:6091: 05,051.006e vadhe nūnaṃ bhavec chāntis tayor vā phalgunasya vā
GE07mbh_05_u:6092: 05,051.007a na tu jetārjunasyāsti hantā cāsya na vidyate
GE07mbh_05_u:6093: 05,051.007c manyus tasya kathaṃ śāmyen mandān prati ya utthitaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:6094: 05,051.008a anye 'py astrāṇi jānanti jīyante ca jayanti ca
GE07mbh_05_u:6095: 05,051.008c ekāntavijayas tv eva śrūyate phalgunasya ha
GE07mbh_05_u:6097: 05,051.009c jigāya ca surān sarvān nāsya vedmi parājayam
GE07mbh_05_u:6099: 05,051.010c dhruvas tasya jayas tāta yathendrasya jayas tathā
GE07mbh_05_u:6100: 05,051.011a kṛṣṇāv ekarathe yattāv adhijyaṃ gāṇḍivaṃ dhanuḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:6102: 05,051.012a naiva no 'sti dhanus tādṛṅ na yoddhā na ca sārathiḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:6103: 05,051.012c tac ca mandā na jānanti duryodhanavaśānugāḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:6104: 05,051.013a śeṣayed aśanir dīpto nipatan mūrdhni saṃjaya
GE07mbh_05_u:6105: 05,051.013c na tu śeṣaṃ śarāḥ kuryur astās tāta kirīṭinā
GE07mbh_05_u:6106: 05,051.014a api cāsyann ivābhāti nighnann iva ca phalgunaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:6108: 05,051.015a api bāṇamayaṃ tejaḥ pradīptam iva sarvataḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:6111: 05,051.016c vitrastā bahulā senā bhāratī pratibhāti me
GE07mbh_05_u:6112: 05,051.017a yathā kakṣaṃ dahaty agniḥ pravṛddhaḥ sarvataś caran
GE07mbh_05_u:6125: 05,052.002a tvam eva hi parākrāntān ācakṣīthāḥ parān mama
GE07mbh_05_u:6127: 05,052.003a yaś ca sendrān imāṃl lokān icchan kuryād vaśe balī
GE07mbh_05_u:6128: 05,052.003c sa śreṣṭho jagataḥ kṛṣṇaḥ pāṇḍavānāṃ jaye dhṛtaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:6129: 05,052.004a samastām arjunād vidyāṃ sātyakiḥ kṣipram āptavān
GE07mbh_05_u:6130: 05,052.004c śaineyaḥ samare sthātā bījavat pravapañ śarān
GE07mbh_05_u:6133: 05,052.006a yudhiṣṭhirasya ca krodhād arjunasya ca vikramāt
GE07mbh_05_u:6134: 05,052.006c yamābhyāṃ bhīmasenāc ca bhayaṃ me tāta jāyate
GE07mbh_05_u:6136: 05,052.007c mama senāṃ haniṣyanti tataḥ krośāmi saṃjaya
GE07mbh_05_u:6141: 05,052.010a dhṛtyā ca puruṣavyāghro naibhṛtyena ca pāṇḍavaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:6145: 05,052.012a tapantam iva ko mandaḥ patiṣyati pataṃgavat

GE07mbh_05_u:6448: 05,056.022a sahadevas tu mādreyaḥ śūraḥ saṃkrandano yudhi

GE07mbh_05_u:6463: 05,056.029a sarve hy atirathāḥ śūrāḥ kīrtimantaḥ pratāpinaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:6465: 05,056.030a yeṣāṃ yudhiṣṭhiro netā goptā ca madhusūdanaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:6467: 05,056.031a nakulaḥ sahadevaś ca dhṛṣṭadyumnaś ca pārṣataḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:6469: 05,056.032a uttamaujāś ca pāñcālyo yudhāmanyuś ca durjayaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:6470: 05,056.032c śikhaṇḍī kṣatradevaś ca tathā vairāṭir uttaraḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:6471: 05,056.032d*0343_01 tataḥ śvetas tu vairāṭiḥ ketumān vāhinīpatiḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:6472: 05,056.033a kāśayaś cedayaś caiva matsyāḥ sarve ca sṛñjayāḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:6473: 05,056.033c virāṭaputro babhrūś ca pāñcālāś ca prabhadrakāḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:6474: 05,056.034a yeṣām indro 'py akāmānāṃ na haret pṛthivīm imām
GE07mbh_05_u:6475: 05,056.034c vīrāṇāṃ raṇadhīrāṇāṃ ye bhindyuḥ parvatān api
GE07mbh_05_u:6477: 05,056.035c krośato mama duṣputro yoddhum icchati saṃjaya
GE07mbh_05_u:6480: 05,056.036c atha kasmāt pāṇḍavānām ekato manyase jayam
GE07mbh_05_u:6481: 05,056.037a pitāmahaṃ ca droṇaṃ ca kṛpaṃ karṇaṃ ca durjayam
GE07mbh_05_u:6484: 05,056.038c aśaktaḥ samare jetuṃ kiṃ punas tāta pāṇḍavāḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:6485: 05,056.039a sarvā ca pṛthivī sṛṣṭā madarthe tāta pāṇḍavān
GE07mbh_05_u:6487: 05,056.040a na māmakān pāṇḍavās te samarthāḥ prativīkṣitum
GE07mbh_05_u:6488: 05,056.040c parākrānto hy ahaṃ pāṇḍūn saputrān yoddhum āhave
GE07mbh_05_u:6489: 05,056.041a matpriyaṃ pārthivāḥ sarve ye cikīrṣanti bhārata
GE07mbh_05_u:6490: 05,056.041c te tān āvārayiṣyanti aiṇeyān iva tantunā
GE07mbh_05_u:6494: 05,056.043a unmatta iva me putro vilapaty eṣa saṃjaya
GE07mbh_05_u:6495: 05,056.043c na hi śakto yudhā jetuṃ dharmarājaṃ yudhiṣṭhiram
GE07mbh_05_u:6496: 05,056.044a jānāti hi sadā bhīṣmaḥ pāṇḍavānāṃ yaśasvinām
GE07mbh_05_u:6498: 05,056.045a yato nārocayam ahaṃ vigrahaṃ tair mahātmabhiḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:6499: 05,056.045c kiṃ tu saṃjaya me brūhi punas teṣāṃ viceṣṭitam
GE07mbh_05_u:6500: 05,056.046a kas tāṃs tarasvino bhūyaḥ saṃdīpayati pāṇḍavān
GE07mbh_05_u:6504: 05,056.047c yudhyadhvam iti mā bhaiṣṭa yuddhād bharatasattamāḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:6505: 05,056.048a ye ke cit pārthivās tatra dhārtarāṣṭreṇa saṃvṛtāḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:6507: 05,056.049a tān sarvān āhave kruddhān sānubandhān samāgatān
GE07mbh_05_u:6508: 05,056.049c aham ekaḥ samādāsye timir matsyān ivaudakān
GE07mbh_05_u:6509: 05,056.050a bhīṣmaṃ droṇaṃ kṛpaṃ karṇaṃ drauṇiṃ śalyaṃ suyodhanam
GE07mbh_05_u:6511: 05,056.051a tathā bruvāṇaṃ dharmātmā prāha rājā yudhiṣṭhiraḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:6512: 05,056.051c tava dhairyaṃ ca vīryaṃ ca pāñcālāḥ pāṇḍavaiḥ saha
GE07mbh_05_u:6513: 05,056.051e sarve samadhirūḍhāḥ sma saṃgrāmān naḥ samuddhara
GE07mbh_05_u:6516: 05,056.052e bhavatā yad vidhātavyaṃ tan naḥ śreyaḥ paraṃtapa
GE07mbh_05_u:6520: 05,056.053c pauruṣaṃ darśayañ śūro yas tiṣṭhed agrataḥ pumān
GE07mbh_05_u:6521: 05,056.053e krīṇīyāt taṃ sahasreṇa nītiman nāma tat padam
GE07mbh_05_u:6522: 05,056.054a sa tvaṃ śūraś ca vīraś ca vikrāntaś ca nararṣabha
GE07mbh_05_u:6526: 05,056.056a sarvāñ janapadān sūta yodhā duryodhanasya ye
GE07mbh_05_u:6529: 05,056.057c duḥśāsanaṃ vikarṇaṃ ca tathā duryodhanaṃ nṛpam
GE07mbh_05_u:6530: 05,056.058a bhīṣmaṃ caiva brūhi gatvā tvam āśu;
GE07mbh_05_u:6535: 05,056.059a naitādṛśo hi yodho 'sti pṛthivyām iha kaś cana
GE07mbh_05_u:6537: 05,056.060a devair hi saṃbhṛto divyo ratho gāṇḍīvadhanvanaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:6538: 05,056.060c na sa jeyo manuṣyeṇa mā sma kṛdhvaṃ mano yudhi
GE07mbh_05_u:6541: 05,057.001c tena saṃyugam eṣyanti mandā vilapato mama
GE07mbh_05_u:6543: 05,057.002c na hi yuddhaṃ praśaṃsanti sarvāvastham ariṃdama
GE07mbh_05_u:6544: 05,057.003a alam ardhaṃ pṛthivyās te sahāmātyasya jīvitum
GE07mbh_05_u:6546: 05,057.004a etad dhi kuravaḥ sarve manyante dharmasaṃhitam
GE07mbh_05_u:6547: 05,057.004c yat tvaṃ praśāntim icchethāḥ pāṇḍuputrair mahātmabhiḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:6548: 05,057.005a aṅgemāṃ samavekṣasva putra svām eva vāhinīm
GE07mbh_05_u:6549: 05,057.005c jāta eva tava srāvas tvaṃ tu mohān na budhyase
GE07mbh_05_u:6550: 05,057.006a na hy ahaṃ yuddham icchāmi naitad icchati bāhlikaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:6551: 05,057.006c na ca bhīṣmo na ca droṇo nāśvatthāmā na saṃjayaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:6552: 05,057.007a na somadatto na śalyo na kṛpo yuddham icchati
GE07mbh_05_u:6555: 05,057.008c te yuddhaṃ nābhinandanti tat tubhyaṃ tāta rocatām
GE07mbh_05_u:6556: 05,057.009a na tvaṃ karoṣi kāmena karṇaḥ kārayitā tava
GE07mbh_05_u:6557: 05,057.009c duḥśāsanaś ca pāpātmā śakuniś cāpi saubalaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:6559: 05,057.010a nāhaṃ bhavati na droṇe nāśvatthāmni na saṃjaye
GE07mbh_05_u:6560: 05,057.010c na vikarṇe na kāmboje na kṛpe na ca bāhlike
GE07mbh_05_u:6562: 05,057.011c anyeṣu vā tāvakeṣu bhāraṃ kṛtvā samāhvaye
GE07mbh_05_u:6563: 05,057.012a ahaṃ ca tāta karṇaś ca raṇayajñaṃ vitatya vai
GE07mbh_05_u:6565: 05,057.013a ratho vedī sruvaḥ khaḍgo gadā sruk kavacaṃ sadaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:6566: 05,057.013c cāturhotraṃ ca dhuryā me śarā darbhā havir yaśaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:6568: 05,057.014c vijitya svayam eṣyāvo hatāmitrau śriyā vṛtau
GE07mbh_05_u:6569: 05,057.015a ahaṃ ca tāta karṇaś ca bhrātā duḥśāsanaś ca me
GE07mbh_05_u:6570: 05,057.015c ete vayaṃ haniṣyāmaḥ pāṇḍavān samare trayaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:6571: 05,057.016a ahaṃ hi pāṇḍavān hatvā praśāstā pṛthivīm imām
GE07mbh_05_u:6572: 05,057.016c māṃ vā hatvā pāṇḍuputrā bhoktāraḥ pṛthivīm imām
GE07mbh_05_u:6573: 05,057.017a tyaktaṃ me jīvitaṃ rājan dhanaṃ rājyaṃ ca pārthiva
GE07mbh_05_u:6574: 05,057.017c na jātu pāṇḍavaiḥ sārdhaṃ vaseyam aham acyuta
GE07mbh_05_u:6575: 05,057.018a yāvad dhi sūcyās tīkṣṇāyā vidhyed agreṇa māriṣa
GE07mbh_05_u:6576: 05,057.018c tāvad apy aparityājyaṃ bhūmer naḥ pāṇḍavān prati
GE07mbh_05_u:6578: 05,057.019a sarvān vas tāta śocāmi tyakto duryodhano mayā
GE07mbh_05_u:6580: 05,057.020a rurūṇām iva yūtheṣu vyāghrāḥ praharatāṃ varāḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:6581: 05,057.020c varān varān haniṣyanti sametā yudhi pāṇḍavāḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:6582: 05,057.021a pratīpam iva me bhāti yuyudhānena bhāratī
GE07mbh_05_u:6584: 05,057.022a saṃpūrṇaṃ pūrayan bhūyo balaṃ pārthasya mādhavaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:6585: 05,057.022c śaineyaḥ samare sthātā bījavat pravapañ śarān
GE07mbh_05_u:6590: 05,057.025a tān abhiprekṣya saṃgrāme viśīrṇān iva parvatān
GE07mbh_05_u:6591: 05,057.025c bhīto bhīmasya saṃsparśāt smartāsi vacanasya me
GE07mbh_05_u:6593: 05,057.026c gatim agner iva prekṣya smartāsi vacanasya me
GE07mbh_05_u:6594: 05,057.027a mahad vo bhayam āgāmi na cec chāmyatha pāṇḍavaiḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:6596: 05,057.028a mahāvanam iva chinnaṃ yadā drakṣyasi pātitam
GE07mbh_05_u:6597: 05,057.028c balaṃ kurūṇāṃ saṃgrāme tadā smartāsi me vacaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:6599: 05,057.029a etāvad uktvā rājā tu sa sarvān pṛthivīpatīn
GE07mbh_05_u:6603: 05,058.001c tan me brūhi mahāprājña śuśrūṣe vacanaṃ tava
GE07mbh_05_u:6605: 05,058.002a śṛṇu rājan yathā dṛṣṭau mayā kṛṣṇadhanaṃjayau
GE07mbh_05_u:6606: 05,058.002c ūcatuś cāpi yad vīrau tat te vakṣyāmi bhārata
GE07mbh_05_u:6609: 05,058.004a naivābhimanyur na yamau taṃ deśam abhiyānti vai
GE07mbh_05_u:6610: 05,058.004c yatra kṛṣṇau ca kṛṣṇā ca satyabhāmā ca bhāminī
GE07mbh_05_u:6616: 05,058.006d*0347_01 satyāṅkam upadhānaṃ tu kṛtvā śete janārdanaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:6618: 05,058.007c arjunasya ca kṛṣṇāyāṃ satyāyāṃ ca mahātmanaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:6619: 05,058.008a kāñcanaṃ pādapīṭhaṃ tu pārtho me prādiśat tadā
GE07mbh_05_u:6620: 05,058.008c tad ahaṃ pāṇinā spṛṣṭvā tato bhūmāv upāviśam
GE07mbh_05_u:6623: 05,058.009d*0348_01 na nūnaṃ kalmaṣaṃ kiṃ cin mama karmasu vidyate
GE07mbh_05_u:6624: 05,058.009d*0348_02 strīratnābhyāṃ sametau yan mitho mām abhyabhāṣatām
GE07mbh_05_u:6625: 05,058.009d*0348_03 vismayo me mahān āsīd āstraṃ me bahu saṃgatam
GE07mbh_05_u:6626: 05,058.009d*0348_04 hṛṣṭāni caiva romāṇi dṛṣṭvā tau sahitāv ubhau
GE07mbh_05_u:6628: 05,058.010c ekāsanagatau dṛṣṭvā bhayaṃ māṃ mahad āviśat
GE07mbh_05_u:6632: 05,058.012a nideśasthāv imau yasya mānasas tasya setsyate
GE07mbh_05_u:6635: 05,058.013c añjaliṃ mūrdhni saṃdhāya tau saṃdeśam acodayam
GE07mbh_05_u:6640: 05,058.016a vācaṃ sa vadatāṃ śreṣṭho hlādinīṃ vacanakṣamām
GE07mbh_05_u:6643: 05,058.016d*0350_02 matimān matim āsthāya keśavaḥ saṃdadhe vacaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:6649: 05,058.018d*0351_01 āvayor vacanāt sūta jyeṣṭhān apy abhivādayan
GE07mbh_05_u:6650: 05,058.018d*0351_02 yavīyasaś ca kuśalaṃ paścāt pṛṣṭvaivam uttaram
GE07mbh_05_u:6651: 05,058.019a yajadhvaṃ vipulair yajñair viprebhyo datta dakṣiṇāḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:6652: 05,058.019c putrair dāraiś ca modadhvaṃ mahad vo bhayam āgatam
GE07mbh_05_u:6653: 05,058.020a arthāṃs tyajata pātrebhyaḥ sutān prāpnuta kāmajān
GE07mbh_05_u:6654: 05,058.020c priyaṃ priyebhyaś carata rājā hi tvarate jaye
GE07mbh_05_u:6655: 05,058.021a ṛṇam etat pravṛddhaṃ me hṛdayān nāpasarpati
GE07mbh_05_u:6656: 05,058.021c yad govindeti cukrośa kṛṣṇā māṃ dūravāsinam
GE07mbh_05_u:6659: 05,058.022d*0352_01 kṛṣṇasya tad vacaḥ śrutvā bhayaṃ māṃ mahad āviśat
GE07mbh_05_u:6660: 05,058.022d*0352_02 tava putrasya lobhaṃ tu vartamānaṃ pramṛśyataḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:6661: 05,058.023a maddvitīyaṃ punaḥ pārthaṃ kaḥ prārthayitum icchati
GE07mbh_05_u:6662: 05,058.023c yo na kālaparīto vāpy api sākṣāt puraṃdaraḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:6663: 05,058.024a bāhubhyām udvahed bhūmiṃ dahet kruddha imāḥ prajāḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:6664: 05,058.024c pātayet tridivād devān yo 'rjunaṃ samare jayet
GE07mbh_05_u:6666: 05,058.025c na taṃ paśyāmy ahaṃ yuddhe pāṇḍavaṃ yo 'bhyayād raṇe
GE07mbh_05_u:6667: 05,058.026a yat tad virāṭanagare śrūyate mahad adbhutam
GE07mbh_05_u:6668: 05,058.026c ekasya ca bahūnāṃ ca paryāptaṃ tan nidarśanam
GE07mbh_05_u:6670: 05,058.027c bhagnāḥ palāyanta diśaḥ paryāptaṃ tan nidarśanam
GE07mbh_05_u:6671: 05,058.028a balaṃ vīryaṃ ca tejaś ca śīghratā laghuhastatā
GE07mbh_05_u:6672: 05,058.028c aviṣādaś ca dhairyaṃ ca pārthān nānyatra vidyate
GE07mbh_05_u:6674: 05,058.029a ity abravīd dhṛṣīkeśaḥ pārtham uddharṣayan girā
GE07mbh_05_u:6677: 05,058.030c arjunas tan mahad vākyam abravīl lomaharṣaṇam
GE07mbh_05_u:6680: 05,059.001c tataḥ saṃkhyātum ārebhe tad vaco guṇadoṣataḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:6684: 05,059.003b*0353_01 yadā tu mene bhūyiṣṭhaṃ tad vaco guṇadoṣataḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:6685: 05,059.003b*0353_02 punar eva kurūṇāṃ ca pāṇḍavānāṃ ca buddhimān
GE07mbh_05_u:6686: 05,059.003c śaktiṃ saṃkhyātum ārebhe tadā vai manujādhipaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:6689: 05,059.005a duryodhaneyaṃ cintā me śaśvan nāpy upaśāmyati
GE07mbh_05_u:6691: 05,059.005b*0354_02 adharme cāyaśasye ca kārye mahati dāruṇe
GE07mbh_05_u:6692: 05,059.005b*0354_03 pāṇḍavair vigrahas tāta sarvathā taṃ na rocaye
GE07mbh_05_u:6693: 05,059.005c satyaṃ hy etad ahaṃ manye pratyakṣaṃ nānumānataḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:6695: 05,059.006c priyāṇi caiṣāṃ kurvanti yathāśakti hitāni ca
GE07mbh_05_u:6697: 05,059.007c icchanti bahulaṃ santaḥ pratikartuṃ mahat priyam
GE07mbh_05_u:6698: 05,059.008a agniḥ sācivyakartā syāt khāṇḍave tat kṛtaṃ smaran
GE07mbh_05_u:6704: 05,059.011a te devasahitāḥ pārthā na śakyāḥ prativīkṣitum
GE07mbh_05_u:6706: 05,059.012a durāsadaṃ yasya divyaṃ gāṇḍīvaṃ dhanur uttamam
GE07mbh_05_u:6708: 05,059.013a vānaraś ca dhvajo divyo niḥsaṅgo dhūmavad gatiḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:6709: 05,059.013c rathaś ca caturantāyāṃ yasya nāsti samas tviṣā
GE07mbh_05_u:6712: 05,059.015a yaṃ cātimānuṣaṃ vīrye kṛtsno loko vyavasyati
GE07mbh_05_u:6713: 05,059.015c devānām api jetāraṃ yaṃ viduḥ pārthivā raṇe
GE07mbh_05_u:6714: 05,059.016a śatāni pañca caiveṣūn udvapann iva dṛśyate
GE07mbh_05_u:6716: 05,059.017a yam āha bhīṣmo droṇaś ca kṛpo drauṇis tathaiva ca
GE07mbh_05_u:6717: 05,059.017c madrarājas tathā śalyo madhyasthā ye ca mānavāḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:6720: 05,059.019a kṣipaty ekena vegena pañca bāṇaśatāni yaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:6724: 05,059.021a ity evaṃ cintayan kṛtsnam ahorātrāṇi bhārata
GE07mbh_05_u:6727: 05,059.022c asya cet kalahasyāntaḥ śamād anyo na vidyate
GE07mbh_05_u:6728: 05,059.023a śamo me rocate nityaṃ pārthais tāta na vigrahaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:6729: 05,059.023c kurubhyo hi sadā manye pāṇḍavāñ śaktimattarān
GE07mbh_05_u:6732: 05,060.001c ādhāya vipulaṃ krodhaṃ punar evedam abravīt
GE07mbh_05_u:6733: 05,060.002a aśakyā devasacivāḥ pārthāḥ syur iti yad bhavān
GE07mbh_05_u:6736: 05,060.003c upekṣayā ca bhāvānāṃ devā devatvam āpnuvan
GE07mbh_05_u:6737: 05,060.004a iti dvaipāyano vyāso nāradaś ca mahātapāḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:6738: 05,060.004c jāmadagnyaś ca rāmo naḥ kathām akathayat purā
GE07mbh_05_u:6739: 05,060.005a naiva mānuṣavad devāḥ pravartante kadā cana
GE07mbh_05_u:6740: 05,060.005c kāmāl lobhād anukrośād dveṣāc ca bharatarṣabha
GE07mbh_05_u:6741: 05,060.006a yadi hy agniś ca vāyuś ca dharma indro 'śvināv api
GE07mbh_05_u:6742: 05,060.006c kāmayogāt pravarteran na pārthā duḥkham āpnuyuḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:6743: 05,060.007a tasmān na bhavatā cintā kāryaiṣā syāt kadā cana
GE07mbh_05_u:6744: 05,060.007c daiveṣv apekṣakā hy ete śaśvad bhāveṣu bhārata
GE07mbh_05_u:6745: 05,060.008a atha cet kāmasaṃyogād dveṣāl lobhāc ca lakṣyate
GE07mbh_05_u:6749: 05,060.010a yad vā paramakaṃ tejo yena yuktā divaukasaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:6750: 05,060.010c mamāpy anupamaṃ bhūyo devebhyo viddhi bhārata
GE07mbh_05_u:6755: 05,060.013a aśmavarṣaṃ ca vāyuṃ ca śamayāmīha nityaśaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:6759: 05,060.015a akṣauhiṇībhir yān deśān yāmi kāryeṇa kena cit
GE07mbh_05_u:6761: 05,060.016a bhayāni viṣaye rājan vyālādīni na santi me
GE07mbh_05_u:6762: 05,060.016c mattaḥ suptāni bhūtāni na hiṃsanti bhayaṃkarāḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:6764: 05,060.017c dharmiṣṭhāś ca prajāḥ sarvā ītayaś ca na santi me
GE07mbh_05_u:6765: 05,060.018a aśvināv atha vāyvagnī marudbhiḥ saha vṛtrahā
GE07mbh_05_u:6767: 05,060.019a yadi hy ete samarthāḥ syur maddviṣas trātum ojasā
GE07mbh_05_u:6768: 05,060.019c na sma trayodaśa samāḥ pārthā duḥkham avāpnuyuḥ
