GE07mbh_05_u:7196: 05,068.007a yataḥ sattvaṃ na cyavate yac ca sattvān na hīyate
GE07mbh_05_u:7198: 05,068.008a na jāyate janitryāṃ yad ajas tasmād anīkajit
GE07mbh_05_u:7201: 05,068.009c bāhubhyāṃ rodasī bibhran mahābāhur iti smṛtaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:7202: 05,068.010a adho na kṣīyate jātu yasmāt tasmād adhokṣajaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:7203: 05,068.010c narāṇām ayanāc cāpi tena nārāyaṇaḥ smṛtaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:7206: 05,068.011a asataś ca sataś caiva sarvasya prabhavāpyayāt
GE07mbh_05_u:7209: 05,068.011c sarvasya ca sadā jñānāt sarvam enaṃ pracakṣate
GE07mbh_05_u:7210: 05,068.012a satye pratiṣṭhitaḥ kṛṣṇaḥ satyam atra pratiṣṭhitam
GE07mbh_05_u:7211: 05,068.012c satyāt satyaṃ ca govindas tasmāt satyo 'pi nāmataḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:7212: 05,068.013a viṣṇur vikramaṇād eva jayanāj jiṣṇur ucyate
GE07mbh_05_u:7213: 05,068.013c śāśvatatvād anantaś ca govindo vedanād gavām
GE07mbh_05_u:7214: 05,068.014a atattvaṃ kurute tattvaṃ tena mohayate prajāḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:7251: 05,070.001*0366_01 prayāte saṃjaye sādhau pāṇḍavān prati vai tadā
GE07mbh_05_u:7252: 05,070.001*0366_02 kiṃ cakruḥ pāṇḍavās tatra mama pūrvapitāmahāḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:7253: 05,070.001*0366_03 etat sarvaṃ dvijaśreṣṭha śrotum icchāmi śaṃsa me
GE07mbh_05_u:7255: 05,070.001b*0367_01 arjunaṃ bhīmasenaṃ ca mādrīputrau ca bhrātarau
GE07mbh_05_u:7259: 05,070.001b*0367_05 yathā bhīṣmeṇa droṇena bāhlīkena ca dhīmatā
GE07mbh_05_u:7260: 05,070.001b*0367_06 anyaiś ca kurubhiḥ sārdhaṃ na yudhyemahi saṃyuge
GE07mbh_05_u:7261: 05,070.001b*0367_07 eṣa naḥ prathamaḥ kalpa etan naḥ śreya uttamam
GE07mbh_05_u:7264: 05,070.001b*0367_10 tathā ca duḥsahāḥ sarve sadasyaiś ca nararṣabhāḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:7268: 05,070.002a ayaṃ sa kālaḥ saṃprāpto mitrāṇāṃ me janārdana
GE07mbh_05_u:7269: 05,070.002c na ca tvad anyaṃ paśyāmi yo na āpatsu tārayet
GE07mbh_05_u:7270: 05,070.003a tvāṃ hi mādhava saṃśritya nirbhayā mohadarpitam
GE07mbh_05_u:7272: 05,070.004a yathā hi sarvāsv āpatsu pāsi vṛṣṇīn ariṃdama
GE07mbh_05_u:7273: 05,070.004c tathā te pāṇḍavā rakṣyāḥ pāhy asmān mahato bhayāt
GE07mbh_05_u:7275: 05,070.005a ayam asmi mahābāho brūhi yat te vivakṣitam
GE07mbh_05_u:7276: 05,070.005c kariṣyāmi hi tat sarvaṃ yat tvaṃ vakṣyasi bhārata
GE07mbh_05_u:7278: 05,070.006*0370_01 mṛdupūrvaṃ sāmamiśraṃ sāntvam ugraṃ ca mādhava
GE07mbh_05_u:7279: 05,070.006*0370_02 na tu tan nyāyam āsthāya garhitāś ca tato vayam
GE07mbh_05_u:7281: 05,070.006c etad dhi sakalaṃ kṛṣṇa saṃjayo māṃ yad abravīt
GE07mbh_05_u:7283: 05,070.007c yathoktaṃ dūta ācaṣṭe vadhyaḥ syād anyathā bruvan
GE07mbh_05_u:7285: 05,070.008c lubdhaḥ pāpena manasā carann asamam ātmanaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:7286: 05,070.009a yat tad dvādaśa varṣāṇi vane nirvyuṣitā vayam
GE07mbh_05_u:7288: 05,070.010a sthātā naḥ samaye tasmin dhṛtarāṣṭra iti prabho
GE07mbh_05_u:7289: 05,070.010c nāhāsma samayaṃ kṛṣṇa tad dhi no brāhmaṇā viduḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:7293: 05,070.012c mithyā carati lubdhaḥ saṃś caran priyam ivātmanaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:7294: 05,070.013a ito duḥkhataraṃ kiṃ nu yatrāhaṃ mātaraṃ tataḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:7295: 05,070.013c saṃvidhātuṃ na śaknomi mitrāṇāṃ vā janārdana
GE07mbh_05_u:7297: 05,070.014c bhavatā caiva nāthena pañca grāmā vṛtā mayā
GE07mbh_05_u:7299: 05,070.015c avasānaṃ ca govinda kiṃ cid evātra pañcamam
GE07mbh_05_u:7300: 05,070.016a pañca nas tāta dīyantāṃ grāmā vā nagarāṇi vā
GE07mbh_05_u:7301: 05,070.016c vasema sahitā yeṣu mā ca no bharatā naśan
GE07mbh_05_u:7302: 05,070.017a na ca tān api duṣṭātmā dhārtarāṣṭro 'numanyate
GE07mbh_05_u:7303: 05,070.017c svāmyam ātmani matvāsāv ato duḥkhataraṃ nu kim
GE07mbh_05_u:7305: 05,070.018c lobhaḥ prajñānam āhanti prajñā hanti hatā hriyam
GE07mbh_05_u:7306: 05,070.019a hrīr hatā bādhate dharmaṃ dharmo hanti hataḥ śriyam
GE07mbh_05_u:7307: 05,070.019c śrīr hatā puruṣaṃ hanti puruṣasyāsvatā vadhaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:7309: 05,070.020c apuṣpād aphalād vṛkṣād yathā tāta patatriṇaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:7310: 05,070.021a etac ca maraṇaṃ tāta yad asmāt patitād iva
GE07mbh_05_u:7312: 05,070.022a nātaḥ pāpīyasīṃ kāṃ cid avasthāṃ śambaro 'bravīt
GE07mbh_05_u:7313: 05,070.022c yatra naivādya na prātar bhojanaṃ pratidṛśyate
GE07mbh_05_u:7314: 05,070.023a dhanam āhuḥ paraṃ dharmaṃ dhane sarvaṃ pratiṣṭhitam
GE07mbh_05_u:7315: 05,070.023c jīvanti dhanino loke mṛtā ye tv adhanā narāḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:7316: 05,070.024a ye dhanād apakarṣanti naraṃ svabalam āśritāḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:7317: 05,070.024c te dharmam arthaṃ kāmaṃ ca pramathnanti naraṃ ca tam
GE07mbh_05_u:7318: 05,070.025a etām avasthāṃ prāpyaike maraṇaṃ vavrire janāḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:7320: 05,070.026a unmādam eke puṣyanti yānty anye dviṣatāṃ vaśam
GE07mbh_05_u:7323: 05,070.027c śriyo vināśas tad dhy asya nimittaṃ dharmakāmayoḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:7324: 05,070.028a yad asya dharmyaṃ maraṇaṃ śāśvataṃ lokavartma tat
GE07mbh_05_u:7325: 05,070.028c samantāt sarvabhūtānāṃ na tad atyeti kaś cana
GE07mbh_05_u:7326: 05,070.029a na tathā bādhyate kṛṣṇa prakṛtyā nirdhano janaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:7327: 05,070.029c yathā bhadrāṃ śriyaṃ prāpya tayā hīnaḥ sukhaidhitaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:7329: 05,070.030c sendrān garhayate devān nātmānaṃ ca kathaṃ cana
GE07mbh_05_u:7332: 05,070.032a taṃ tadā manyur evaiti sa bhūyaḥ saṃpramuhyati
GE07mbh_05_u:7333: 05,070.032c sa mohavaśam āpannaḥ krūraṃ karma niṣevate
GE07mbh_05_u:7336: 05,070.034a na cet prabudhyate kṛṣṇa narakāyaiva gacchati
GE07mbh_05_u:7337: 05,070.034c tasya prabodhaḥ prajñaiva prajñācakṣur na riṣyati
GE07mbh_05_u:7339: 05,070.035c śāstranityaḥ punar dharmaṃ tasya hrīr aṅgam uttamam
GE07mbh_05_u:7340: 05,070.036a hrīmān hi pāpaṃ pradveṣṭi tasya śrīr abhivardhate
GE07mbh_05_u:7341: 05,070.036c śrīmān sa yāvad bhavati tāvad bhavati pūruṣaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:7343: 05,070.037c nādharme kurute buddhiṃ na ca pāpeṣu vartate
GE07mbh_05_u:7344: 05,070.038a ahrīko vā vimūḍho vā naiva strī na punaḥ pumān
GE07mbh_05_u:7345: 05,070.038c nāsyādhikāro dharme 'sti yathā śūdras tathaiva saḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:7346: 05,070.039a hrīmān avati devāṃś ca pitṝn ātmānam eva ca
GE07mbh_05_u:7348: 05,070.040a tad idaṃ mayi te dṛṣṭaṃ pratyakṣaṃ madhusūdana
GE07mbh_05_u:7349: 05,070.040c yathā rājyāt paribhraṣṭo vasāmi vasatīr imāḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:7350: 05,070.041a te vayaṃ na śriyaṃ hātum alaṃ nyāyena kena cit
GE07mbh_05_u:7351: 05,070.041c atra no yatamānānāṃ vadhaś ced api sādhu tat
GE07mbh_05_u:7352: 05,070.042a tatra naḥ prathamaḥ kalpo yad vayaṃ te ca mādhava
GE07mbh_05_u:7353: 05,070.042c praśāntāḥ samabhūtāś ca śriyaṃ tān aśnuvīmahi
GE07mbh_05_u:7355: 05,070.043c yad vayaṃ kauravān hatvā tāni rāṣṭrāṇy aśīmahi
GE07mbh_05_u:7356: 05,070.044a ye punaḥ syur asaṃbaddhā anāryāḥ kṛṣṇa śatravaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:7357: 05,070.044c teṣām apy avadhaḥ kāryaḥ kiṃ punar ye syur īdṛśāḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:7358: 05,070.045a jñātayaś ca hi bhūyiṣṭhāḥ sahāyā guravaś ca naḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:7359: 05,070.045c teṣāṃ vadho 'tipāpīyān kiṃ nu yuddhe 'sti śobhanam
GE07mbh_05_u:7361: 05,070.046c sa naḥ svadharmo 'dharmo vā vṛttir anyā vigarhitā
GE07mbh_05_u:7363: 05,070.047c vayaṃ vadhena jīvāmaḥ kapālaṃ brāhmaṇair vṛtam
GE07mbh_05_u:7364: 05,070.048a kṣatriyaḥ kṣatriyaṃ hanti matsyo matsyena jīvati
GE07mbh_05_u:7365: 05,070.048c śvā śvānaṃ hanti dāśārha paśya dharmo yathāgataḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:7366: 05,070.049a yuddhe kṛṣṇa kalir nityaṃ prāṇāḥ sīdanti saṃyuge
GE07mbh_05_u:7369: 05,070.050c nāpy akāle sukhaṃ prāpyaṃ duḥkhaṃ vāpi yadūttama
GE07mbh_05_u:7370: 05,070.051a eko hy api bahūn hanti ghnanty ekaṃ bahavo 'py uta
GE07mbh_05_u:7372: 05,070.052a jayaś caivobhayor dṛṣṭa ubhayoś ca parājayaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:7374: 05,070.053a sarvathā vṛjinaṃ yuddhaṃ ko ghnan na pratihanyate
GE07mbh_05_u:7376: 05,070.054a parājayaś ca maraṇān manye naiva viśiṣyate
GE07mbh_05_u:7377: 05,070.054c yasya syād vijayaḥ kṛṣṇa tasyāpy apacayo dhruvam
GE07mbh_05_u:7378: 05,070.055a antato dayitaṃ ghnanti ke cid apy apare janāḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:7381: 05,070.056a ye hy eva vīrā hrīmanta āryāḥ karuṇavedinaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:7382: 05,070.056c ta eva yuddhe hanyante yavīyān mucyate janaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:7383: 05,070.057a hatvāpy anuśayo nityaṃ parān api janārdana
GE07mbh_05_u:7384: 05,070.057c anubandhaś ca pāpo 'tra śeṣaś cāpy avaśiṣyate
GE07mbh_05_u:7385: 05,070.058a śeṣo hi balam āsādya na śeṣam avaśeṣayet
GE07mbh_05_u:7387: 05,070.059a jayo vairaṃ prasṛjati duḥkham āste parājitaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:7389: 05,070.060a jātavairaś ca puruṣo duḥkhaṃ svapiti nityadā
GE07mbh_05_u:7391: 05,070.061a utsādayati yaḥ sarvaṃ yaśasā sa viyujyate
GE07mbh_05_u:7393: 05,070.062a na hi vairāṇi śāmyanti dīrghakālakṛtāny api
GE07mbh_05_u:7394: 05,070.062c ākhyātāraś ca vidyante pumāṃś cotpadyate kule
GE07mbh_05_u:7395: 05,070.063a na cāpi vairaṃ vaireṇa keśava vyupaśāmyati
GE07mbh_05_u:7397: 05,070.064a ato 'nyathā nāsti śāntir nityam antaram antataḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:7400: 05,070.065c tasya tyāgena vā śāntir nivṛttyā manaso 'pi vā
GE07mbh_05_u:7402: 05,070.066c phalanirvṛttir iddhā syāt tan nṛśaṃsataraṃ bhavet
GE07mbh_05_u:7403: 05,070.067a yā tu tyāgena śāntiḥ syāt tad ṛte vadha eva saḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:7404: 05,070.067c saṃśayāc ca samucchedād dviṣatām ātmanas tathā
GE07mbh_05_u:7405: 05,070.068a na ca tyaktuṃ tad icchāmo na cecchāmaḥ kulakṣayam
GE07mbh_05_u:7406: 05,070.068c atra yā praṇipātena śāntiḥ saiva garīyasī
GE07mbh_05_u:7410: 05,070.070c tac chunām iva gopāde paṇḍitair upalakṣitam
GE07mbh_05_u:7413: 05,070.072a tatra yo balavān kṛṣṇa jitvā so 'tti tad āmiṣam
GE07mbh_05_u:7414: 05,070.072c evam eva manuṣyeṣu viśeṣo nāsti kaś cana
GE07mbh_05_u:7415: 05,070.073a sarvathā tv etad ucitaṃ durbaleṣu balīyasām
GE07mbh_05_u:7416: 05,070.073c anādaro virodhaś ca praṇipātī hi durbalaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:7417: 05,070.074a pitā rājā ca vṛddhaś ca sarvathā mānam arhati
GE07mbh_05_u:7418: 05,070.074c tasmān mānyaś ca pūjyaś ca dhṛtarāṣṭro janārdana
GE07mbh_05_u:7421: 05,070.076a tatra kiṃ manyase kṛṣṇa prāptakālam anantaram
GE07mbh_05_u:7422: 05,070.076c katham arthāc ca dharmāc ca na hīyemahi mādhava
GE07mbh_05_u:7423: 05,070.077a īdṛśe hy arthakṛcchre 'smin kam anyaṃ madhusūdana
GE07mbh_05_u:7425: 05,070.078a priyaś ca priyakāmaś ca gatijñaḥ sarvakarmaṇām
GE07mbh_05_u:7426: 05,070.078c ko hi kṛṣṇāsti nas tvādṛk sarvaniścayavit suhṛt
GE07mbh_05_u:7429: 05,070.079c ubhayor eva vām arthe yāsyāmi kurusaṃsadam
GE07mbh_05_u:7430: 05,070.080a śamaṃ tatra labheyaṃ ced yuṣmadartham ahāpayan
GE07mbh_05_u:7431: 05,070.080c puṇyaṃ me sumahad rājaṃś caritaṃ syān mahāphalam
GE07mbh_05_u:7433: 05,070.081c pāṇḍavān dhārtarāṣṭrāṃś ca sarvāṃ ca pṛthivīm imām
GE07mbh_05_u:7437: 05,070.082a na mamaitan mataṃ kṛṣṇa yat tvaṃ yāyāḥ kurūn prati
GE07mbh_05_u:7438: 05,070.082c suyodhanaḥ sūktam api na kariṣyati te vacaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:7439: 05,070.082d*0372_01 suyodhanaś ca duṣṭātmā karṇaś ca sahasaubalaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:7441: 05,070.083c teṣāṃ madhyāvataraṇaṃ tava kṛṣṇa na rocaye
GE07mbh_05_u:7442: 05,070.084a na hi naḥ prīṇayed dravyaṃ na devatvaṃ kutaḥ sukham
GE07mbh_05_u:7443: 05,070.084c na ca sarvāmaraiśvaryaṃ tava rodhena mādhava
GE07mbh_05_u:7447: 05,070.086a na cāpi mama paryāptāḥ sahitāḥ sarvapārthivāḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:7449: 05,070.087a atha cet te pravarteran mayi kiṃ cid asāṃpratam
GE07mbh_05_u:7450: 05,070.087c nirdaheyaṃ kurūn sarvān iti me dhīyate matiḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:7451: 05,070.088a na jātu gamanaṃ tatra bhavet pārtha nirarthakam
GE07mbh_05_u:7452: 05,070.088c arthaprāptiḥ kadā cit syād antato vāpy avācyatā
GE07mbh_05_u:7454: 05,070.089a yat tubhyaṃ rocate kṛṣṇa svasti prāpnuhi kauravān
GE07mbh_05_u:7456: 05,070.090a viṣvaksena kurūn gatvā bhāratāñ śamayeḥ prabho
GE07mbh_05_u:7457: 05,070.090c yathā sarve sumanasaḥ saha syāmaḥ sucetasaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:7458: 05,070.091a bhrātā cāsi sakhā cāsi bībhatsor mama ca priyaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:7460: 05,070.092a asmān vettha parān vettha vetthārthaṃ vettha bhāṣitam
GE07mbh_05_u:7461: 05,070.092c yad yad asmaddhitaṃ kṛṣṇa tat tad vācyaḥ suyodhanaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:7462: 05,070.093a yad yad dharmeṇa saṃyuktam upapadyed dhitaṃ vacaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:7463: 05,070.093c tat tat keśava bhāṣethāḥ sāntvaṃ vā yadi vetarat
GE07mbh_05_u:7465: 05,071.001a saṃjayasya śrutaṃ vākyaṃ bhavataś ca śrutaṃ mayā
GE07mbh_05_u:7466: 05,071.001c sarvaṃ jānāmy abhiprāyaṃ teṣāṃ ca bhavataś ca yaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:7467: 05,071.002a tava dharmāśritā buddhis teṣāṃ vairāśritā matiḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:7468: 05,071.002c yad ayuddhena labhyeta tat te bahumataṃ bhavet
GE07mbh_05_u:7469: 05,071.003a na ca tan naiṣṭhikaṃ karma kṣatriyasya viśāṃ pate
GE07mbh_05_u:7470: 05,071.003c āhur āśramiṇaḥ sarve yad bhaikṣaṃ kṣatriyaś caret
GE07mbh_05_u:7471: 05,071.004a jayo vadho vā saṃgrāme dhātrā diṣṭaḥ sanātanaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:7473: 05,071.005a na hi kārpaṇyam āsthāya śakyā vṛttir yudhiṣṭhira
GE07mbh_05_u:7477: 05,071.007a na paryāyo 'sti yat sāmyaṃ tvayi kuryur viśāṃ pate
GE07mbh_05_u:7480: 05,071.008c tāvad ete hariṣyanti tava rājyam ariṃdama
GE07mbh_05_u:7481: 05,071.009a nānukrośān na kārpaṇyān na ca dharmārthakāraṇāt
GE07mbh_05_u:7482: 05,071.009c alaṃ kartuṃ dhārtarāṣṭrās tava kāmam ariṃdama
GE07mbh_05_u:7483: 05,071.010a etad eva nimittaṃ te pāṇḍavās tu yathā tvayi
GE07mbh_05_u:7486: 05,071.011b*0373_01 brāhmaṇānāṃ ca sādhūnāṃ rājñaś ca nagarasya ca
GE07mbh_05_u:7489: 05,071.012c yat tvām upadhinā rājan dyūtenāvañcayat tadā
GE07mbh_05_u:7490: 05,071.012e na cāpatrapate pāpo nṛśaṃsas tena karmaṇā
GE07mbh_05_u:7492: 05,071.013c vadhyās te sarvalokasya kiṃ punas tava bhārata
GE07mbh_05_u:7494: 05,071.014c ślāghamānaḥ prahṛṣṭaḥ san bhāṣate bhrātṛbhiḥ saha
GE07mbh_05_u:7495: 05,071.015a etāvat pāṇḍavānāṃ hi nāsti kiṃ cid iha svakam
GE07mbh_05_u:7496: 05,071.015c nāmadheyaṃ ca gotraṃ ca tad apy eṣāṃ na śiṣyate
GE07mbh_05_u:7504: 05,071.016d*0374_06 dharmapāśanibaddhāś ca na kiṃ cit pratipedire
GE07mbh_05_u:7505: 05,071.017a etāś cānyāś ca paruṣā vācaḥ sa samudīrayan
GE07mbh_05_u:7506: 05,071.017c ślāghate jñātimadhye sma tvayi pravrajite vanam
GE07mbh_05_u:7507: 05,071.018a ye tatrāsan samānītās te dṛṣṭvā tvām anāgasam
GE07mbh_05_u:7508: 05,071.018c aśrukaṇṭhā rudantaś ca sabhāyām āsate tadā
GE07mbh_05_u:7509: 05,071.019a na cainam abhyanandaṃs te rājāno brāhmaṇaiḥ saha
GE07mbh_05_u:7510: 05,071.019c sarve duryodhanaṃ tatra nindanti sma sabhāsadaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:7511: 05,071.020a kulīnasya ca yā nindā vadhaś cāmitrakarśana
GE07mbh_05_u:7512: 05,071.020c mahāguṇo vadho rājan na tu nindā kujīvikā
GE07mbh_05_u:7515: 05,071.022a īṣatkāryo vadhas tasya yasya cāritram īdṛśam
GE07mbh_05_u:7518: 05,071.023c jahy enaṃ tvam amitraghna mā rājan vicikitsithāḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:7519: 05,071.024a sarvathā tvatkṣamaṃ caitad rocate ca mamānagha
GE07mbh_05_u:7520: 05,071.024c yat tvaṃ pitari bhīṣme ca praṇipātaṃ samācareḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:7521: 05,071.025a ahaṃ tu sarvalokasya gatvā chetsyāmi saṃśayam
GE07mbh_05_u:7522: 05,071.025c yeṣām asti dvidhābhāvo rājan duryodhanaṃ prati
GE07mbh_05_u:7523: 05,071.026a madhye rājñām ahaṃ tatra prātipauruṣikān guṇān
GE07mbh_05_u:7524: 05,071.026c tava saṃkīrtayiṣyāmi ye ca tasya vyatikramāḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:7525: 05,071.027a bruvatas tatra me vākyaṃ dharmārthasahitaṃ hitam
GE07mbh_05_u:7531: 05,071.030a śamaṃ ced yācamānas tvaṃ na dharmaṃ tatra lapsyase
GE07mbh_05_u:7534: 05,071.031c hate duryodhane rājan yad anyat kriyatām iti
GE07mbh_05_u:7535: 05,071.032a yātvā cāhaṃ kurūn sarvān yuṣmadartham ahāpayan
GE07mbh_05_u:7536: 05,071.032c yatiṣye praśamaṃ kartuṃ lakṣayiṣye ca ceṣṭitam
GE07mbh_05_u:7539: 05,071.034a sarvathā yuddham evāham āśaṃsāmi paraiḥ saha
GE07mbh_05_u:7540: 05,071.034c nimittāni hi sarvāṇi tathā prādurbhavanti me
GE07mbh_05_u:7553: 05,071.037a duryodhano na hy alam adya dātuṃ;
GE07mbh_05_u:7558: 05,072.001a yathā yathaiva śāntiḥ syāt kurūṇāṃ madhusūdana
GE07mbh_05_u:7559: 05,072.001c tathā tathaiva bhāṣethā mā sma yuddhena bhīṣayeḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:7562: 05,072.003a prakṛtyā pāpasattvaś ca tulyacetāś ca dasyubhiḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:7566: 05,072.005a mriyetāpi na bhajyeta naiva jahyāt svakaṃ matam
GE07mbh_05_u:7569: 05,072.006c pratihanty eva suhṛdāṃ vācaś caiva manāṃsi ca
GE07mbh_05_u:7570: 05,072.007a sa manyuvaśam āpannaḥ svabhāvaṃ duṣṭam āsthitaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:7571: 05,072.007c svabhāvāt pāpam anveti tṛṇais tunna ivoragaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:7572: 05,072.008a duryodhano hi yat senaḥ sarvathā viditas tava
GE07mbh_05_u:7574: 05,072.009a purā prasannāḥ kuravaḥ sahaputrās tathā vayam
GE07mbh_05_u:7579: 05,072.011c ye samuccicchidur jñātīn suhṛdaś ca sabāndhavān
GE07mbh_05_u:7590: 05,072.017a śamaś ca nandivegānām ity ete kulapāṃsanāḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:7592: 05,072.018a apy ayaṃ naḥ kurūṇāṃ syād yugānte kālasaṃbhṛtaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:7594: 05,072.019a tasmān mṛdu śanair enaṃ brūyā dharmārthasaṃhitam
GE07mbh_05_u:7596: 05,072.020a api duryodhanaṃ kṛṣṇa sarve vayam adhaścarāḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:7597: 05,072.020c nīcair bhūtvānuyāsyāmo mā sma no bharatā naśan
GE07mbh_05_u:7598: 05,072.021a apy udāsīnavṛttiḥ syād yathā naḥ kurubhiḥ saha
GE07mbh_05_u:7599: 05,072.021c vāsudeva tathā kāryaṃ na kurūn anayaḥ spṛśet
GE07mbh_05_u:7600: 05,072.022a vācyaḥ pitāmaho vṛddho ye ca kṛṣṇa sabhāsadaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:7602: 05,072.023a aham etad bravīmy evaṃ rājā caiva praśaṃsati
GE07mbh_05_u:7603: 05,072.023c arjuno naiva yuddhārthī bhūyasī hi dayārjune
GE07mbh_05_u:7605: 05,073.001a etac chrutvā mahābāhuḥ keśavaḥ prahasann iva
GE07mbh_05_u:7607: 05,073.002a girer iva laghutvaṃ tac chītatvam iva pāvake
GE07mbh_05_u:7611: 05,073.004a tvam anyadā bhīmasena yuddham eva praśaṃsasi
GE07mbh_05_u:7613: 05,073.005a na ca svapiṣi jāgarṣi nyubjaḥ śeṣe paraṃtapa
GE07mbh_05_u:7614: 05,073.005c ghorām aśāntāṃ ruśatīṃ sadā vācaṃ prabhāṣase
GE07mbh_05_u:7617: 05,073.007a ekānte niṣṭanañ śeṣe bhārārta iva durbalaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:7618: 05,073.007c api tvāṃ ke cid unmattaṃ manyante 'tadvido janāḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:7619: 05,073.008a ārujya vṛkṣān nirmūlān gajaḥ paribhujann iva
GE07mbh_05_u:7620: 05,073.008c nighnan padbhiḥ kṣitiṃ bhīma niṣṭanan paridhāvasi
GE07mbh_05_u:7622: 05,073.009c nānyaṃ niśi divā vāpi kadā cid abhinandasi
GE07mbh_05_u:7623: 05,073.010a akasmāt smayamānaś ca rahasy āsse rudann iva
GE07mbh_05_u:7624: 05,073.010c jānvor mūrdhānam ādhāya ciram āsse pramīlitaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:7625: 05,073.011a bhrukuṭiṃ ca punaḥ kurvann oṣṭhau ca vilihann iva
GE07mbh_05_u:7626: 05,073.011c abhīkṣṇaṃ dṛśyase bhīma sarvaṃ tan manyukāritam
GE07mbh_05_u:7627: 05,073.012a yathā purastāt savitā dṛśyate śukram uccaran
GE07mbh_05_u:7628: 05,073.012c yathā ca paścān nirmukto dhruvaṃ paryeti raśmivān
GE07mbh_05_u:7629: 05,073.013a tathā satyaṃ bravīmy etan nāsti tasya vyatikramaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:7631: 05,073.014a iti sma madhye bhrātṝṇāṃ satyenālabhase gadām
GE07mbh_05_u:7632: 05,073.014c tasya te praśame buddhir dhīyate 'dya paraṃtapa
GE07mbh_05_u:7634: 05,073.015c paśyasīvāpratīpāni kiṃ tvāṃ bhīr bhīma vindati
GE07mbh_05_u:7636: 05,073.016c svapnānte jāgarānte ca tasmāt praśamam icchasi
GE07mbh_05_u:7637: 05,073.017a aho nāśaṃsase kiṃ cit puṃstvaṃ klība ivātmani
GE07mbh_05_u:7639: 05,073.018a udvepate te hṛdayaṃ manas te praviṣīdati
GE07mbh_05_u:7641: 05,073.019a anityaṃ kila martyasya cittaṃ pārtha calācalam
GE07mbh_05_u:7643: 05,073.020a tavaiṣā vikṛtā buddhir gavāṃ vāg iva mānuṣī
GE07mbh_05_u:7645: 05,073.021a idaṃ me mahad āścaryaṃ parvatasyeva sarpaṇam
GE07mbh_05_u:7647: 05,073.022a sa dṛṣṭvā svāni karmāṇi kule janma ca bhārata
GE07mbh_05_u:7648: 05,073.022c uttiṣṭhasva viṣādaṃ mā kṛthā vīra sthiro bhava
GE07mbh_05_u:7649: 05,073.023a na caitad anurūpaṃ te yat te glānir ariṃdama
GE07mbh_05_u:7650: 05,073.023c yad ojasā na labhate kṣatriyo na tad aśnute
GE07mbh_05_u:7656: 05,074.003a vettha dāśārha sattvaṃ me dīrghakālaṃ sahoṣitaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:7657: 05,074.003c uta vā māṃ na jānāsi plavan hrada ivālpavaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:7658: 05,074.003e tasmād apratirūpābhir vāgbhir māṃ tvaṃ samarchasi
GE07mbh_05_u:7659: 05,074.004a kathaṃ hi bhīmasenaṃ māṃ jānan kaś cana mādhava
GE07mbh_05_u:7660: 05,074.004c brūyād apratirūpāṇi yathā māṃ vaktum arhasi
GE07mbh_05_u:7662: 05,074.005c ātmanaḥ pauruṣaṃ caiva balaṃ ca na samaṃ paraiḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:7665: 05,074.007a paśyeme rodasī kṛṣṇa yayor āsann imāḥ prajāḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:7666: 05,074.007c acale cāpy anante ca pratiṣṭhe sarvamātarau
GE07mbh_05_u:7667: 05,074.008a yadīme sahasā kruddhe sameyātāṃ śile iva
GE07mbh_05_u:7670: 05,074.009c ya etat prāpya mucyeta na taṃ paśyāmi pūruṣam
GE07mbh_05_u:7671: 05,074.010a himavāṃś ca samudraś ca vajrī ca balabhit svayam
GE07mbh_05_u:7672: 05,074.010c mayābhipannaṃ trāyeran balam āsthāya na trayaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:7675: 05,074.012a na hi tvaṃ nābhijānāsi mama vikramam acyuta
GE07mbh_05_u:7676: 05,074.012c yathā mayā vinirjitya rājāno vaśagāḥ kṛtāḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:7677: 05,074.013a atha cen māṃ na jānāsi sūryasyevodyataḥ prabhām
GE07mbh_05_u:7678: 05,074.013c vigāḍhe yudhi saṃbādhe vetsyase māṃ janārdana
GE07mbh_05_u:7679: 05,074.014a kiṃ mātyavākṣīḥ paruṣair vraṇaṃ sūcyā ivānagha
GE07mbh_05_u:7680: 05,074.014c yathāmati bravīmy etad viddhi mām adhikaṃ tataḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:7682: 05,074.015c mayā praṇunnān mātaṅgān rathinaḥ sādinas tathā
GE07mbh_05_u:7684: 05,074.016c draṣṭā māṃ tvaṃ ca lokaś ca vikarṣantaṃ varān varān
GE07mbh_05_u:7685: 05,074.017a na me sīdanti majjāno na mamodvepate manaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:7686: 05,074.017c sarvalokād abhikruddhān na bhayaṃ vidyate mama
GE07mbh_05_u:7687: 05,074.018a kiṃ tu sauhṛdam evaitat kṛpayā madhusūdana
GE07mbh_05_u:7688: 05,074.018c sarvāṃs titikṣe saṃkleśān mā sma no bharatā naśan
GE07mbh_05_u:7691: 05,075.001c na cākṣepān na pāṇḍityān na krodhān na vivakṣayā
GE07mbh_05_u:7692: 05,075.002a vedāhaṃ tava māhātmyam uta te veda yad balam
GE07mbh_05_u:7693: 05,075.002c uta te veda karmāṇi na tvāṃ paribhavāmy aham
GE07mbh_05_u:7695: 05,075.003c sahasraguṇam apy etat tvayi saṃbhāvayāmy aham
GE07mbh_05_u:7697: 05,075.004c bandhubhiś ca suhṛdbhiś ca bhīma tvam asi tādṛśaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:7700: 05,075.006a sa eva hetur bhūtvā hi puruṣasyārthasiddhiṣu
GE07mbh_05_u:7701: 05,075.006c vināśe 'pi sa evāsya saṃdigdhaṃ karma pauruṣam
GE07mbh_05_u:7706: 05,075.009a daivam apy akṛtaṃ karma pauruṣeṇa vihanyate
GE07mbh_05_u:7707: 05,075.009c śītam uṣṇaṃ tathā varṣaṃ kṣutpipāse ca bhārata
GE07mbh_05_u:7709: 05,075.010c tasmād anavarodhaś ca vidyate tatra lakṣaṇam
GE07mbh_05_u:7714: 05,075.012a ya evaṃ kṛtabuddhiḥ san karmasv eva pravartate
GE07mbh_05_u:7715: 05,075.012c nāsiddhau vyathate tasya na siddhau harṣam aśnute
GE07mbh_05_u:7719: 05,075.014c viṣādam arched glāniṃ vā etadarthaṃ bravīmi te
GE07mbh_05_u:7722: 05,075.016a śamaṃ cet te kariṣyanti tato 'nantaṃ yaśo mama
GE07mbh_05_u:7723: 05,075.016c bhavatāṃ ca kṛtaḥ kāmas teṣāṃ ca śreya uttamam
GE07mbh_05_u:7724: 05,075.017a te ced abhinivekṣyanti nābhyupaiṣyanti me vacaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:7725: 05,075.017c kuravo yuddham evātra raudraṃ karma bhaviṣyati
GE07mbh_05_u:7726: 05,075.018a asmin yuddhe bhīmasena tvayi bhāraḥ samāhitaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:7727: 05,075.018c dhūr arjunena dhāryā syād voḍhavya itaro janaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:7728: 05,075.019a ahaṃ hi yantā bībhatsor bhavitā saṃyuge sati
GE07mbh_05_u:7729: 05,075.019c dhanaṃjayasyaiṣa kāmo na hi yuddhaṃ na kāmaye
GE07mbh_05_u:7731: 05,075.020c tudann aklībayā vācā tejas te samadīpayam
GE07mbh_05_u:7734: 05,076.001c tava vākyaṃ tu me śrutvā pratibhāti paraṃtapa
GE07mbh_05_u:7735: 05,076.002a naiva praśamam atra tvaṃ manyase sukaraṃ prabho
GE07mbh_05_u:7736: 05,076.002c lobhād vā dhṛtarāṣṭrasya dainyād vā samupasthitāt
GE07mbh_05_u:7739: 05,076.004a tad idaṃ bhāṣitaṃ vākyaṃ tathā ca na tathaiva ca
GE07mbh_05_u:7740: 05,076.004c na caitad evaṃ draṣṭavyam asādhyam iti kiṃ cana
GE07mbh_05_u:7741: 05,076.005a kiṃ caitan manyase kṛcchram asmākaṃ pāpam āditaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:7742: 05,076.005c kurvanti teṣāṃ karmāṇi yeṣāṃ nāsti phalodayaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:7743: 05,076.006a saṃpādyamānaṃ samyak ca syāt karma saphalaṃ prabho
GE07mbh_05_u:7744: 05,076.006c sa tathā kṛṣṇa vartasva yathā śarma bhavet paraiḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:7745: 05,076.007a pāṇḍavānāṃ kurūṇāṃ ca bhavān paramakaḥ suhṛt
GE07mbh_05_u:7746: 05,076.007c surāṇām asurāṇāṃ ca yathā vīra prajāpatiḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:7748: 05,076.008c asmaddhitam anuṣṭhātuṃ na manye tava duṣkaram
GE07mbh_05_u:7749: 05,076.009a evaṃ cet kāryatām eti kāryaṃ tava janārdana
GE07mbh_05_u:7750: 05,076.009c gamanād evam eva tvaṃ kariṣyasi na saṃśayaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:7751: 05,076.010a cikīrṣitam athānyat te tasmin vīra durātmani
GE07mbh_05_u:7752: 05,076.010c bhaviṣyati tathā sarvaṃ yathā tava cikīrṣitam
GE07mbh_05_u:7753: 05,076.011a śarma taiḥ saha vā no 'stu tava vā yac cikīrṣitam
GE07mbh_05_u:7754: 05,076.011c vicāryamāṇo yaḥ kāmas tava kṛṣṇa sa no guruḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:7755: 05,076.012a na sa nārhati duṣṭātmā vadhaṃ sasutabāndhavaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:7756: 05,076.012c yena dharmasute dṛṣṭvā na sā śrīr upamarṣitā
GE07mbh_05_u:7759: 05,076.014a kathaṃ hi puruṣo jātaḥ kṣatriyeṣu dhanurdharaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:7761: 05,076.015a adharmeṇa jitān dṛṣṭvā vane pravrajitāṃs tathā
GE07mbh_05_u:7763: 05,076.016a na caitad adbhutaṃ kṛṣṇa mitrārthe yac cikīrṣasi
GE07mbh_05_u:7764: 05,076.016c kriyā kathaṃ nu mukhyā syān mṛdunā vetareṇa vā
GE07mbh_05_u:7765: 05,076.017a atha vā manyase jyāyān vadhas teṣām anantaram
GE07mbh_05_u:7766: 05,076.017c tad eva kriyatām āśu na vicāryam atas tvayā
GE07mbh_05_u:7767: 05,076.018a jānāsi hi yathā tena draupadī pāpabuddhinā
GE07mbh_05_u:7768: 05,076.018c parikliṣṭā sabhāmadhye tac ca tasyāpi marṣitam
GE07mbh_05_u:7769: 05,076.019a sa nāma samyag varteta pāṇḍaveṣv iti mādhava
GE07mbh_05_u:7770: 05,076.019c na me saṃjāyate buddhir bījam uptam ivoṣare
GE07mbh_05_u:7771: 05,076.020a tasmād yan manyase yuktaṃ pāṇḍavānāṃ ca yad dhitam
GE07mbh_05_u:7772: 05,076.020c tad āśu kuru vārṣṇeya yan naḥ kāryam anantaram
GE07mbh_05_u:7774: 05,077.001a evam etan mahābāho yathā vadasi pāṇḍava
GE07mbh_05_u:7776: 05,077.001c sarvaṃ tv idaṃ samāyattaṃ bībhatso karmaṇor dvayoḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:7778: 05,077.002c ṛte varṣaṃ na kaunteya jātu nirvartayet phalam
GE07mbh_05_u:7779: 05,077.003a tatra vai pauruṣaṃ brūyur āsekaṃ yatnakāritam
GE07mbh_05_u:7780: 05,077.003c tatra cāpi dhruvaṃ paśyec choṣaṇaṃ daivakāritam
GE07mbh_05_u:7781: 05,077.004a tad idaṃ niścitaṃ buddhyā pūrvair api mahātmabhiḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:7782: 05,077.004c daive ca mānuṣe caiva saṃyuktaṃ lokakāraṇam
GE07mbh_05_u:7783: 05,077.005a ahaṃ hi tat kariṣyāmi paraṃ puruṣakārataḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:7784: 05,077.005c daivaṃ tu na mayā śakyaṃ karma kartuṃ kathaṃ cana
GE07mbh_05_u:7785: 05,077.006a sa hi dharmaṃ ca satyaṃ ca tyaktvā carati durmatiḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:7786: 05,077.006c na hi saṃtapyate tena tathārūpeṇa karmaṇā
GE07mbh_05_u:7787: 05,077.007a tāṃ cāpi buddhiṃ pāpiṣṭhāṃ vardhayanty asya mantriṇaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:7788: 05,077.007c śakuniḥ sūtaputraś ca bhrātā duḥśāsanas tathā
GE07mbh_05_u:7789: 05,077.008a sa hi tyāgena rājyasya na śamaṃ samupeṣyati
GE07mbh_05_u:7791: 05,077.009a na cāpi praṇipātena tyaktum icchati dharmarāṭ
GE07mbh_05_u:7792: 05,077.009c yācyamānas tu rājyaṃ sa na pradāsyati durmatiḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:7793: 05,077.010a na tu manye sa tad vācyo yad yudhiṣṭhiraśāsanam
GE07mbh_05_u:7795: 05,077.011a tathā pāpas tu tat sarvaṃ na kariṣyati kauravaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:7797: 05,077.012a mama cāpi sa vadhyo vai jagataś cāpi bhārata
GE07mbh_05_u:7798: 05,077.012c yena kaumārake yūyaṃ sarve viprakṛtās tathā
GE07mbh_05_u:7799: 05,077.013a vipraluptaṃ ca vo rājyaṃ nṛśaṃsena durātmanā
GE07mbh_05_u:7800: 05,077.013c na copaśāmyate pāpaḥ śriyaṃ dṛṣṭvā yudhiṣṭhire
GE07mbh_05_u:7801: 05,077.014a asakṛc cāpy ahaṃ tena tvatkṛte pārtha bheditaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:7802: 05,077.014c na mayā tad gṛhītaṃ ca pāpaṃ tasya cikīrṣitam
GE07mbh_05_u:7803: 05,077.015a jānāsi hi mahābāho tvam apy asya paraṃ matam
GE07mbh_05_u:7804: 05,077.015c priyaṃ cikīrṣamāṇaṃ ca dharmarājasya mām api

GE07mbh_05_u:8300: 05,085.005a ārjavaṃ pratipadyasva mā bālyād bahudhā naśīḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:8301: 05,085.005c rājyaṃ putrāṃś ca pautrāṃś ca suhṛdaś cāpi supriyān
GE07mbh_05_u:8302: 05,085.006a yat tvaṃ ditsasi kṛṣṇāya rājann atithaye bahu

GE07mbh_05_u:8307: 05,085.008c jānāmi te mataṃ rājan gūḍhaṃ bāhyena karmaṇā

GE07mbh_05_u:8312: 05,085.011a na ca vittena śakyo 'sau nodyamena na garhayā

GE07mbh_05_u:8329: 05,086.001a yad āha viduraḥ kṛṣṇe sarvaṃ tat satyam ucyate
GE07mbh_05_u:8330: 05,086.001c anurakto hy asaṃhāryaḥ pārthān prati janārdanaḥ

GE07mbh_05_u:8333: 05,086.003a deśaḥ kālas tathāyukto na hi nārhati keśavaḥ

GE07mbh_05_u:8338: 05,086.005c trayāṇām api lokānāṃ viditaṃ mama sarvathā
GE07mbh_05_u:8339: 05,086.006a na tu tasmin pradeyaṃ syāt tathā kāryagatiḥ prabho
GE07mbh_05_u:8340: 05,086.006c vigrahaḥ samupārabdho na hi śāmyaty avigrahāt
GE07mbh_05_u:8342: 05,086.007a tasya tad vacanaṃ śrutvā bhīṣmaḥ kurupitāmahaḥ

GE07mbh_05_u:8356: 05,086.013b*0393_01 na bhedasyāntaraṃ dātuṃ prayāṇāyāsya vā punaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:8358: 05,086.014a tasmin baddhe bhaviṣyanti vṛṣṇayaḥ pṛthivī tathā

GE07mbh_05_u:8360: 05,086.015a atropāyaṃ yathā samyaṅ na budhyeta janārdanaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:8361: 05,086.015c na cāpāyo bhavet kaś cit tad bhavān prabravītu me
GE07mbh_05_u:8363: 05,086.016a tasya tad vacanaṃ śrutvā ghoraṃ kṛṣṇābhisaṃhitam
GE07mbh_05_u:8366: 05,086.017c maivaṃ vocaḥ prajāpāla naiṣa dharmaḥ sanātanaḥ

GE07mbh_05_u:8407: 05,087.010a tathā ca gatimantas te vāsudevasya vājinaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:8415: 05,087.014a kṛpaś ca somadattaś ca mahārājaś ca bāhlikaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:8418: 05,087.015c sa bhīṣmaṃ pūjayām āsa vārṣṇeyo vāgbhir añjasā
GE07mbh_05_u:8422: 05,087.017a atha droṇaṃ saputraṃ sa bāhlīkaṃ ca yaśasvinam
GE07mbh_05_u:8423: 05,087.017c kṛpaṃ ca somadattaṃ ca samīyāya janārdanaḥ

GE07mbh_05_u:8447: 05,088.002c kaṇṭhe gṛhītvā prākrośat pṛthā pārthān anusmaran
GE07mbh_05_u:8449: 05,088.003c cirasya dṛṣṭvā vārṣṇeyaṃ bāṣpam āhārayat pṛthā

GE07mbh_05_u:8515: 05,088.034c mṛduś ca sukumāraś ca dhārmikaś ca priyaś ca me

GE07mbh_05_u:12982: 05,149.071c paryakrāmat samantāc ca pārthena saha keśavaḥ

GE07mbh_05_u:12988: 05,149.074c guptyartham api cādiśya balaṃ tatra nyaveśayat
GE07mbh_05_u:12993: 05,149.077a śibirāṇi mahārhāṇi rājñāṃ tatra pṛthak pṛthak
GE07mbh_05_u:13002: 05,149.081c dhanūṃṣi kavacādīni hṛdy abhūvan nṛṇāṃ tadā
GE07mbh_05_u:13005: 05,149.083a niviṣṭān pāṇḍavāṃs tatra jñātvā mitrāṇi bhārata
GE07mbh_05_u:13013: 05,150.002c kekayair vṛṣṇibhiś caiva pārthivaiḥ śataśo vṛtam

GE07mbh_05_u:13023: 05,150.007c kurūṇāṃ pāṇḍavānāṃ ca yad yad āsīd viceṣṭitam
GE07mbh_05_u:13025: 05,150.008a pratiyāte tu dāśārhe rājā duryodhanas tadā
GE07mbh_05_u:13026: 05,150.008c karṇaṃ duḥśāsanaṃ caiva śakuniṃ cābravīd idam
GE07mbh_05_u:13028: 05,150.009c sa enān manyunāviṣṭo dhruvaṃ vakṣyaty asaṃśayam
GE07mbh_05_u:13029: 05,150.010a iṣṭo hi vāsudevasya pāṇḍavair mama vigrahaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:13032: 05,150.011c nikṛtaś ca mayā pūrvaṃ saha sarvaiḥ sahodaraiḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:13042: 05,150.016a samāś ca teṣāṃ panthānaḥ kriyantāṃ nagarād bahiḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:13043: 05,150.016c prayāṇaṃ ghuṣyatām adya śvobhūta iti māciram
GE07mbh_05_u:13044: 05,150.017a te tatheti pratijñāya śvobhūte cakrire tathā

GE07mbh_05_u:13053: 05,150.021c sajjayanti sma nāgāṃś ca nāgaśikṣāsu niṣṭhitāḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:13054: 05,150.022a atha varmāṇi citrāṇi kāñcanāni bahūni ca

GE07mbh_05_u:13068: 05,151.001c punaḥ papraccha vārṣṇeyaṃ kathaṃ mando 'bravīd idam
GE07mbh_05_u:13069: 05,151.002a asminn abhyāgate kāle kiṃ ca naḥ kṣamam acyuta
GE07mbh_05_u:13070: 05,151.002c kathaṃ ca vartamānā vai svadharmān na cyavemahi
GE07mbh_05_u:13073: 05,151.004a vidurasyāpi te vākyaṃ śrutaṃ bhīṣmasya cobhayoḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:13074: 05,151.004c kuntyāś ca vipulaprajña prajñā kārtsnyena te śrutā
GE07mbh_05_u:13075: 05,151.005a sarvam etad atikramya vicārya ca punaḥ punaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:13076: 05,151.005c yan naḥ kṣamaṃ mahābāho tad bravīhy avicārayan
GE07mbh_05_u:13079: 05,151.007a uktavān asmi yad vākyaṃ dharmārthasahitaṃ hitam
GE07mbh_05_u:13080: 05,151.007c na tu tan nikṛtiprajñe kauravye pratitiṣṭhati
GE07mbh_05_u:13081: 05,151.008a na ca bhīṣmasya durmedhāḥ śṛṇoti vidurasya vā
GE07mbh_05_u:13082: 05,151.008c mama vā bhāṣitaṃ kiṃ cit sarvam evātivartate
GE07mbh_05_u:13083: 05,151.009a na sa kāmayate dharmaṃ na sa kāmayate yaśaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:13084: 05,151.009c jitaṃ sa manyate sarvaṃ durātmā karṇam āśritaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:13085: 05,151.010a bandham ājñāpayām āsa mama cāpi suyodhanaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:13086: 05,151.010c na ca taṃ labdhavān kāmaṃ durātmā śāsanātigaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:13087: 05,151.011a na ca bhīṣmo na ca droṇo yuktaṃ tatrāhatur vacaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:13088: 05,151.011c sarve tam anuvartante ṛte viduram acyuta
GE07mbh_05_u:13090: 05,151.012c tvayy ayuktāny abhāṣanta mūḍhā mūḍham amarṣaṇam
GE07mbh_05_u:13091: 05,151.013a kiṃ ca tena mayoktena yāny abhāṣanta kauravāḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:13092: 05,151.013c saṃkṣepeṇa durātmāsau na yuktaṃ tvayi vartate
GE07mbh_05_u:13093: 05,151.014a na pārthiveṣu sarveṣu ya ime tava sainikāḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:13094: 05,151.014c yat pāpaṃ yan na kalyāṇaṃ sarvaṃ tasmin pratiṣṭhitam
GE07mbh_05_u:13095: 05,151.015a na cāpi vayam atyarthaṃ parityāgena karhi cit
GE07mbh_05_u:13096: 05,151.015c kauravaiḥ śamam icchāmas tatra yuddham anantaram
GE07mbh_05_u:13097: 05,151.016a tac chrutvā pārthivāḥ sarve vāsudevasya bhāṣitam
GE07mbh_05_u:13104: 05,151.019c niṣṭanan bhīmasenaṃ ca vijayaṃ cedam abravīt
GE07mbh_05_u:13105: 05,151.020a yadarthaṃ vanavāsaś ca prāptaṃ duḥkhaṃ ca yan mayā
GE07mbh_05_u:13106: 05,151.020c so 'yam asmān upaity eva paro 'narthaḥ prayatnataḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:13107: 05,151.021a yasmin yatnaḥ kṛto 'smābhiḥ sa no hīnaḥ prayatnataḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:13108: 05,151.021c akṛte tu prayatne 'smān upāvṛttaḥ kalir mahān
GE07mbh_05_u:13109: 05,151.022a kathaṃ hy avadhyaiḥ saṃgrāmaḥ kāryaḥ saha bhaviṣyati
GE07mbh_05_u:13110: 05,151.022c kathaṃ hatvā gurūn vṛddhān vijayo no bhaviṣyati
GE07mbh_05_u:13112: 05,151.023c yad uktaṃ vāsudevena śrāvayām āsa tad vacaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:13113: 05,151.024a uktavān devakīputraḥ kuntyāś ca vidurasya ca
GE07mbh_05_u:13115: 05,151.025a na ca tau vakṣyato 'dharmam iti me naiṣṭhikī matiḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:13116: 05,151.025c na cāpi yuktaṃ kaunteya nivartitum ayudhyataḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:13118: 05,151.026c smayamāno 'bravīt pārtham evam etad iti bruvan
GE07mbh_05_u:13120: 05,151.027c pāṇḍaveyā mahārāja tāṃ rātriṃ sukham āvasan
GE07mbh_05_u:13122: 05,152.001a vyuṣitāyāṃ rajanyāṃ tu rājā duryodhanas tataḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:13123: 05,152.001c vyabhajat tāny anīkāni daśa caikaṃ ca bhārata
GE07mbh_05_u:13124: 05,152.002a narahastirathāśvānāṃ sāraṃ madhyaṃ ca phalgu ca
GE07mbh_05_u:13151: 05,152.011c tau cāpi rathināṃ śreṣṭhau rathī ca hayavit tathā
GE07mbh_05_u:13154: 05,152.013a yathā rathās tathā nāgā baddhakakṣyāḥ svalaṃkṛtāḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:13159: 05,152.015c tad babhūva balaṃ rājan kauravyasya sahasraśaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:13166: 05,152.019a rathasyāsan daśa gajā gajasya daśa vājinaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:13168: 05,152.020a rathasya nāgāḥ pañcāśan nāgasyāsañ śataṃ hayāḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:13170: 05,152.021a senā pañcaśataṃ nāgā rathās tāvanta eva ca

GE07mbh_05_u:13173: 05,152.022a vāhinī pṛtanā senā dhvajinī sādinī camūḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:13176: 05,152.023a akṣauhiṇyo daśaikā ca saṃkhyātāḥ sapta caiva ha
GE07mbh_05_u:13177: 05,152.023c akṣauhiṇyas tu saptaiva pāṇḍavānām abhūd balam
GE07mbh_05_u:13178: 05,152.023e akṣauhiṇyo daśaikā ca kauravāṇām abhūd balam
GE07mbh_05_u:13180: 05,152.024c senāmukhaṃ ca tisras tā gulma ity abhisaṃjñitaḥ

GE07mbh_05_u:13183: 05,152.026a tatra duryodhano rājā śūrān buddhimato narān
GE07mbh_05_u:13187: 05,152.028a kṛpaṃ droṇaṃ ca śalyaṃ ca saindhavaṃ ca mahāratham
GE07mbh_05_u:13188: 05,152.028c sudakṣiṇaṃ ca kāmbojaṃ kṛtavarmāṇam eva ca
GE07mbh_05_u:13189: 05,152.029a droṇaputraṃ ca karṇaṃ ca bhūriśravasam eva ca
GE07mbh_05_u:13190: 05,152.029c śakuniṃ saubalaṃ caiva bāhlīkaṃ ca mahāratham
GE07mbh_05_u:13191: 05,152.030a divase divase teṣāṃ prativelaṃ ca bhārata
GE07mbh_05_u:13192: 05,152.030c cakre sa vividhāḥ saṃjñāḥ pratyakṣaṃ ca punaḥ punaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:13193: 05,152.031a tathā viniyatāḥ sarve ye ca teṣāṃ padānugāḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:13198: 05,153.001c saha sarvair mahīpālair idaṃ vacanam abravīt
GE07mbh_05_u:13201: 05,153.003a na hi jātu dvayor buddhiḥ samā bhavati karhi cit
GE07mbh_05_u:13202: 05,153.003c śauryaṃ ca nāma netṝṇāṃ spardhate ca parasparam
GE07mbh_05_u:13205: 05,153.005a tān anvayus tadā vaiśyāḥ śūdrāś caiva pitāmaha
GE07mbh_05_u:13206: 05,153.005c ekatas tu trayo varṇā ekataḥ kṣatriyarṣabhāḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:13207: 05,153.006a te sma yuddheṣv abhajyanta trayo varṇāḥ punaḥ punaḥ

GE07mbh_05_u:13209: 05,153.006c kṣatriyās tu jayanty eva bahulaṃ caikato balam

GE07mbh_05_u:13215: 05,153.009c nayeṣu kuśalaṃ śūram ajayan kṣatriyāṃs tataḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:13216: 05,153.010a evaṃ ye kuśalaṃ śūraṃ hite sthitam akalmaṣam
GE07mbh_05_u:13217: 05,153.010c senāpatiṃ prakurvanti te jayanti raṇe ripūn
GE07mbh_05_u:13218: 05,153.011a bhavān uśanasā tulyo hitaiṣī ca sadā mama
GE07mbh_05_u:13219: 05,153.011c asaṃhāryaḥ sthito dharme sa naḥ senāpatir bhava
GE07mbh_05_u:13221: 05,153.012c kubera iva yakṣāṇāṃ marutām iva vāsavaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:13222: 05,153.013a parvatānāṃ yathā meruḥ suparṇaḥ patatām iva
GE07mbh_05_u:13223: 05,153.013c kumāra iva bhūtānāṃ vasūnām iva havyavāṭ

GE07mbh_05_u:13232: 05,153.016c yathaiva hi bhavanto me tathaiva mama pāṇḍavāḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:13233: 05,153.017a api caiva maya śreyo vācyaṃ teṣāṃ narādhipa
GE07mbh_05_u:13234: 05,153.017c yoddhavyaṃ tu tavārthāya yathā sa samayaḥ kṛtaḥ

GE07mbh_05_u:13237: 05,153.019a sa hi veda mahābāhur divyāny astrāṇi sarvaśaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:13238: 05,153.019c na tu māṃ vivṛto yuddhe jātu yudhyeta pāṇḍavaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:13239: 05,153.020a ahaṃ sa ca kṣaṇenaiva nirmanuṣyam idaṃ jagat

GE07mbh_05_u:13244: 05,153.022c na cet te māṃ haniṣyanti pūrvam eva samāgame
GE07mbh_05_u:13245: 05,153.023a senāpatis tv ahaṃ rājan samayenāpareṇa te
GE07mbh_05_u:13246: 05,153.023c bhaviṣyāmi yathākāmaṃ tan me śrotum ihārhasi
GE07mbh_05_u:13247: 05,153.024a karṇo vā yudhyatāṃ pūrvam ahaṃ vā pṛthivīpate
GE07mbh_05_u:13248: 05,153.024c spardhate hi sadātyarthaṃ sūtaputro mayā raṇe
GE07mbh_05_u:13250: 05,153.025a nāhaṃ jīvati gāṅgeye yotsye rājan kathaṃ cana
GE07mbh_05_u:13251: 05,153.025c hate bhīṣme tu yotsyāmi saha gāṇḍīvadhanvanā
GE07mbh_05_u:13255: 05,153.027a tato bherīś ca śaṅkhāṃś ca śataśaś caiva puṣkarān
GE07mbh_05_u:13257: 05,153.028a siṃhanādāś ca vividhā vāhanānāṃ ca nisvanāḥ

GE07mbh_05_u:13261: 05,153.030a vācaś cāpy aśarīriṇyo divaś colkāḥ prapedire
GE07mbh_05_u:13262: 05,153.030c śivāś ca bhayavedinyo nedur dīptasvarā bhṛśam
GE07mbh_05_u:13266: 05,153.032c vācayitvā dvijaśreṣṭhān niṣkair gobhiś ca bhūriśaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:13271: 05,153.034c śibiraṃ māpayām āsa same deśe narādhipaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:13278: 05,154.002c samudram iva gāmbhīrye himavantam iva sthiram
GE07mbh_05_u:13287: 05,154.006c sarvān bhrātṝn samānīya vāsudevaṃ ca sātvatam
GE07mbh_05_u:13288: 05,154.006e uvāca vadatāṃ śreṣṭhaḥ sāntvapūrvam idaṃ vacaḥ

GE07mbh_05_u:13488: 05,157.005f@009_0001 jyeṣṭhaṃ tathaiva kaunteyaṃ brūyās tvaṃ vacanān mama
GE07mbh_05_u:13489: 05,157.005f@009_0002 bhrātṛbhiḥ sahitaḥ sarvaiḥ somakaiś ca sakekayaiḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:13490: 05,157.005f@009_0003 kathaṃ vā dhārmiko bhūtvā tvam adharme manaḥ kṛthāḥ

GE07mbh_05_u:13504: 05,157.005f@009_0017 sametya ca praśaṃsanti mārjāraṃ taṃ viśāṃ pate
GE07mbh_05_u:13505: 05,157.005f@009_0018 pūjyamānas tu taiḥ sarvaiḥ pakṣibhiḥ pakṣibhojanaḥ

GE07mbh_05_u:14664: 05,171.006c tena cāsmi vṛtā pūrvaṃ rahasy avidite pituḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:14665: 05,171.007a kathaṃ mām anyakāmāṃ tvaṃ rājañ śāstram adhītya vai
GE07mbh_05_u:14666: 05,171.007c vāsayethā gṛhe bhīṣma kauravaḥ san viśeṣataḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:14668: 05,171.008c yat kṣamaṃ te mahābāho tad ihārabdhum arhasi
GE07mbh_05_u:14669: 05,171.009a sa māṃ pratīkṣate vyaktaṃ śālvarājo viśāṃ pate
GE07mbh_05_u:14670: 05,171.009b*0571_01 tasmān māṃ tvaṃ kuruśreṣṭha samanujñātum arhasi
GE07mbh_05_u:14671: 05,171.009c kṛpāṃ kuru mahābāho mayi dharmabhṛtāṃ vara
GE07mbh_05_u:14672: 05,171.009e tvaṃ hi satyavrato vīra pṛthivyām iti naḥ śrutam
GE07mbh_05_u:14675: 05,172.001c mantriṇaś ca dvijāṃś caiva tathaiva ca purohitān
GE07mbh_05_u:14677: 05,172.002a anujñātā yayau sā tu kanyā śālvapateḥ puram
GE07mbh_05_u:14678: 05,172.002c vṛddhair dvijātibhir guptā dhātryā cānugatā tadā
GE07mbh_05_u:14679: 05,172.002e atītya ca tam adhvānam āsasāda narādhipam
GE07mbh_05_u:14680: 05,172.003a sā tam āsādya rājānaṃ śālvaṃ vacanam abravīt
GE07mbh_05_u:14682: 05,172.003d*0572_01 abhinandasva māṃ rājan sadā priyahite ratām
GE07mbh_05_u:14683: 05,172.003d*0572_02 pratipālaya māṃ rājan dharmādīṃś cara dharmataḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:14684: 05,172.003d*0572_03 tvaṃ hi me manasā dhyātas tvayā cāpy upamantritā
GE07mbh_05_u:14685: 05,172.004a tām abravīc chālvapatiḥ smayann iva viśāṃ pate
GE07mbh_05_u:14687: 05,172.005a gaccha bhadre punas tatra sakāśaṃ bhāratasya vai
GE07mbh_05_u:14688: 05,172.005c nāham icchāmi bhīṣmeṇa gṛhītāṃ tvāṃ prasahya vai
GE07mbh_05_u:14689: 05,172.006a tvaṃ hi nirjitya bhīṣmeṇa nītā prītimatī tadā
GE07mbh_05_u:14694: 05,172.007e yatheṣṭaṃ gamyatāṃ bhadre mā te kālo 'tyagād ayam
GE07mbh_05_u:14696: 05,172.008c maivaṃ vada mahīpāla naitad evaṃ kathaṃ cana
GE07mbh_05_u:14699: 05,172.010a bhajasva māṃ śālvapate bhaktāṃ bālām anāgasam
GE07mbh_05_u:14700: 05,172.010c bhaktānāṃ hi parityāgo na dharmeṣu praśasyate
GE07mbh_05_u:14702: 05,172.011c anujñātā ca tenaiva tavaiva gṛham āgatā
GE07mbh_05_u:14703: 05,172.012a na sa bhīṣmo mahābāhur mām icchati viśāṃ pate
GE07mbh_05_u:14705: 05,172.013a bhaginyau mama ye nīte ambikāmbālike nṛpa
GE07mbh_05_u:14707: 05,172.014a yathā śālvapate nānyaṃ naraṃ dhyāmi kathaṃ cana
GE07mbh_05_u:14708: 05,172.014c tvām ṛte puruṣavyāghra tathā mūrdhānam ālabhe
GE07mbh_05_u:14709: 05,172.015a na cānyapūrvā rājendra tvām ahaṃ samupasthitā
GE07mbh_05_u:14711: 05,172.016a bhajasva māṃ viśālākṣa svayaṃ kanyām upasthitām
GE07mbh_05_u:14713: 05,172.017a tām evaṃ bhāṣamāṇāṃ tu śālvaḥ kāśipateḥ sutām
GE07mbh_05_u:14717: 05,172.019a tataḥ sā manyunāviṣṭā jyeṣṭhā kāśipateḥ sutā
GE07mbh_05_u:14719: 05,172.020a tvayā tyaktā gamiṣyāmi yatra yatra viśāṃ pate
GE07mbh_05_u:14720: 05,172.020c tatra me santu gatayaḥ santaḥ satyaṃ yathābruvam
GE07mbh_05_u:14721: 05,172.021a evaṃ saṃbhāṣamāṇāṃ tu nṛśaṃsaḥ śālvarāṭ tadā
GE07mbh_05_u:14723: 05,172.022a gaccha gaccheti tāṃ śālvaḥ punaḥ punar abhāṣata
GE07mbh_05_u:14724: 05,172.022c bibhemi bhīṣmāt suśroṇi tvaṃ ca bhīṣmaparigrahaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:14725: 05,172.023a evam uktā tu sā tena śālvenādīrghadarśinā
GE07mbh_05_u:14726: 05,172.023c niścakrāma purād dīnā rudatī kurarī yathā
GE07mbh_05_u:14728: 05,173.001a sā niṣkramantī nagarāc cintayām āsa bhārata
GE07mbh_05_u:14731: 05,173.002a na ca śakyaṃ punar gantuṃ mayā vāraṇasāhvayam
GE07mbh_05_u:14733: 05,173.003a kiṃ nu garhāmy athātmānam atha bhīṣmaṃ durāsadam
GE07mbh_05_u:14734: 05,173.003c āho svit pitaraṃ mūḍhaṃ yo me 'kārṣīt svayaṃvaram
GE07mbh_05_u:14735: 05,173.004a mamāyaṃ svakṛto doṣo yāhaṃ bhīṣmarathāt tadā
GE07mbh_05_u:14736: 05,173.004c pravṛtte vaiśase yuddhe śālvārthaṃ nāpataṃ purā
GE07mbh_05_u:14738: 05,173.005a dhig bhīṣmaṃ dhik ca me mandaṃ pitaraṃ mūḍhacetasam
GE07mbh_05_u:14740: 05,173.006a dhiṅ māṃ dhik śālvarājānaṃ dhig dhātāram athāpi ca
GE07mbh_05_u:14743: 05,173.007c anayasyāsya tu mukhaṃ bhīṣmaḥ śāṃtanavo mama
GE07mbh_05_u:14744: 05,173.008a sā bhīṣme pratikartavyam ahaṃ paśyāmi sāṃpratam
GE07mbh_05_u:14745: 05,173.008c tapasā vā yudhā vāpi duḥkhahetuḥ sa me mataḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:14746: 05,173.008e ko nu bhīṣmaṃ yudhā jetum utsaheta mahīpatiḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:14747: 05,173.009a evaṃ sā pariniścitya jagāma nagarād bahiḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:14749: 05,173.009e tatas tām avasad rātriṃ tāpasaiḥ parivāritā
GE07mbh_05_u:14750: 05,173.010a ācakhyau ca yathā vṛttaṃ sarvam ātmani bhārata
GE07mbh_05_u:14752: 05,173.010e haraṇaṃ ca visargaṃ ca śālvena ca visarjanam
GE07mbh_05_u:14753: 05,173.011a tatas tatra mahān āsīd brāhmaṇaḥ saṃśitavrataḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:14755: 05,173.012a ārtāṃ tām āha sa muniḥ śaikhāvatyo mahātapāḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:14757: 05,173.013a evaṃ gate kiṃ nu bhadre śakyaṃ kartuṃ tapasvibhiḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:14759: 05,173.014a sā tv enam abravīd rājan kriyatāṃ madanugrahaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:14762: 05,173.015c kṛtāni nūnaṃ pāpāni teṣām etat phalaṃ dhruvam
GE07mbh_05_u:14763: 05,173.016a notsaheyaṃ punar gantuṃ svajanaṃ prati tāpasāḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:14766: 05,173.017c yuṣmābhir devasaṃkāśāḥ kṛpā bhavatu vo mayi
GE07mbh_05_u:14768: 05,173.018c sāntvayām āsa kāryaṃ ca pratijajñe dvijaiḥ saha
GE07mbh_05_u:14770: 05,174.001a tatas te tāpasāḥ sarve kāryavanto 'bhavaṃs tadā
GE07mbh_05_u:14771: 05,174.001c tāṃ kanyāṃ cintayanto vai kiṃ kāryam iti dharmiṇaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:14772: 05,174.002a ke cid āhuḥ pitur veśma nīyatām iti tāpasāḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:14773: 05,174.002c ke cid asmadupālambhe matiṃ cakrur dvijottamāḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:14774: 05,174.003a ke cic chālvapatiṃ gatvā niyojyam iti menire
GE07mbh_05_u:14775: 05,174.003c neti ke cid vyavasyanti pratyākhyātā hi tena sā
GE07mbh_05_u:14776: 05,174.004a evaṃ gate kiṃ nu śakyaṃ bhadre kartuṃ manīṣibhiḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:14777: 05,174.004c punar ūcuś ca te sarve tāpasāḥ saṃśitavratāḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:14778: 05,174.005a alaṃ pravrajiteneha bhadre śṛṇu hitaṃ vacaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:14779: 05,174.005c ito gacchasva bhadraṃ te pitur eva niveśanam
GE07mbh_05_u:14780: 05,174.006a pratipatsyati rājā sa pitā te yad anantaram
GE07mbh_05_u:14782: 05,174.006e na ca te 'nyā gatir nyāyyā bhaved bhadre yathā pitā
GE07mbh_05_u:14783: 05,174.007a patir vāpi gatir nāryāḥ pitā vā varavarṇini
GE07mbh_05_u:14784: 05,174.007c gatiḥ patiḥ samasthāyā viṣame tu pitā gatiḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:14786: 05,174.008c rājaputryāḥ prakṛtyā ca kumāryās tava bhāmini
GE07mbh_05_u:14787: 05,174.009a bhadre doṣā hi vidyante bahavo varavarṇini
GE07mbh_05_u:14788: 05,174.009c āśrame vai vasantyās te na bhaveyuḥ pitur gṛhe
GE07mbh_05_u:14789: 05,174.010a tatas tu te 'bruvan vākyaṃ brāhmaṇās tāṃ tapasvinīm
GE07mbh_05_u:14790: 05,174.010c tvām ihaikākinīṃ dṛṣṭvā nirjane gahane vane
GE07mbh_05_u:14791: 05,174.010e prārthayiṣyanti rājendrās tasmān maivaṃ manaḥ kṛthāḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:14793: 05,174.011a na śakyaṃ kāśinagarīṃ punar gantuṃ pitur gṛhān
GE07mbh_05_u:14795: 05,174.012a uṣitā hy anyathā bālye pitur veśmani tāpasāḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:14796: 05,174.012c nāhaṃ gamiṣye bhadraṃ vas tatra yatra pitā mama
GE07mbh_05_u:14798: 05,174.013a yathā pare 'pi me loke na syād evaṃ mahātyayaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:14799: 05,174.013c daurbhāgyaṃ brāhmaṇaśreṣṭhās tasmāt tapsyāmy ahaṃ tapaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:14801: 05,174.014a ity evaṃ teṣu vipreṣu cintayatsu tathā tathā
GE07mbh_05_u:14802: 05,174.014c rājarṣis tad vanaṃ prāptas tapasvī hotravāhanaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:14803: 05,174.014d*0573_01 tāṃ tathā bhāminīṃ dṛṣṭvā śrutvā codvignamānasaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:14804: 05,174.015a tatas te tāpasāḥ sarve pūjayanti sma taṃ nṛpam
GE07mbh_05_u:14807: 05,174.016c punar eva kathāṃ cakruḥ kanyāṃ prati vanaukasaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:14808: 05,174.017a ambāyās tāṃ kathāṃ śrutvā kāśirājñaś ca bhārata
GE07mbh_05_u:14810: 05,174.017b*0574_02 tāṃ tathāvādinīṃ śrutvā dṛṣṭvā ca sa mahātapāḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:14812: 05,174.017c sa vepamāna utthāya mātur asyāḥ pitā tadā
GE07mbh_05_u:14813: 05,174.017e tāṃ kanyām aṅkam āropya paryāśvāsayata prabho
GE07mbh_05_u:14814: 05,174.018a sa tām apṛcchat kārtsnyena vyasanotpattim āditaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:14815: 05,174.018c sā ca tasmai yathāvṛttaṃ vistareṇa nyavedayat
GE07mbh_05_u:14817: 05,174.019c kāryaṃ ca pratipede tan manasā sumahātapāḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:14818: 05,174.020a abravīd vepamānaś ca kanyām ārtāṃ suduḥkhitaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:14819: 05,174.020c mā gāḥ pitṛgṛhaṃ bhadre mātus te janako hy aham
GE07mbh_05_u:14820: 05,174.021a duḥkhaṃ chetsyāmi te 'haṃ vai mayi vartasva putrike
GE07mbh_05_u:14821: 05,174.021c paryāptaṃ te manaḥ putri yad evaṃ pariśuṣyasi
GE07mbh_05_u:14823: 05,174.022c rāmas tava mahad duḥkhaṃ śokaṃ cāpanayiṣyati
GE07mbh_05_u:14824: 05,174.022e haniṣyati raṇe bhīṣmaṃ na kariṣyati ced vacaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:14826: 05,174.023c pratiṣṭhāpayitā sa tvāṃ same pathi mahātapāḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:14827: 05,174.024a tatas tu sasvaraṃ bāṣpam utsṛjantī punaḥ punaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:14828: 05,174.024c abravīt pitaraṃ mātuḥ sā tadā hotravāhanam
GE07mbh_05_u:14830: 05,174.025c api nāmādya paśyeyam āryaṃ taṃ lokaviśrutam
GE07mbh_05_u:14831: 05,174.026a kathaṃ ca tīvraṃ duḥkhaṃ me haniṣyati sa bhārgavaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:14832: 05,174.026c etad icchāmy ahaṃ śrotum atha yāsyāmi tatra vai
GE07mbh_05_u:14834: 05,175.001a rāmaṃ drakṣyasi vatse tvaṃ jāmadagnyaṃ mahāvane
GE07mbh_05_u:14836: 05,175.002a mahendre vai giriśreṣṭhe rāmaṃ nityam upāsate
GE07mbh_05_u:14838: 05,175.003a tatra gacchasva bhadraṃ te brūyāś cainaṃ vaco mama
GE07mbh_05_u:14840: 05,175.004a brūyāś cainaṃ punar bhadre yat te kāryaṃ manīṣitam
GE07mbh_05_u:14841: 05,175.004c mayi saṃkīrtite rāmaḥ sarvaṃ tat te kariṣyati
GE07mbh_05_u:14842: 05,175.005a mama rāmaḥ sakhā vatse prītiyuktaḥ suhṛc ca me
GE07mbh_05_u:14844: 05,175.006a evaṃ bruvati kanyāṃ tu pārthive hotravāhane
GE07mbh_05_u:14846: 05,175.007a tatas te munayaḥ sarve samuttasthuḥ sahasraśaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:14847: 05,175.007c sa ca rājā vayovṛddhaḥ sṛñjayo hotravāhanaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:14848: 05,175.008a tataḥ pṛṣṭvā yathānyāyam anyonyaṃ te vanaukasaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:14850: 05,175.009a tatas te kathayām āsuḥ kathās tās tā manoramāḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:14851: 05,175.009c kāntā divyāś ca rājendra prītiharṣamudā yutāḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:14855: 05,175.011c akṛtavraṇa śakyo vai draṣṭuṃ vedavidāṃ varaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:14857: 05,175.012a bhavantam eva satataṃ rāmaḥ kīrtayati prabho
GE07mbh_05_u:14858: 05,175.012c sṛñjayo me priyasakho rājarṣir iti pārthiva
GE07mbh_05_u:14859: 05,175.013a iha rāmaḥ prabhāte śvo bhaviteti matir mama
GE07mbh_05_u:14861: 05,175.014a iyaṃ ca kanyā rājarṣe kimarthaṃ vanam āgatā
GE07mbh_05_u:14862: 05,175.014c kasya ceyaṃ tava ca kā bhavatīcchāmi veditum
GE07mbh_05_u:14866: 05,175.016a iyam ambeti vikhyātā jyeṣṭhā kāśipateḥ sutā
GE07mbh_05_u:14870: 05,175.018a tataḥ kila mahāvīryo bhīṣmaḥ śāṃtanavo nṛpān
GE07mbh_05_u:14871: 05,175.018c avākṣipya mahātejās tisraḥ kanyā jahāra tāḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:14879: 05,175.022c na mām arhasi dharmajña paracittāṃ pradāpitum
GE07mbh_05_u:14880: 05,175.023a tac chrutvā vacanaṃ bhīṣmaḥ saṃmantrya saha mantribhiḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:14882: 05,175.024a anujñātā tu bhīṣmeṇa śālvaṃ saubhapatiṃ tataḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:14883: 05,175.024c kanyeyaṃ muditā vipra kāle vacanam abravīt
GE07mbh_05_u:14889: 05,175.027c asya duḥkhasya cotpattiṃ bhīṣmam eveha manyate
GE07mbh_05_u:14890: 05,175.027d*0575_01 evaṃ bruvati vai rājñi kanyā vacanam abravīt
GE07mbh_05_u:14894: 05,175.029a na hy utsahe svanagaraṃ pratiyātuṃ tapodhana
GE07mbh_05_u:14896: 05,175.030a yat tu māṃ bhagavān rāmo vakṣyati dvijasattama
GE07mbh_05_u:14897: 05,175.030c tan me kāryatamaṃ kāryam iti me bhagavan matiḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:14900: 05,176.001c pratikartavyam abale tat tvaṃ vatse bravīhi me
GE07mbh_05_u:14901: 05,176.002a yadi saubhapatir bhadre niyoktavyo mate tava
GE07mbh_05_u:14904: 05,176.003c raṇe vinirjitaṃ draṣṭuṃ kuryāt tad api bhārgavaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:14905: 05,176.004a sṛñjayasya vacaḥ śrutvā tava caiva śucismite
GE07mbh_05_u:14906: 05,176.004c yad atrānantaraṃ kāryaṃ tad adyaiva vicintyatām
GE07mbh_05_u:14909: 05,176.005c na hi jānāti me bhīṣmo brahmañ śālvagataṃ manaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:14910: 05,176.006a etad vicārya manasā bhavān eva viniścayam
GE07mbh_05_u:14912: 05,176.007a bhīṣme vā kuruśārdūle śālvarāje 'tha vā punaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:14913: 05,176.007c ubhayor eva vā brahman yad yuktaṃ tat samācara
GE07mbh_05_u:14914: 05,176.008a niveditaṃ mayā hy etad duḥkhamūlaṃ yathātatham
GE07mbh_05_u:14915: 05,176.008c vidhānaṃ tatra bhagavan kartum arhasi yuktitaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:14917: 05,176.009a upapannam idaṃ bhadre yad evaṃ varavarṇini
GE07mbh_05_u:14918: 05,176.009c dharmaṃ prati vaco brūyāḥ śṛṇu cedaṃ vaco mama
GE07mbh_05_u:14919: 05,176.010a yadi tvām āpageyo vai na nayed gajasāhvayam
GE07mbh_05_u:14920: 05,176.010c śālvas tvāṃ śirasā bhīru gṛhṇīyād rāmacoditaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:14921: 05,176.011a tena tvaṃ nirjitā bhadre yasmān nītāsi bhāmini
GE07mbh_05_u:14923: 05,176.012a bhīṣmaḥ puruṣamānī ca jitakāśī tathaiva ca
GE07mbh_05_u:14924: 05,176.012c tasmāt pratikriyā yuktā bhīṣme kārayituṃ tvayā
GE07mbh_05_u:14926: 05,176.013a mamāpy eṣa mahān brahman hṛdi kāmo 'bhivartate
GE07mbh_05_u:14927: 05,176.013c ghātayeyaṃ yadi raṇe bhīṣmam ity eva nityadā
GE07mbh_05_u:14928: 05,176.014a bhīṣmaṃ vā śālvarājaṃ vā yaṃ vā doṣeṇa gacchasi
GE07mbh_05_u:14931: 05,176.015a evaṃ kathayatām eva teṣāṃ sa divaso gataḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:14933: 05,176.016a tato rāmaḥ prādurāsīt prajvalann iva tejasā
GE07mbh_05_u:14937: 05,176.018a tatas taṃ tāpasā dṛṣṭvā sa ca rājā mahātapāḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:14938: 05,176.018c tasthuḥ prāñjalayaḥ sarve sā ca kanyā tapasvinī
GE07mbh_05_u:14940: 05,176.019c arcitaś ca yathāyogaṃ niṣasāda sahaiva taiḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:14941: 05,176.020a tataḥ pūrvavyatītāni kathayete sma tāv ubhau
GE07mbh_05_u:14942: 05,176.020c sṛñjayaś ca sa rājarṣir jāmadagnyaś ca bhārata
GE07mbh_05_u:14944: 05,176.021c uvāca madhuraṃ kāle rāmaṃ vacanam arthavat
GE07mbh_05_u:14947: 05,176.023a paramaṃ kathyatāṃ ceti tāṃ rāmaḥ pratyabhāṣata

GE07mbh_05_u:14980: 05,176.037c yad atraupayikaṃ kāryaṃ tac cintayitum arhasi
GE07mbh_05_u:14982: 05,176.038c yenāhaṃ vaśam ānītā samutkṣipya balāt tadā
GE07mbh_05_u:14983: 05,176.039a bhīṣmaṃ jahi mahābāho yatkṛte duḥkham īdṛśam

GE07mbh_05_u:14987: 05,176.041a eṣa me hriyamāṇāyā bhāratena tadā vibho
GE07mbh_05_u:14990: 05,176.042c jahi bhīṣmaṃ mahābāho yathā vṛtraṃ puraṃdaraḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:14992: 05,177.001a evam uktas tadā rāmo jahi bhīṣmam iti prabho
GE07mbh_05_u:14993: 05,177.001c uvāca rudatīṃ kanyāṃ codayantīṃ punaḥ punaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:14994: 05,177.002a kāśye kāmaṃ na gṛhṇāmi śastraṃ vai varavarṇini
GE07mbh_05_u:14995: 05,177.002c ṛte brahmavidāṃ hetoḥ kim anyat karavāṇi te

GE07mbh_05_u:14998: 05,177.004a na tu śastraṃ grahīṣyāmi kathaṃ cid api bhāmini

GE07mbh_05_u:15001: 05,177.005a mama duḥkhaṃ bhagavatā vyapaneyaṃ yatas tataḥ

GE07mbh_05_u:15004: 05,177.006a kāśikanye punar brūhi bhīṣmas te caraṇāv ubhau
GE07mbh_05_u:15007: 05,177.007a jahi bhīṣmaṃ raṇe rāma mama ced icchasi priyam

GE07mbh_05_u:15015: 05,177.009c jahi bhīṣmaṃ raṇe rāma garjantam asuraṃ yathā
GE07mbh_05_u:15016: 05,177.010a yadi bhīṣmas tvayāhūto raṇe rāma mahāmune

GE07mbh_05_u:15018: 05,177.011a kṛtam asyā bhavet kāryaṃ kanyāyā bhṛgunandana

GE07mbh_05_u:15027: 05,177.015c dṛptātmānam ahaṃ taṃ ca haniṣyāmīti bhārgava
GE07mbh_05_u:15028: 05,177.016a sa evaṃ vijayī rāma bhīṣmaḥ kurukulodvahaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:15032: 05,177.017c tathaiva ca kariṣyāmi yathā sāmnaiva lapsyate
GE07mbh_05_u:15034: 05,177.018c gamiṣyāmi svayaṃ tatra kanyām ādāya yatra saḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:15035: 05,177.019a yadi bhīṣmo raṇaślāghī na kariṣyati me vacaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:15036: 05,177.019c haniṣyāmy enam udriktam iti me niścitā matiḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:15037: 05,177.020a na hi bāṇā mayotsṛṣṭāḥ sajjantīha śarīriṇām
GE07mbh_05_u:15040: 05,177.021a evam uktvā tato rāmaḥ saha tair brahmavādibhiḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:15042: 05,177.022a tatas te tām uṣitvā tu rajanīṃ tatra tāpasāḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:15044: 05,177.023a abhyagacchat tato rāmaḥ saha tair brāhmaṇarṣabhaiḥ

GE07mbh_05_u:15051: 05,178.002a tam āgatam ahaṃ śrutvā viṣayāntaṃ mahābalam
GE07mbh_05_u:15054: 05,178.003c ṛtvigbhir devakalpaiś ca tathaiva ca purohitaiḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:15055: 05,178.004a sa mām abhigataṃ dṛṣṭvā jāmadagnyaḥ pratāpavān
GE07mbh_05_u:15056: 05,178.004c pratijagrāha tāṃ pūjāṃ vacanaṃ cedam abravīt
GE07mbh_05_u:15057: 05,178.005a bhīṣma kāṃ buddhim āsthāya kāśirājasutā tvayā
GE07mbh_05_u:15060: 05,178.006c parāmṛṣṭāṃ tvayā hīmāṃ ko hi gantum ihārhati

GE07mbh_05_u:15078: 05,178.015a tam ahaṃ praṇamya śirasā bhūyo brāhmaṇasattamam
