GE07mbh_05_u:15249: 05,180.023c bhūyas tu śṛṇu me brahman saṃpadaṃ dharmasaṃgrahe
GE07mbh_05_u:15250: 05,180.024a ye te vedāḥ śarīrasthā brāhmaṇyaṃ yac ca te mahat
GE07mbh_05_u:15251: 05,180.024c tapaś ca sumahat taptaṃ na tebhyaḥ praharāmy aham
GE07mbh_05_u:15252: 05,180.025a prahare kṣatradharmasya yaṃ tvaṃ rāma samāsthitaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:15254: 05,180.026a paśya me dhanuṣo vīryaṃ paśya bāhvor balaṃ ca me
GE07mbh_05_u:15255: 05,180.026c eṣa te kārmukaṃ vīra dvidhā kurmi sasāyakam
GE07mbh_05_u:15257: 05,180.027c tenāsya dhanuṣaḥ koṭiś chinnā bhūmim athāgamat
GE07mbh_05_u:15261: 05,180.029c celuḥ kṣaranto rudhiraṃ nāgā iva ca te śarāḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:15263: 05,180.030c babhau rāmas tadā rājan merur dhātūn ivotsṛjan
GE07mbh_05_u:15265: 05,180.031c babhau rāmas tadā rājan kva cit kiṃśukasaṃnibhaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:15267: 05,180.032c hemapuṅkhān suniśitāñ śarāṃs tān hi vavarṣa saḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:15268: 05,180.033a te samāsādya māṃ raudrā bahudhā marmabhedinaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:15271: 05,180.034c śatasaṃkhyaiḥ śaraiḥ kruddhas tadā rāmam avākiram
GE07mbh_05_u:15275: 05,180.036c dhig dhig ity abruvaṃ yuddhaṃ kṣatraṃ ca bharatarṣabha
GE07mbh_05_u:15277: 05,180.037c aho bata kṛtaṃ pāpaṃ mayedaṃ kṣatrakarmaṇā
GE07mbh_05_u:15278: 05,180.038a gurur dvijātir dharmātmā yad evaṃ pīḍitaḥ śaraiḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:15279: 05,180.038c tato na prāharaṃ bhūyo jāmadagnyāya bhārata
GE07mbh_05_u:15283: 05,181.001a ātmanas tu tataḥ sūto hayānāṃ ca viśāṃ pate
GE07mbh_05_u:15286: 05,181.002c prabhāta udite sūrye tato yuddham avartata
GE07mbh_05_u:15287: 05,181.003a dṛṣṭvā māṃ tūrṇam āyāntaṃ daṃśitaṃ syandane sthitam
GE07mbh_05_u:15288: 05,181.003c akarod ratham atyarthaṃ rāmaḥ sajjaṃ pratāpavān
GE07mbh_05_u:15295: 05,181.007a saṃkruddho jāmadagnyas tu punar eva patatriṇaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:15296: 05,181.007c preṣayām āsa me rājan dīptāsyān uragān iva
GE07mbh_05_u:15297: 05,181.008a tān ahaṃ niśitair bhallaiḥ śataśo 'tha sahasraśaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:15298: 05,181.008c acchidaṃ sahasā rājann antarikṣe punaḥ punaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:15299: 05,181.009a tatas tv astrāṇi divyāni jāmadagnyaḥ pratāpavān
GE07mbh_05_u:15300: 05,181.009c mayi pracodayām āsa tāny ahaṃ pratyaṣedhayam
GE07mbh_05_u:15301: 05,181.010a astrair eva mahābāho cikīrṣann adhikāṃ kriyām
GE07mbh_05_u:15302: 05,181.010c tato divi mahān nādaḥ prādurāsīt samantataḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:15304: 05,181.011c pratyājaghne ca tad rāmo guhyakāstreṇa bhārata
GE07mbh_05_u:15306: 05,181.012c vāruṇenaiva rāmas tad vārayām āsa me vibhuḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:15308: 05,181.013c rāmaś ca mama tejasvī divyāstravid ariṃdamaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:15309: 05,181.014a tato māṃ savyato rājan rāmaḥ kurvan dvijottamaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:15312: 05,181.015c atha māṃ kaśmalāviṣṭaṃ sūtas tūrṇam apāvahat
GE07mbh_05_u:15314: 05,181.016a tato mām apayātaṃ vai bhṛśaṃ viddham acetasam
GE07mbh_05_u:15317: 05,181.017a tatas tu labdhasaṃjño 'haṃ jñātvā sūtam athābruvam
GE07mbh_05_u:15318: 05,181.017c yāhi sūta yato rāmaḥ sajjo 'haṃ gatavedanaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:15319: 05,181.018a tato mām avahat sūto hayaiḥ paramaśobhitaiḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:15323: 05,181.020a tān āpatata evāsau rāmo bāṇān ajihmagān
GE07mbh_05_u:15324: 05,181.020c bāṇair evācchinat tūrṇam ekaikaṃ tribhir āhave
GE07mbh_05_u:15325: 05,181.021a tatas te mṛditāḥ sarve mama bāṇāḥ susaṃśitāḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:15327: 05,181.022a tataḥ punaḥ śaraṃ dīptaṃ suprabhaṃ kālasaṃmitam
GE07mbh_05_u:15329: 05,181.023a tena tv abhihato gāḍhaṃ bāṇacchedavaśaṃ gataḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:15330: 05,181.023c mumoha sahasā rāmo bhūmau ca nipapāta ha
GE07mbh_05_u:15331: 05,181.024a tato hāhākṛtaṃ sarvaṃ rāme bhūtalam āśrite
GE07mbh_05_u:15334: 05,181.025c tapodhanās te sahasā kāśyā ca bhṛgunandanam
GE07mbh_05_u:15335: 05,181.026a ta enaṃ saṃpariṣvajya śanair āśvāsayaṃs tadā
GE07mbh_05_u:15336: 05,181.026c pāṇibhir jalaśītaiś ca jayāśīrbhiś ca kaurava
GE07mbh_05_u:15337: 05,181.027a tataḥ sa vihvalo vākyaṃ rāma utthāya mābravīt
GE07mbh_05_u:15338: 05,181.027c tiṣṭha bhīṣma hato 'sīti bāṇaṃ saṃdhāya kārmuke
GE07mbh_05_u:15339: 05,181.028a sa mukto nyapatat tūrṇaṃ pārśve savye mahāhave
GE07mbh_05_u:15341: 05,181.029a hatvā hayāṃs tato rājañ śīghrāstreṇa mahāhave
GE07mbh_05_u:15342: 05,181.029c avākiran māṃ viśrabdho bāṇais tair lomavāhibhiḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:15348: 05,181.032a tato vāyoḥ prakampāc ca sūryasya ca marīcibhiḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:15351: 05,181.033c bhūmau sarve tadā rājan bhasmabhūtāḥ prapedire
GE07mbh_05_u:15353: 05,181.034c ayutāny atha kharvāṇi nikharvāṇi ca kaurava
GE07mbh_05_u:15354: 05,181.034e rāmaḥ śarāṇāṃ saṃkruddho mayi tūrṇam apātayat
GE07mbh_05_u:15355: 05,181.035a tato 'haṃ tān api raṇe śarair āśīviṣopamaiḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:15357: 05,181.036a evaṃ tad abhavad yuddhaṃ tadā bharatasattama
GE07mbh_05_u:15358: 05,181.036c saṃdhyākāle vyatīte tu vyapāyāt sa ca me guruḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:15362: 05,182.002a tato divyāstravic chūro divyāny astrāṇy anekaśaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:15364: 05,182.003a tāny ahaṃ tatpratīghātair astrair astrāṇi bhārata
GE07mbh_05_u:15365: 05,182.003c vyadhamaṃ tumule yuddhe prāṇāṃs tyaktvā sudustyajān
GE07mbh_05_u:15366: 05,182.004a astrair astreṣu bahudhā hateṣv atha ca bhārgavaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:15419: 05,183.001a tataḥ prabhāte rājendra sūrye vimala udgate
GE07mbh_05_u:15420: 05,183.001c bhārgavasya mayā sārdhaṃ punar yuddham avartata
GE07mbh_05_u:15421: 05,183.002a tato bhrānte rathe tiṣṭhan rāmaḥ praharatāṃ varaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:15423: 05,183.003a tena sūto mama suhṛc charavarṣeṇa tāḍitaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:15425: 05,183.004a tataḥ sūtaḥ sa me 'tyarthaṃ kaśmalaṃ prāviśan mahat
GE07mbh_05_u:15426: 05,183.004c pṛthivyāṃ ca śarāghātān nipapāta mumoha ca
GE07mbh_05_u:15428: 05,183.005c muhūrtād iva rājendra māṃ ca bhīr āviśat tadā
GE07mbh_05_u:15429: 05,183.006a tataḥ sūte hate rājan kṣipatas tasya me śarān
GE07mbh_05_u:15431: 05,183.007a tataḥ sūtavyasaninaṃ viplutaṃ māṃ sa bhārgavaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:15433: 05,183.008a sa me jatrvantare rājan nipatya rudhirāśanaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:15435: 05,183.009a matvā tu nihataṃ rāmas tato māṃ bharatarṣabha
GE07mbh_05_u:15436: 05,183.009c meghavad vyanadac coccair jahṛṣe ca punaḥ punaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:15437: 05,183.010a tathā tu patite rājan mayi rāmo mudā yutaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:15439: 05,183.011a mama tatrābhavan ye tu kauravāḥ pārśvataḥ sthitāḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:15440: 05,183.011c āgatā ye ca yuddhaṃ taj janās tatra didṛkṣavaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:15441: 05,183.011e ārtiṃ paramikāṃ jagmus te tadā mayi pātite
GE07mbh_05_u:15446: 05,183.013a rakṣyamāṇaś ca tair viprair nāhaṃ bhūmim upāspṛśam
GE07mbh_05_u:15447: 05,183.013c antarikṣe sthito hy asmi tair viprair bāndhavair iva
GE07mbh_05_u:15449: 05,183.014a tatas te brāhmaṇā rājann abruvan parigṛhya mām
GE07mbh_05_u:15450: 05,183.014c mā bhair iti samaṃ sarve svasti te 'stv iti cāsakṛt
GE07mbh_05_u:15451: 05,183.015a tatas teṣām ahaṃ vāgbhis tarpitaḥ sahasotthitaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:15452: 05,183.015c mātaraṃ saritāṃ śreṣṭhām apaśyaṃ ratham āsthitām
GE07mbh_05_u:15453: 05,183.016a hayāś ca me saṃgṛhītās tayā vai;
GE07mbh_05_u:15457: 05,183.017a rarakṣa sā mama rathaṃ hayāṃś copaskarāṇi ca
GE07mbh_05_u:15458: 05,183.017c tām ahaṃ prāñjalir bhūtvā punar eva vyasarjayam
GE07mbh_05_u:15459: 05,183.018a tato 'haṃ svayam udyamya hayāṃs tān vātaraṃhasaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:15464: 05,183.020c jānubhyāṃ dhanur utsṛjya rāmo mohavaśaṃ gataḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:15466: 05,183.021c āvavrur jaladā vyoma kṣaranto rudhiraṃ bahu
GE07mbh_05_u:15467: 05,183.022a ulkāś ca śataśaḥ petuḥ sanirghātāḥ sakampanāḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:15468: 05,183.022c arkaṃ ca sahasā dīptaṃ svarbhānur abhisaṃvṛṇot
GE07mbh_05_u:15469: 05,183.023a vavuś ca vātāḥ paruṣāś calitā ca vasuṃdharā
GE07mbh_05_u:15470: 05,183.023c gṛdhrā baḍāś ca kaṅkāś ca paripetur mudā yutāḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:15471: 05,183.024a dīptāyāṃ diśi gomāyur dāruṇaṃ muhur unnadat
GE07mbh_05_u:15475: 05,183.025d*0582_01 tato vai sahasotthāya rāmo mām abhyavartata
GE07mbh_05_u:15478: 05,183.025d*0582_04 śaraṃ cāpy ṛṣayo 'thainaṃ mā rāmety abruvan vacaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:15490: 05,184.001a tato 'haṃ niśi rājendra praṇamya śirasā tadā
GE07mbh_05_u:15491: 05,184.001c brāhmaṇānāṃ pitṝṇāṃ ca devatānāṃ ca sarvaśaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:15492: 05,184.002a naktaṃcarāṇāṃ bhūtānāṃ rajanyāś ca viśāṃ pate
GE07mbh_05_u:15496: 05,184.004a na ca rāmaṃ mahāvīryaṃ śaknomi raṇamūrdhani
GE07mbh_05_u:15498: 05,184.005a yadi śakyo mayā jetuṃ jāmadagnyaḥ pratāpavān
GE07mbh_05_u:15502: 05,184.007a tato 'haṃ vipramukhyais tair yair asmi patito rathāt
GE07mbh_05_u:15503: 05,184.007c utthāpito dhṛtaś caiva mā bhair iti ca sāntvitaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:15504: 05,184.008a ta eva māṃ mahārāja svapnadarśanam etya vai
GE07mbh_05_u:15506: 05,184.009a uttiṣṭha mā bhair gāṅgeya bhayaṃ te nāsti kiṃ cana
GE07mbh_05_u:15507: 05,184.009c rakṣāmahe naravyāghra svaśarīraṃ hi no bhavān
GE07mbh_05_u:15508: 05,184.010a na tvāṃ rāmo raṇe jetā jāmadagnyaḥ kathaṃ cana
GE07mbh_05_u:15509: 05,184.010c tvam eva samare rāmaṃ vijetā bharatarṣabha
GE07mbh_05_u:15513: 05,184.011c viditaṃ hi tavāpy etat pūrvasmin dehadhāraṇe
GE07mbh_05_u:15515: 05,184.012c na hīdaṃ veda rāmo 'pi pṛthivyāṃ vā pumān kva cit
GE07mbh_05_u:15516: 05,184.013a tat smarasva mahābāho bhṛśaṃ saṃyojayasva ca
GE07mbh_05_u:15517: 05,184.013c na ca rāmaḥ kṣayaṃ gantā tenāstreṇa narādhipa
GE07mbh_05_u:15518: 05,184.014a enasā ca na yogaṃ tvaṃ prāpsyase jātu mānada
GE07mbh_05_u:15520: 05,184.015a tato jitvā tvam evainaṃ punar utthāpayiṣyasi
GE07mbh_05_u:15522: 05,184.016a evaṃ kuruṣva kauravya prabhāte ratham āsthitaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:15523: 05,184.016c prasuptaṃ vā mṛtaṃ vāpi tulyaṃ manyāmahe vayam
GE07mbh_05_u:15524: 05,184.017a na ca rāmeṇa martavyaṃ kadā cid api pārthiva
GE07mbh_05_u:15525: 05,184.017c tataḥ samutpannam idaṃ prasvāpaṃ yujyatām iti
GE07mbh_05_u:15526: 05,184.018a ity uktvāntarhitā rājan sarva eva dvijottamāḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:15530: 05,185.001c taṃ ca saṃcintya vai svapnam avāpaṃ harṣam uttamam
GE07mbh_05_u:15531: 05,185.002a tataḥ samabhavad yuddhaṃ mama tasya ca bhārata
GE07mbh_05_u:15533: 05,185.003a tato bāṇamayaṃ varṣaṃ vavarṣa mayi bhārgavaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:15534: 05,185.003c nyavārayam ahaṃ taṃ ca śarajālena bhārata
GE07mbh_05_u:15536: 05,185.004c hyastanenaiva kopena śaktiṃ vai prāhiṇon mayi
GE07mbh_05_u:15540: 05,185.006c sā mām abhyahanat tūrṇam aṃsadeśe ca bhārata
GE07mbh_05_u:15549: 05,185.011a sa vakṣasi papātograḥ śaro vyāla iva śvasan
GE07mbh_05_u:15550: 05,185.011c mahīṃ rājaṃs tataś cāham agacchaṃ rudhirāvilaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:15551: 05,185.012a avāpya tu punaḥ saṃjñāṃ jāmadagnyāya dhīmate
GE07mbh_05_u:15552: 05,185.012c prāhiṇvaṃ vimalāṃ śaktiṃ jvalantīm aśanīm iva
GE07mbh_05_u:15554: 05,185.013c vihvalaś cābhavad rājan vepathuś cainam āviśat
GE07mbh_05_u:15555: 05,185.014a tata enaṃ pariṣvajya sakhā vipro mahātapāḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:15560: 05,185.016c mayā prayuktaṃ jajvāla yugāntam iva darśayat
GE07mbh_05_u:15561: 05,185.017a tayor brahmāstrayor āsīd antarā vai samāgamaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:15562: 05,185.017c asaṃprāpyaiva rāmaṃ ca māṃ ca bhāratasattama
GE07mbh_05_u:15563: 05,185.018a tato vyomni prādurabhūt teja eva hi kevalam
GE07mbh_05_u:15564: 05,185.018c bhūtāni caiva sarvāṇi jagmur ārtiṃ viśāṃ pate
GE07mbh_05_u:15565: 05,185.019a ṛṣayaś ca sagandharvā devatāś caiva bhārata
GE07mbh_05_u:15568: 05,185.020c saṃtaptāni ca bhūtāni viṣādaṃ jagmur uttamam
GE07mbh_05_u:15569: 05,185.021a prajajvāla nabho rājan dhūmāyante diśo daśa
GE07mbh_05_u:15570: 05,185.021c na sthātum antarikṣe ca śekur ākāśagās tadā
GE07mbh_05_u:15572: 05,185.022c idam antaram ity eva yoktukāmo 'smi bhārata
GE07mbh_05_u:15574: 05,185.023c cintitaṃ ca tad astraṃ me manasi pratyabhāt tadā
GE07mbh_05_u:15576: 05,186.001a tato halahalāśabdo divi rājan mahān abhūt
GE07mbh_05_u:15577: 05,186.001c prasvāpaṃ bhīṣma mā srākṣīr iti kauravanandana
GE07mbh_05_u:15578: 05,186.002a ayuñjam eva caivāhaṃ tad astraṃ bhṛgunandane
GE07mbh_05_u:15579: 05,186.002c prasvāpaṃ māṃ prayuñjānaṃ nārado vākyam abravīt
GE07mbh_05_u:15580: 05,186.003a ete viyati kauravya divi devagaṇāḥ sthitāḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:15581: 05,186.003c te tvāṃ nivārayanty adya prasvāpaṃ mā prayojaya
GE07mbh_05_u:15582: 05,186.004a rāmas tapasvī brahmaṇyo brāhmaṇaś ca guruś ca te
GE07mbh_05_u:15583: 05,186.004c tasyāvamānaṃ kauravya mā sma kārṣīḥ kathaṃ cana
GE07mbh_05_u:15584: 05,186.005a tato 'paśyaṃ diviṣṭhān vai tān aṣṭau brahmavādinaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:15585: 05,186.005c te māṃ smayanto rājendra śanakair idam abruvan
GE07mbh_05_u:15586: 05,186.006a yathāha bharataśreṣṭha nāradas tat tathā kuru
GE07mbh_05_u:15587: 05,186.006c etad dhi paramaṃ śreyo lokānāṃ bharatarṣabha
GE07mbh_05_u:15588: 05,186.007a tataś ca pratisaṃhṛtya tad astraṃ svāpanaṃ mṛdhe
GE07mbh_05_u:15589: 05,186.007c brahmāstraṃ dīpayāṃ cakre tasmin yudhi yathāvidhi
GE07mbh_05_u:15598: 05,186.010a mā smaivaṃ sāhasaṃ vatsa punaḥ kārṣīḥ kathaṃ cana
GE07mbh_05_u:15600: 05,186.011a kṣatriyasya tu dharmo 'yaṃ yad yuddhaṃ bhṛgunandana
GE07mbh_05_u:15601: 05,186.011c svādhyāyo vratacaryā ca brāhmaṇānāṃ paraṃ dhanam
GE07mbh_05_u:15602: 05,186.012a idaṃ nimitte kasmiṃś cid asmābhir upamantritam
GE07mbh_05_u:15603: 05,186.012c śastradhāraṇam atyugraṃ tac ca kāryaṃ kṛtaṃ tvayā
GE07mbh_05_u:15604: 05,186.013a vatsa paryāptam etāvad bhīṣmeṇa saha saṃyuge
GE07mbh_05_u:15605: 05,186.013c vimardas te mahābāho vyapayāhi raṇād itaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:15606: 05,186.014a paryāptam etad bhadraṃ te tava kārmukadhāraṇam
GE07mbh_05_u:15608: 05,186.015a eṣa bhīṣmaḥ śāṃtanavo devaiḥ sarvair nivāritaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:15609: 05,186.015c nivartasva raṇād asmād iti caiva pracoditaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:15610: 05,186.016a rāmeṇa saha mā yotsīr guruṇeti punaḥ punaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:15611: 05,186.016c na hi rāmo raṇe jetuṃ tvayā nyāyyaḥ kurūdvaha
GE07mbh_05_u:15613: 05,186.017a vayaṃ tu guravas tubhyaṃ tatas tvāṃ vārayāmahe
GE07mbh_05_u:15614: 05,186.017c bhīṣmo vasūnām anyatamo diṣṭyā jīvasi putraka
GE07mbh_05_u:15615: 05,186.018a gāṅgeyaḥ śaṃtanoḥ putro vasur eṣa mahāyaśāḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:15616: 05,186.018c kathaṃ tvayā raṇe jetuṃ rāma śakyo nivarta vai
GE07mbh_05_u:15621: 05,186.021a evam uktaḥ sa pitṛbhiḥ pitṝn rāmo 'bravīd idam
GE07mbh_05_u:15622: 05,186.021c nāhaṃ yudhi nivarteyam iti me vratam āhitam
GE07mbh_05_u:15623: 05,186.022a na nivartitapūrvaṃ ca kadā cid raṇamūrdhani
GE07mbh_05_u:15625: 05,186.022e na tv ahaṃ vinivartiṣye yuddhād asmāt kathaṃ cana
GE07mbh_05_u:15626: 05,186.023a tatas te munayo rājann ṛcīkapramukhās tadā
GE07mbh_05_u:15629: 05,186.024c nety avocam ahaṃ tāṃś ca kṣatradharmavyapekṣayā
GE07mbh_05_u:15630: 05,186.025a mama vratam idaṃ loke nāhaṃ yuddhāt kathaṃ cana
GE07mbh_05_u:15632: 05,186.026a nāhaṃ lobhān na kārpaṇyān na bhayān nārthakāraṇāt
GE07mbh_05_u:15633: 05,186.026c tyajeyaṃ śāśvataṃ dharmam iti me niścitā matiḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:15634: 05,186.027a tatas te munayaḥ sarve nāradapramukhā nṛpa
GE07mbh_05_u:15635: 05,186.027c bhāgīrathī ca me mātā raṇamadhyaṃ prapedire
GE07mbh_05_u:15637: 05,186.028c sthito 'ham āhave yoddhuṃ tatas te rāmam abruvan
GE07mbh_05_u:15639: 05,186.029a nāvanītaṃ hi hṛdayaṃ viprāṇāṃ śāmya bhārgava
GE07mbh_05_u:15640: 05,186.029c rāma rāma nivartasva yuddhād asmād dvijottama
GE07mbh_05_u:15641: 05,186.029e avadhyo hi tvayā bhīṣmas tvaṃ ca bhīṣmasya bhārgava
GE07mbh_05_u:15642: 05,186.030a evaṃ bruvantas te sarve pratirudhya raṇājiram
GE07mbh_05_u:15644: 05,186.031a tato 'haṃ punar evātha tān aṣṭau brahmavādinaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:15645: 05,186.031c adrākṣaṃ dīpyamānān vai grahān aṣṭāv ivoditān
GE07mbh_05_u:15646: 05,186.032a te māṃ sapraṇayaṃ vākyam abruvan samare sthitam
GE07mbh_05_u:15647: 05,186.032c praihi rāmaṃ mahābāho guruṃ lokahitaṃ kuru
GE07mbh_05_u:15648: 05,186.033a dṛṣṭvā nivartitaṃ rāmaṃ suhṛdvākyena tena vai
GE07mbh_05_u:15649: 05,186.033c lokānāṃ ca hitaṃ kurvann aham apy ādade vacaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:15651: 05,186.034c rāmaś cābhyutsmayan premṇā mām uvāca mahātapāḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:15653: 05,186.035c gamyatāṃ bhīṣma yuddhe 'smiṃs toṣito 'haṃ bhṛśaṃ tvayā
GE07mbh_05_u:15654: 05,186.036a mama caiva samakṣaṃ tāṃ kanyām āhūya bhārgavaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:15655: 05,186.036c uvāca dīnayā vācā madhye teṣāṃ tapasvinām
GE07mbh_05_u:15657: 05,187.001a pratyakṣam etal lokānāṃ sarveṣām eva bhāmini
GE07mbh_05_u:15658: 05,187.001c yathā mayā paraṃ śaktyā kṛtaṃ vai pauruṣaṃ mahat
GE07mbh_05_u:15659: 05,187.002a na caiva yudhi śaknomi bhīṣmaṃ śastrabhṛtāṃ varam
GE07mbh_05_u:15661: 05,187.003a eṣā me paramā śaktir etan me paramaṃ balam
GE07mbh_05_u:15662: 05,187.003c yatheṣṭaṃ gamyatāṃ bhadre kim anyad vā karomi te
GE07mbh_05_u:15663: 05,187.004a bhīṣmam eva prapadyasva na te 'nyā vidyate gatiḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:15664: 05,187.004c nirjito hy asmi bhīṣmeṇa mahāstrāṇi pramuñcatā
GE07mbh_05_u:15666: 05,187.005a evam uktvā tato rāmo viniḥśvasya mahāmanāḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:15667: 05,187.005c tūṣṇīm āsīt tadā kanyā provāca bhṛgunandanam
GE07mbh_05_u:15668: 05,187.006a bhagavann evam evaitad yathāha bhagavāṃs tathā
GE07mbh_05_u:15669: 05,187.006c ajeyo yudhi bhīṣmo 'yam api devair udāradhīḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:15670: 05,187.007a yathāśakti yathotsāhaṃ mama kāryaṃ kṛtaṃ tvayā
GE07mbh_05_u:15671: 05,187.007c anidhāya raṇe vīryam astrāṇi vividhāni ca
GE07mbh_05_u:15672: 05,187.008a na caiṣa śakyate yuddhe viśeṣayitum antataḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:15673: 05,187.008c na cāham enaṃ yāsyāmi punar bhīṣmaṃ kathaṃ cana
GE07mbh_05_u:15674: 05,187.009a gamiṣyāmi tu tatrāhaṃ yatra bhīṣmaṃ tapodhana
GE07mbh_05_u:15678: 05,187.011a tato mahendraṃ saha tair munibhir bhṛgusattamaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:15679: 05,187.011c yathāgataṃ yayau rāmo mām upāmantrya bhārata
GE07mbh_05_u:15682: 05,187.012e yathāvṛttaṃ mahārāja sā ca māṃ pratyanandata
GE07mbh_05_u:15685: 05,187.013e pratyāharaṃś ca me yuktāḥ sthitāḥ priyahite mama
GE07mbh_05_u:15686: 05,187.014a yadaiva hi vanaṃ prāyāt kanyā sā tapase dhṛtā
GE07mbh_05_u:15688: 05,187.015a na hi māṃ kṣatriyaḥ kaś cid vīryeṇa vijayed yudhi
GE07mbh_05_u:15690: 05,187.016a api caitan mayā rājan nārade 'pi niveditam
GE07mbh_05_u:15691: 05,187.016c vyāse caiva bhayāt kāryaṃ tau cobhau mām avocatām
GE07mbh_05_u:15692: 05,187.017a na viṣādas tvayā kāryo bhīṣma kāśisutāṃ prati
GE07mbh_05_u:15697: 05,187.019c ṣaṇ māsān vāyubhakṣā ca sthāṇubhūtā tapodhanā
GE07mbh_05_u:15702: 05,187.022a evaṃ dvādaśa varṣāṇi tāpayām āsa rodasī
GE07mbh_05_u:15703: 05,187.022c nivartyamānāpi tu sā jñātibhir naiva śakyate
GE07mbh_05_u:15709: 05,187.025c cyavanasyāśrame caiva brahmaṇaḥ sthāna eva ca
GE07mbh_05_u:15714: 05,187.028a eteṣu tīrtheṣu tadā kāśikanyā viśāṃ pate
GE07mbh_05_u:15715: 05,187.028c āplāvayata gātrāṇi tīvram āsthāya vai tapaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:15716: 05,187.029a tām abravīt kauraveya mama mātā jalotthitā
GE07mbh_05_u:15717: 05,187.029c kimarthaṃ kliśyase bhadre tathyam etad bravīhi me
GE07mbh_05_u:15719: 05,187.030c bhīṣmo rāmeṇa samare na jitaś cārulocane
GE07mbh_05_u:15720: 05,187.031a ko 'nyas tam utsahej jetum udyateṣuṃ mahīpatim
GE07mbh_05_u:15722: 05,187.032a carāmi pṛthivīṃ devi yathā hanyām ahaṃ nṛpam
GE07mbh_05_u:15723: 05,187.032c etad vrataphalaṃ dehe parasmin syād yathā hi me
GE07mbh_05_u:15726: 05,187.034a yadi bhīṣmavināśāya kāśye carasi vai vratam
GE07mbh_05_u:15727: 05,187.034c vratasthā ca śarīraṃ tvaṃ yadi nāma vimokṣyasi
GE07mbh_05_u:15731: 05,187.036a evam uktvā tato rājan kāśikanyāṃ nyavartata
GE07mbh_05_u:15733: 05,187.037a kadā cid aṣṭame māsi kadā cid daśame tathā
GE07mbh_05_u:15734: 05,187.037c na prāśnītodakam api punaḥ sā varavarṇinī
GE07mbh_05_u:15735: 05,187.038a sā vatsabhūmiṃ kauravya tīrthalobhāt tatas tataḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:15737: 05,187.039a sā nadī vatsabhūmyāṃ tu prathitāmbeti bhārata
GE07mbh_05_u:15739: 05,187.040a sā kanyā tapasā tena bhāgārdhena vyajāyata
GE07mbh_05_u:15740: 05,187.040c nadī ca rājan vatseṣu kanyā caivābhavat tadā
GE07mbh_05_u:15742: 05,188.001a tatas te tāpasāḥ sarve tapase dhṛtaniścayām
GE07mbh_05_u:15743: 05,188.001c dṛṣṭvā nyavartayaṃs tāta kiṃ kāryam iti cābruvan
GE07mbh_05_u:15744: 05,188.002a tān uvāca tataḥ kanyā tapovṛddhān ṛṣīṃs tadā
GE07mbh_05_u:15746: 05,188.003a vadhārthaṃ tasya dīkṣā me na lokārthaṃ tapodhanāḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:15747: 05,188.003c nihatya bhīṣmaṃ gaccheyaṃ śāntim ity eva niścayaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:15749: 05,188.004c patilokād vihīnā ca naiva strī na pumān iha
GE07mbh_05_u:15751: 05,188.005c eṣa me hṛdi saṃkalpo yadartham idam udyatam
GE07mbh_05_u:15753: 05,188.006c bhīṣme praticikīrṣāmi nāsmi vāryeti vai punaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:15754: 05,188.007a tāṃ devo darśayām āsa śūlapāṇir umāpatiḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:15755: 05,188.007c madhye teṣāṃ maharṣīṇāṃ svena rūpeṇa bhāminīm
GE07mbh_05_u:15758: 05,188.009a tataḥ sā punar evātha kanyā rudram uvāca ha
GE07mbh_05_u:15759: 05,188.009c upapadyet kathaṃ deva striyo mama jayo yudhi
GE07mbh_05_u:15760: 05,188.009e strībhāvena ca me gāḍhaṃ manaḥ śāntam umāpate
GE07mbh_05_u:15762: 05,188.010c yathā sa satyo bhavati tathā kuru vṛṣadhvaja
GE07mbh_05_u:15763: 05,188.010e yathā hanyāṃ samāgamya bhīṣmaṃ śāṃtanavaṃ yudhi
GE07mbh_05_u:15764: 05,188.011a tām uvāca mahādevaḥ kanyāṃ kila vṛṣadhvajaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:15765: 05,188.011c na me vāg anṛtaṃ bhadre prāha satyaṃ bhaviṣyati
GE07mbh_05_u:15766: 05,188.012a vadhiṣyasi raṇe bhīṣmaṃ puruṣatvaṃ ca lapsyase
GE07mbh_05_u:15767: 05,188.012c smariṣyasi ca tat sarvaṃ deham anyaṃ gatā satī
GE07mbh_05_u:15770: 05,188.014a yathoktam eva kalyāṇi sarvam etad bhaviṣyati
GE07mbh_05_u:15771: 05,188.014c bhaviṣyasi pumān paścāt kasmāc cit kālaparyayāt
GE07mbh_05_u:15774: 05,188.016a tataḥ sā paśyatāṃ teṣāṃ maharṣīṇām aninditā
GE07mbh_05_u:15776: 05,188.017a citāṃ kṛtvā sumahatīṃ pradāya ca hutāśanam
GE07mbh_05_u:15779: 05,188.018c jyeṣṭhā kāśisutā rājan yamunām abhito nadīm
GE07mbh_05_u:15781: 05,189.001a kathaṃ śikhaṇḍī gāṅgeya kanyā bhūtvā satī tadā
GE07mbh_05_u:15782: 05,189.001c puruṣo 'bhavad yudhi śreṣṭha tan me brūhi pitāmaha
GE07mbh_05_u:15784: 05,189.002a bhāryā tu tasya rājendra drupadasya mahīpateḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:15785: 05,189.002c mahiṣī dayitā hy āsīd aputrā ca viśāṃ pate
GE07mbh_05_u:15786: 05,189.003a etasminn eva kāle tu drupado vai mahīpatiḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:15789: 05,189.004c lebhe kanyāṃ mahādevāt putro me syād iti bruvan
GE07mbh_05_u:15791: 05,189.005c ity ukto devadevena strīpumāṃs te bhaviṣyati
GE07mbh_05_u:15792: 05,189.006a nivartasva mahīpāla naitaj jātv anyathā bhavet
GE07mbh_05_u:15793: 05,189.006c sa tu gatvā ca nagaraṃ bhāryām idam uvāca ha
GE07mbh_05_u:15794: 05,189.007a kṛto yatno mayā devi putrārthe tapasā mahān
GE07mbh_05_u:15795: 05,189.007c kanyā bhūtvā pumān bhāvī iti cokto 'smi śaṃbhunā
GE07mbh_05_u:15796: 05,189.008a punaḥ punar yācyamāno diṣṭam ity abravīc chivaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:15797: 05,189.008c na tad anyad dhi bhavitā bhavitavyaṃ hi tat tathā
GE07mbh_05_u:15798: 05,189.009a tataḥ sā niyatā bhūtvā ṛtukāle manasvinī
GE07mbh_05_u:15801: 05,189.010c pārṣatāt sā mahīpāla yathā māṃ nārado 'bravīt
GE07mbh_05_u:15802: 05,189.011a tato dadhāra taṃ garbhaṃ devī rājīvalocanā
GE07mbh_05_u:15803: 05,189.011c tāṃ sa rājā priyāṃ bhāryāṃ drupadaḥ kurunandana
GE07mbh_05_u:15805: 05,189.011f*0584_01 sarvān abhiprāyakṛtān kāmāṃl lebhe ca kaurava
GE07mbh_05_u:15807: 05,189.012b*0585_01 yathākālaṃ tu sā devī mahiṣī drupadasya ha
GE07mbh_05_u:15809: 05,189.013a aputrasya tu rājñaḥ sā drupadasya yaśasvinī
GE07mbh_05_u:15810: 05,189.013c khyāpayām āsa rājendra putro jāto mameti vai
GE07mbh_05_u:15811: 05,189.014a tataḥ sa rājā drupadaḥ pracchannāyā narādhipa
GE07mbh_05_u:15813: 05,189.015a rakṣaṇaṃ caiva mantrasya mahiṣī drupadasya sā
GE07mbh_05_u:15814: 05,189.015c cakāra sarvayatnena bruvāṇā putra ity uta
GE07mbh_05_u:15815: 05,189.015e na hi tāṃ veda nagare kaś cid anyatra pārṣatāt
GE07mbh_05_u:15817: 05,189.016c chādayām āsa tāṃ kanyāṃ pumān iti ca so 'bravīt
GE07mbh_05_u:15819: 05,189.017c puṃvad vidhānayuktāni śikhaṇḍīti ca tāṃ viduḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:15820: 05,189.018a aham ekas tu cāreṇa vacanān nāradasya ca
GE07mbh_05_u:15823: 05,190.001a cakāra yatnaṃ drupadaḥ sarvasmin svajane mahat
GE07mbh_05_u:15824: 05,190.001c tato lekhyādiṣu tathā śilpeṣu ca paraṃ gatā
GE07mbh_05_u:15825: 05,190.001e iṣvastre caiva rājendra droṇaśiṣyo babhūva ha
GE07mbh_05_u:15827: 05,190.002c codayām āsa bhāryārthaṃ kanyāyāḥ putravat tadā
GE07mbh_05_u:15828: 05,190.003a tatas tāṃ pārṣato dṛṣṭvā kanyāṃ saṃprāptayauvanām
GE07mbh_05_u:15829: 05,190.003c striyaṃ matvā tadā cintāṃ prapede saha bhāryayā
GE07mbh_05_u:15833: 05,190.005a na tan mithyā mahārājñi bhaviṣyati kathaṃ cana
GE07mbh_05_u:15834: 05,190.005c trailokyakartā kasmād dhi tan mṛṣā kartum arhati
GE07mbh_05_u:15836: 05,190.006a yadi te rocate rājan vakṣyāmi śṛṇu me vacaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:15839: 05,190.007c satyaṃ bhavati tad vākyam iti me niścitā matiḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:15841: 05,190.008a tatas tau niścayaṃ kṛtvā tasmin kārye 'tha dampatī
GE07mbh_05_u:15848: 05,190.010c sa ca prādān mahīpālaḥ kanyāṃ tasmai śikhaṇḍine
GE07mbh_05_u:15849: 05,190.011a sa ca rājā daśārṇeṣu mahān āsīn mahīpatiḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:15851: 05,190.012a kṛte vivāhe tu tadā sā kanyā rājasattama
GE07mbh_05_u:15852: 05,190.012c yauvanaṃ samanuprāptā sā ca kanyā śikhaṇḍinī
GE07mbh_05_u:15853: 05,190.013a kṛtadāraḥ śikhaṇḍī tu kāmpilyaṃ punar āgamat
GE07mbh_05_u:15854: 05,190.013c na ca sā veda tāṃ kanyāṃ kaṃ cit kālaṃ striyaṃ kila
GE07mbh_05_u:15855: 05,190.014a hiraṇyavarmaṇaḥ kanyā jñātvā tāṃ tu śikhaṇḍinīm
GE07mbh_05_u:15856: 05,190.014c dhātrīṇāṃ ca sakhīnāṃ ca vrīḍamānā nyavedayat
GE07mbh_05_u:15857: 05,190.014e kanyāṃ pañcālarājasya sutāṃ tāṃ vai śikhaṇḍinīm
GE07mbh_05_u:15858: 05,190.015a tatas tā rājaśārdūla dhātryo dāśārṇikās tadā
GE07mbh_05_u:15859: 05,190.015c jagmur ārtiṃ parāṃ duḥkhāt preṣayām āsur eva ca
GE07mbh_05_u:15861: 05,190.016c vipralambhaṃ yathāvṛttaṃ sa ca cukrodha pārthivaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:15862: 05,190.017a śikhaṇḍy api mahārāja puṃvad rājakule tadā
GE07mbh_05_u:15865: 05,190.018c hiraṇyavarmā rājendra roṣād ārtiṃ jagāma ha
GE07mbh_05_u:15869: 05,190.020c eka ekāntam utsārya raho vacanam abravīt
GE07mbh_05_u:15870: 05,190.021a daśārṇarājo rājaṃs tvām idaṃ vacanam abravīt
GE07mbh_05_u:15872: 05,190.022a avamanyase māṃ nṛpate nūnaṃ durmantritaṃ tava
GE07mbh_05_u:15873: 05,190.022c yan me kanyāṃ svakanyārthe mohād yācitavān asi
GE07mbh_05_u:15875: 05,190.023c eṣa tvāṃ sajanāmātyam uddharāmi sthiro bhava
GE07mbh_05_u:15876: 05,190.023d*0586_01 avamatya ca vīryaṃ me kulaṃ cāritram eva ca
GE07mbh_05_u:15878: 05,190.023d*0586_03 kuru sarvāṇi kāryāṇi bhuṅkṣva bhogān anuttamān
GE07mbh_05_u:15881: 05,191.001a evam uktasya dūtena drupadasya tadā nṛpa
GE07mbh_05_u:15883: 05,191.002a sa yatnam akarot tīvraṃ saṃbandhair anusāntvanaiḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:15885: 05,191.003a sa rājā bhūya evātha kṛtvā tattvata āgamam
GE07mbh_05_u:15888: 05,191.004c duhitur vipralambhaṃ taṃ dhātrīṇāṃ vacanāt tadā
GE07mbh_05_u:15890: 05,191.005c abhiyāne matiṃ cakre drupadaṃ prati bhārata
GE07mbh_05_u:15891: 05,191.006a tataḥ saṃmantrayām āsa mitraiḥ saha mahīpatiḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:15893: 05,191.007a tatra vai niścitaṃ teṣām abhūd rājñāṃ mahātmanām
GE07mbh_05_u:15894: 05,191.007c tathyaṃ ced bhavati hy etat kanyā rājañ śikhaṇḍinī
GE07mbh_05_u:15898: 05,191.009a sa tadā dūtam ājñāya punaḥ kṣattāram īśvaraḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:15899: 05,191.009c prāsthāpayat pārṣatāya hanmīti tvāṃ sthiro bhava
GE07mbh_05_u:15900: 05,191.010a sa prakṛtyā ca vai bhīruḥ kilbiṣī ca narādhipaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:15903: 05,191.011c sametya bhāryāṃ rahite vākyam āha narādhipaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:15908: 05,191.014a kim idānīṃ kariṣyāmi mūḍhaḥ kanyām imāṃ prati
GE07mbh_05_u:15910: 05,191.014c śikhaṇḍī kila putras te kanyeti pariśaṅkitaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:15913: 05,191.016a kim atra tathyaṃ suśroṇi kiṃ mithyā brūhi śobhane
GE07mbh_05_u:15914: 05,191.016c śrutvā tvattaḥ śubhe vākyaṃ saṃvidhāsyāmy ahaṃ tathā
GE07mbh_05_u:15915: 05,191.017a ahaṃ hi saṃśayaṃ prāpto bālā ceyaṃ śikhaṇḍinī
